targetString: Apakah virus ini berikatan juga dengan sel yang mengekspresikan ACE2 di organ lain?
en-mt: Does this virus also bind to cells expressing ACE2 in other organs?

sourceString: Without clear answers to these questions, we cannot achieve fast and accurate diagnosis and effective treatment.
targetString: Tanpa jawaban yang jelas untuk pertanyaan-pertanyaan ini, kita tidak dapat mencapai diagnosis yang cepat dan akurat serta perawatan yang efektif.
en-mt: Without clear answers to these questions, we cannot achieve a fast and accurate diagnosis and effective treatment.

sourceString: How long will the epidemic last?
targetString: Berapa lama epidemi ini akan berlangsung?
en-mt: How long will this epidemic last?

sourceString: How is the virus genetically evolving during transmission among humans?
targetString: Bagaimana virus berkembang secara genetis selama transmisi antara manusia?
en-mt: How do viruses evolve genetically during transmission between humans?

sourceString: Will it become a pandemic worldwide, die down like SARS or relapse periodically like the flu?
targetString: Apakah pandemi ini akan menjadi pandemi seluruh dunia, berakhir seperti SARS, atau terulang kembali secara periodik seperti flu?
en-mt: Will this pandemic become a worldwide pandemic, end like SARS, or will it repeat itself periodically like the flu?

sourceString: It is essential but may take some time to search for answers to the above and many other questions.
targetString: Jawaban untuk pertanyaan di atas dan banyak pernyataan lainnya sangat penting, tetapi mungkin memerlukan waktu untuk menemukannya.
en-mt: The answers to the above questions and many other statements are very important, but may take time to find.

sourceString: However, with whatever expense it may demand, we have no other choice but to stop the epidemic as soon as possible and bring our life back to normal.
targetString: Meski demikian, berapa pun harganya, kita tidak memiliki pilihan lain selain menghentikan epidemi ini sesegera mungkin agar dapat kembali ke kehidupan normal.
en-mt: However, no matter what the price, we have no other choice but to stop this epidemic as soon as possible in order to return to normal life.

sourceString: Zoonotic origins of human coronaviruses
targetString: Asal zoonotik virus korona manusia
en-mt: The zoonotic origin of the human coronavirus

sourceString: Mutation and adaptation have driven the co-evolution of coronaviruses (CoVs) and their hosts, including human beings, for thousands of years.
targetString: Selama ribuan tahun, mutasi dan adaptasi telah menggerakkan ko-evolusi virus korona (CoV) dan inangnya, termasuk manusia.
en-mt: For thousands of years, mutations and adaptations have driven the co-evolution of the coronavirus (CoV) and its hosts, including humans.

sourceString: Before 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause mild illness, such as common cold.
targetString: Sebelum tahun 2003, dua CoV manusia (HCoV) diketahui menyebabkan penyakit ringan, seperti selesma.
en-mt: Prior to 2003, two human CoV (HCoV) were known to cause minor illnesses, such as the common cold.

sourceString: The outbreaks of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) have flipped the coin to reveal how devastating and life-threatening an HCoV infection could be.
targetString: Wabah sindrom pernapasan akut berat (SARS) dan sindrom pernapasan Timur Tengah (MERS) membalikkan keadaan dan mengungkapkan betapa infeksi HCoV dapat sangat merusak dan mengancam jiwa.
en-mt: The outbreaks of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) turned the tide and revealed just how devastating and life-threatening HCoV infection can be.

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 in central China at the end of 2019 has thrusted CoVs into the spotlight again and surprised us with its high transmissibility but reduced pathogenicity compared to its sister SARS-CoV.
targetString: Munculnya SARS-CoV-2 di Tiongkok pusat pada akhir tahun 2019 telah membuat CoV menjadi sorotan kembali dan mengejutkan kita dengan transmisi yang tinggi, tetapi dengan patogenisitas yang lebih rendah dibandingkan saudaranya, SARS-CoV.
en-mt: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 in central China at the end of 2019 has brought CoV back into the spotlight and surprised us with its high transmission, but lower pathogenicity than its cousin, SARS-CoV.

sourceString: HCoV infection is a zoonosis and understanding the zoonotic origins of HCoVs would serve us well.
targetString: Infeksi HCoV merupakan zoonosis. Karena itu, pemahaman asal zoonotik HCoV akan bermanfaat bagi kita.
en-mt: HCoV infection is a zoonosis. Therefore, understanding the zoonotic origin of HCoV will be of benefit to us.

sourceString: Most HCoVs originated from bats where they are non-pathogenic.
targetString: Sebagian besar HCoV berasal dari kelelawar. Pada hewan ini, virus tidak bersifat patogenik.
en-mt: Most of the HCoV originates from bats. In these animals, the virus is not pathogenic.

sourceString: The intermediate reservoir hosts of some HCoVs are also known.
targetString: Inang reservoir perantara beberapa HCoV juga telah diketahui.
en-mt: Intermediate reservoir hosts of some HCoV are also known.

sourceString: Identifying the animal hosts has direct implications in the prevention of human diseases.
targetString: Identifikasi inang hewan memiliki implikasi langsung dalam pencegahan penyakit manusia.
en-mt: Identification of animal hosts has direct implications in the prevention of human disease.

sourceString: Investigating CoV-host interactions in animals might also derive important insight on CoV pathogenesis in humans.
targetString: Penyelidikan interaksi CoV-inang pada hewan juga dapat memberikan wawasan penting tentang patogenesis CoV pada manusia.
en-mt: Investigations of CoV-host interactions in animals may also provide important insights into the pathogenesis of CoV in humans.

sourceString: In this review, we present an overview of the existing knowledge about the seven HCoVs, with a focus on the history of their discovery as well as their zoonotic origins and interspecies transmission.
targetString: Dalam tinjauan ini, kami menyajikan gambaran umum pengetahuan saat ini tentang tujuh HCoV, dengan fokus pada sejarah penemuannya serta asal zoonotiknya dan transmisi antarspesiesnya.
en-mt: In this review, we present an overview of the current knowledge of the seven HCoVs, focusing on their history of discovery as well as their zoonotic origin and interspecies transmission.

sourceString: Importantly, we compare and contrast the different HCoVs from a perspective of virus evolution and genome recombination.
targetString: Hal yang penting, kami membandingkan dan mengontraskan HCoV tersebut dari sudut pandang evolusi dan rekombinasi genom.
en-mt: Importantly, we compared and contrasted these HCoVs from the standpoints of genomic evolution and recombination.

sourceString: The current CoV disease 2019 (COVID-19) epidemic is discussed in this context.
targetString: Epidemi penyakit CoV 2019 (COVID-19) saat ini dibahas dalam konteks ini.
en-mt: The current epidemic of CoV disease 2019 (COVID-19) is discussed in this context.

sourceString: In addition, the requirements for successful host switches and the implications of virus evolution on disease severity are also highlighted.
targetString: Selain itu, persyaratan peralihan inang yang berhasil dan implikasi evolusi virus pada keparahan penyakit juga disoroti.
en-mt: In addition, the requirements for successful host switching and the implications of viral evolution on disease severity were highlighted.

sourceString: Coronaviruses (CoVs) belong to the family Coronaviridae, which comprises a group of enveloped, positive-sensed, single-stranded RNA viruses.
targetString: Virus korona (CoV) berasal dari keluarga Coronaviridae, yang terdiri dari sekelompok virus RNA berselubung, berindra positif, dan beruntai tunggal.
en-mt: Corona virus (CoV) comes from the Coronaviridae family, which consists of a group of enveloped, positive-sense, single-stranded RNA viruses.

sourceString: These viruses harbouring the largest genome of 26 to 32 kilobases amongst RNA viruses were termed “CoVs” because of their crown-like morphology under electron microscope.
targetString: Virus ini memiliki genom terbesar dengan ukuran 26 hingga 32 kilobasa di antara virus RNA yang disebut "CoV", karena morfologinya yang mirip mahkota di bawah mikroskop elektron.
en-mt: This virus has the largest genome with a size of 26 to 32 kilobases among the RNA viruses called "CoV", due to its crown-like morphology under the electron microscope.

sourceString: Structurally, CoVs have non-segmented genomes that share a similar organization.
targetString: Berdasarkan strukturnya, CoV memiliki genom yang tidak tersegmentasi yang memiliki penataan yang serupa.
en-mt: Based on its structure, CoV has a non-segmented genome that has a similar arrangement.

sourceString: Approximately two thirds of the genome contain two large overlapping open reading frames (ORF1a and ORF1b), which are translated into the pp1a and pp1ab replicase polyproteins.
targetString: Sekitar dua pertiga genom terdiri dari dua rangka baca terbuka besar (ORF1a dan ORF1b) yang saling tumpang tindih. Keduanya ditranslasi menjadi poliprotein replikasi pp1a dan pp1ab.
en-mt: Approximately two-thirds of the genome consists of two overlapping large open reading frames (ORF1a and ORF1b). Both are translated into replicating polyproteins pp1a and pp1ab.

sourceString: The polyproteins are further processed to generate 16 non-structural proteins, designated nsp1~16.
targetString: Poliprotein mengalami pemrosesan lebih lanjut untuk membentuk 16 protein nonstruktural, yang disebut nsp1~16.
en-mt: The polyprotein undergoes further processing to form 16 nonstructural proteins, which are called nsp1~16.

sourceString: The remaining portion of the genome contains ORFs for the structural proteins, including spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N).
targetString: Sisa genom terdiri dari rangka baca terbuka (ORF) untuk protein struktural, yang mencakup tonjolan atau spike (S), selubung atau envelope (E), membran (M), dan nukleoprotein (N).
en-mt: The rest of the genome consists of open reading frames (ORF) for structural proteins, which include spikes (S), envelopes (E), membranes (M), and nucleoproteins (N).

sourceString: A number of lineage-specific accessory proteins are also encoded by different lineages of CoVs.
targetString: Sejumlah protein pelengkap yang spesifik untuk garis keturunan tertentu juga disandikan oleh berbagai garis keturunan CoV.
en-mt: A number of complement proteins that are specific for certain lineages are also encoded by various CoV lineages.

sourceString: Based on the difference in protein sequences, CoVs are classified into four genera (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV and delta-CoV), among which the beta-CoV genera contains most HCoVs and is subdivided into four lineages (A, B, C and D).
targetString: Berdasarkan perbedaan pada sekuens protein, CoV diklasifikasi menjadi empat genus (alfa-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV, dan delta-CoV); di antara keempat genus tersebut, genus beta-CoV memiliki paling banyak HCoV dan dibagi lagi menjadi empat garis keturunan (A, B, C, dan D).
en-mt: Based on differences in protein sequences, CoV is classified into four genera (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV, and delta-CoV); Among the four genera, the beta-CoV genus has the most HCoV and is further divided into four lineages (A, B, C, and D).

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence has shown that bats and rodents serve as the gene source of most alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs, while birds are the main reservoir of gamma-CoVs and delta-CoVs.
targetString: Bukti filogenetik menunjukkan bahwa kelelawar dan hewan pengerat merupakan sumber gen sebagian besar alfa-CoV dan beta-CoV, sementara unggas merupakan reservoir utama gamma-CoV dan delta-CoV.
en-mt: Phylogenetic evidence suggests that bats and rodents are the gene pool for most of the alpha-CoV and beta-CoV, while birds are the main reservoir of gamma-CoV and delta-CoV.

sourceString: For thousands of years, CoVs have constantly crossed species barriers and some have emerged as important human pathogens.
targetString: Selama ribuan tahun, CoV terus menerus melintasi penghalang spesies dan beberapa CoV telah menjadi patogen penting pada manusia.
en-mt: Over thousands of years, CoV has continuously crossed the species barrier and some CoV have become important human pathogens.

sourceString: To date, seven human CoVs (HCoVs) are known.
targetString: Sampai saat ini, ada tujuh CoV manusia (HCoV) yang diketahui.
en-mt: To date, there are seven known human CoV (HCoV).

sourceString: Among them HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 are alpha-CoVs.
targetString: Di antara ketujuh virus tersebut, HCoV-229E dan HCoV-NL63 adalah alfa-CoV.
en-mt: Among the seven viruses, HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 are alpha-CoV.

sourceString: The other five beta-CoVs include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Lima beta-CoV lainnya meliputi HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, virus korona sindrom pernapasan akut berat (SARS-CoV), virus korona sindrom pernapasan Timur Tengah (MERS-CoV), dan SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: The other five beta-CoVs include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV), and SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 usually cause mild symptoms, like common cold and/or diarrhea.
targetString: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, dan HCoV-NL63 biasanya menyebabkan gejala ringan, seperti pilek dan/atau diare.
en-mt: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, and HCoV-NL63 usually cause mild symptoms, such as a runny nose and/or diarrhea.

sourceString: In contrast, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and the newly-identified SARS-CoV-2 are highly pathogenic, causing severe lower respiratory tract infection in relatively more patients with a higher chance to develop acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and extrapulmonary manifestations.
targetString: Sebaliknya, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV, dan SARS-CoV-2 bersifat sangat patogenik, menyebabkan infeksi saluran napas bawah berat pada relatif lebih banyak pasien dan memiliki peluang lebih tinggi untuk berkembang menjadi sindrom gangguan pernapas akut (ARDS) dan manifestasi di luar organ paru.
en-mt: In contrast, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV, and SARS-CoV-2 are highly pathogenic, causing a relatively large number of patients with severe lower respiratory tract infections and have a higher chance of developing acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and other manifestations. pulmonary organs.

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain, B814, was isolated from the nasal discharge of patients with common cold in mid-1960s.
targetString: Strain HCoV-229E pertama, B814, diisolasi dari ingus pasien yang selesma pada pertengahan 1960-an.
en-mt: The first HCoV-229E strain, B814, was isolated from the mucus of patients with colds in the mid-1960s.

sourceString: Since then, more knowledge was accumulated through extensive studies on HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, both of which cause self-limiting symptoms.
targetString: Sejak itu, semakin banyak pengetahuan dikumpulkan melalui studi mendalam terhadap HCoV-229E dan HCoV-OC43, yang keduanya menyebabkan gejala yang sembuh sendiri.
en-mt: Since then, more and more knowledge has been gathered through in-depth studies of HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, both of which cause self-limiting symptoms.

sourceString: Indeed, the concept had been widely accepted that infection with HCoVs is generally harmless until the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: Bahkan, konsep ini telah diterima secara luas bahwa infeksi HCoV umumnya tidak berbahaya, sampai wabah SARS terjadi.
en-mt: In fact, it was widely accepted that HCoV infection was generally harmless, until the SARS outbreak.

sourceString: The SARS outbreak occurred in 2003 is one of the most devastating in current history, infecting over 8,000 people with a crude case fatality of approximately 10%.
targetString: Wabah SARS yang terjadi pada tahun 2003 adalah salah satu wabah paling merusak dalam sejarah saat ini, yang menginfeksi lebih dari 8.000 orang dengan angka kematian kasar sekitar 10%.
en-mt: The SARS outbreak that occurred in 2003 is one of the most devastating outbreaks in recent history, infecting more than 8,000 people with a crude mortality rate of around 10%.

sourceString: Ten years later, the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) outbreak resulted in a persistent epidemic in the Arabian Peninsula with sporadic spreading to the rest of the world.
targetString: Sepuluh tahun kemudian, wabah sindrom pernapasan Timur Tengah (MERS) mengakibatkan epidemi berkelanjutan di Semenanjung Arab dengan penyebaran sporadik ke berbagai belahan dunia lainnya.
en-mt: Ten years later, an outbreak of Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) resulted in a continuing epidemic in the Arabian Peninsula with sporadic spread to other parts of the world.

sourceString: The 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV), which has subsequently been renamed SARS-CoV-2, is the causative agent of the ongoing epidemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which has claimed more than 3,120 lives and infected more than 91,000 people as of March 3, 2020.
targetString: HCoV baru 2019 (2019-nCoV), yang selanjutnya disebut SARS-CoV-2, adalah agen kausatif epidemi penyakit virus korona 2019 (COVID-19), yang telah merenggut nyawa lebih dari 3.120 orang dan menginfeksi lebih dari 91.000 orang sampai dengan 3 Maret 2020.
en-mt: The new 2019 HCoV (2019-nCoV), hereinafter referred to as SARS-CoV-2, is the causative agent of the epidemic coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which has claimed the lives of more than 3,120 people and infected more than 91,000 people as of March 3 2020.

sourceString: The alarm has been ringing and the world has to prepare for the coming pandemic of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Alarm sudah berbunyi dan dunia harus mempersiapkan diri untuk pandemi SARS-CoV-2 yang akan datang.
en-mt: The alarm has sounded and the world must prepare itself for the coming SARS-CoV-2 pandemic.

sourceString: All seven HCoVs have a zoonotic origin from bats, mice or domestic animals.
targetString: Tujuh HCoV tersebut semua memiliki asal zoonotik dari kelelawar, tikus, atau hewan peliharaan.
en-mt: The seven HCoVs all have a zoonotic origin from bats, mice or domestic animals.

sourceString: Multiple lines of evidence support an evolutionary origin of all HCoVs from bats, where viruses are well adapted and non-pathogenic but show great genetic diversity.
targetString: Banyak bukti mendukung asal evolusi semua HCoV dari kelelawar. Di kelelawar, CoV berdaptasi dengan baik dan bersifat nonpatogenik, tetapi menunjukkan keragaman genetik yang besar.
en-mt: Much evidence supports the evolutionary origin of all HCoV from bats. In bats, CoV is well adapted and nonpathogenic, but shows great genetic diversity.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic has presented enormous medical, scientific, social and moral challenges to China and the world.
targetString: Epidemi COVID-19 telah menimbulkan tantangan medis, ilmiah, sosial, dan moral yang luar biasa besar bagi Tiongkok dan seluruh dunia.
en-mt: The COVID-19 epidemic has posed enormous medical, scientific, social and moral challenges to China and the rest of the world.

sourceString: Tracing the zoonotic origins of HCoVs provides a framework to understand the natural history, driving force and restriction factors of species jumping.
targetString: Pelacakan asal zoonotik HCoV memberi kerangka kerja untuk memahami riwayat alami, daya penggerak, dan faktor pembatasan terjadinya perpindahan antar spesies.
en-mt: Tracing the zoonotic origin of HCoV provides a framework for understanding the natural history, driving forces, and factors limiting movement between species.

sourceString: This might also guide or facilitate the search for the reservoir, intermediate and amplifying animal host(s) of SARS-CoV-2, with important implications in the prevention of future spillovers.
targetString: Studi ini juga dapat memandu atau memfasilitasi pencarian inang hewan reservoir, perantara, dan pengamplifikasi SARS-CoV-2, yang memiliki implikasi penting dalam pencegahan penyebaran di masa mendatang.
en-mt: These studies may also guide or facilitate the search for reservoir animal hosts, intermediates, and amplifiers for SARS-CoV-2, which has important implications for preventing future spread.

sourceString: In this review we present an overview of the zoonotic origins, interspecies transmission and pathogenesis of HCoVs.
targetString: Dalam tinjauan ini, kami memberikan gambaran umum asal zoonotik, transmisi antarspesies, dan patogenesis HCoV.
en-mt: In this review, we provide an overview of the zoonotic origin, interspecies transmission, and pathogenesis of HCoV.

sourceString: Particularly, we highlight and discuss the common theme that parental viruses of HCoVs are typically non-pathogenic in their natural reservoir hosts but become pathogenic after interspecies transmission to a new host.
targetString: Kami secara khusus menyoroti dan membahas topik umum bahwa virus induk HCoV biasanya bersifat nonpatogenik di reservoir alaminya, tetapi menjadi patogenik setelah transmisi antarspesies ke inang baru.
en-mt: We specifically highlight and address the general topic that HCoV host viruses are normally nonpathogenic in their natural reservoirs, but become pathogenic following interspecies transmission to new hosts.

sourceString: We also review the trend of HCoV evolution in which the increase in transmissibility often comes with the decrease in pathogenicity.
targetString: Kami juga mengulas tren evolusi HCoV bahwa peningkatan kemampuan transmisi sering kali disertai dengan penurunan patogenisitas.
en-mt: We also review the evolutionary trend of HCoV that an increase in transmission ability is often accompanied by a decrease in pathogenicity.

sourceString: The outcome of the ongoing SARS-CoV-2 outbreak is also discussed in this context.
targetString: Hasil akhir epidemi SARS-CoV-2 juga dibahas dalam konteks ini.
en-mt: The end result of the SARS-CoV-2 epidemic is also discussed in this context.

sourceString: Animal CoVs have been known since late 1930s.
targetString: CoV hewan telah dikenal sejak akhir 1930-an.
en-mt: Animal CoV has been known since the late 1930s.

sourceString: Before the first isolation of HCoV-229E strain B814 from the nasal discharge of patients who had contracted common cold, different CoVs had been isolated in various infected animals, including turkey, mouse, cow, pig, cat and dog.
targetString: Sebelum isolasi HCoV-229E strain B814 pertama dari ingus pasien yang terkena selesma, berbagai CoV telah diisolasi dari berbagai hewan yang terinfeksi, yang mencakup kalkun, tikus, sapi, babi, kucing, dan anjing.
en-mt: Prior to the isolation of the first B814 strain HCoV-229E from the snot of patients with colds, various CoVs had been isolated from a variety of infected animals, including turkeys, rats, cattle, pigs, cats, and dogs.

sourceString: In the past decades, seven HCoVs have been identified.
targetString: Dalam beberapa dasawarsa terakhir, tujuh HCoV telah diidentifikasi.
en-mt: In recent decades, seven HCoV have been identified.

sourceString: A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table ​1) would be informative and instructive.
targetString: Rangkuman singkat sejarah penemuan HCoV dalam urutan kronologis (Tabel 1) merupakan petunjuk yang informatif.
en-mt: A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table 1) is an informative guide.

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the respiratory tract of patients with upper respiratory tract infection in the year of 1966, and was subsequently adapted to grow in WI-38 lung cell lines.
targetString: Strain HCoV-229E pertama diisolasi dari saluran napas pasien yang mengalami infeksi saluran napas atas pada tahun 1966, yang selanjutnya diadaptasi untuk ditumbuhkan di lini sel paru WI-38.
en-mt: The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the airways of patients with upper respiratory infections in 1966, which was later adapted for cultivation in the WI-38 lung cell line.

sourceString: Patients infected with HCoV-229E presented with common cold symptoms, including headache, sneezing, malaise and sore-throat, with fever and cough seen in 10~20% cases.
targetString: Pasien yang terinfeksi HCoV-229E menunjukkan gejala selesma, yang mencakup sakit kepala, bersin, lesu, dan sakit tenggorokan, disertai demam dan batuk yang terlihat pada 10~20% kasus.
en-mt: Patients infected with HCoV-229E show symptoms of a cold, which include headache, sneezing, lethargy, and sore throat, accompanied by fever and cough, which are seen in 10~20% of cases.

sourceString: Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ culture and subsequent serial passage in brains of suckling mice.
targetString: Selanjutnya pada tahun 1967, HCoV-OC43 diisolasi dari kultur organ dan jalur seri berurutan di otak mencit yang masih menyusu.
en-mt: Subsequently, in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ culture and serial pathways sequentially in the brain of lactating mice.

sourceString: The clinical features of HCoV-OC43 infection appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E, which are symptomatically indistinguishable from infection with other respiratory tract pathogens such as influenza A viruses and rhinoviruses.
targetString: Gambaran klinis infeksi HCoV-OC43 tampaknya mirip dengan infeksi yang disebabkan oleh HCoV-229E, yang secara simtomatis tidak dapat dibedakan dengan infeksi patogen saluran pernapasan lain seperti virus influenza A dan rhinovirus.
en-mt: The clinical picture of HCoV-OC43 infection appears to be similar to infection caused by HCoV-229E, which is symptomatically indistinguishable from other respiratory pathogenic infections such as influenza A virus and rhinovirus.

sourceString: Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed globally, and they tend to be predominantly transmitted during the season of winter in temperate climate.
targetString: HCoV-229E dan HCoV-OC43 tersebar ke seluruh dunia dan cenderung paling banyak ditransmisikan selama musim dingin di daerah beriklim sedang.
en-mt: HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed worldwide and tend to be most transmitted during winter in temperate climates.

sourceString: Generally, the incubation time of these two viruses is less than one week, followed by an approximately 2-week illness.
targetString: Biasanya, waktu inkubasi dua virus ini kurang dari satu minggu dan diikuti dengan masa sakit selama sekitar 2 minggu.
en-mt: Typically, the incubation time for these two viruses is less than one week and is followed by a period of illness of about 2 weeks.

sourceString: According to a human volunteer study, healthy individuals infected with HCoV-229E developed mild common cold.
targetString: Berdasarkan sebuah studi sukarelawan manusia, orang sehat yang terinfeksi HCoV-229E mengalami selesma ringan.
en-mt: According to a study of human volunteers, healthy people infected with HCoV-229E develop mild colds.

sourceString: Only a few immunocompromised patients exhibited severe lower respiratory tract infection.
targetString: Hanya sedikit pasien dengan sistim kekebalan tubuh yang melemah yang menunjukkan infeksi saluran napas bawah berat.
en-mt: Only a few patients with weakened immune systems show severe lower respiratory tract infections.

sourceString: SARS, also known as “atypical pneumonia”, was the first well documented HCoV-caused pandemic in human history and the etiological agent is SARS-CoV, the third HCoV discovered.
targetString: SARS, yang dikenal juga sebagai "pneumonia atipis", merupakan pandemi akibat HCoV pertama yang didokumentasikan dengan baik dalam sejarah manusia dan agen etiologisnya adalah SARS-CoV, yang merupakan HCoV ketiga yang ditemukan.
en-mt: SARS, also known as "athymic pneumonia", was the first well-documented HCoV-induced pandemic in human history and its etiological agent was SARS-CoV, which was the third HCoV to be discovered.

sourceString: The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province of China.
targetString: Kasus pertama SARS dapat ditelusuri kembali ke akhir tahun 2002 di Provinsi Guangdong, Tiongkok.
en-mt: The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province, China.

sourceString: The SARS epidemic resulted in 8,096 reported cases with 774 deaths, spreading across many countries and continents.
targetString: Epidemi SARS mengakibatkan 8.096 kasus dilaporkan dengan 774 kematian, yang tersebar di banyak negara dan benua.
en-mt: The SARS epidemic resulted in 8,096 reported cases with 774 deaths, spread over many countries and continents.

sourceString: Apart from the super-spreaders, it was estimated that each case could give rise to approximately two secondary cases, with an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and the peak of viral load appearing on the 10th day of illness.
targetString: Terlepas dari penular super, setiap kasus diperkirakan dapat menyebabkan sekitar dua kasus sekunder, dengan masa inkubasi 4 hingga 7 hari dan puncak beban virus terlihat pada hari ke-10 penyakit.
en-mt: Apart from supertransmitters, each case is thought to lead to about two secondary cases, with an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and peak viral load seen by day 10 of illness.

sourceString: Patients infected with SARS-CoV initially present with myalgia, headache, fever, malaise and chills, followed by dyspnea, cough and respiratory distress as late symptoms.
targetString: Pasien yang terinfeksi SARS-CoV awalnya mengalami mialgia, sakit kepala, demam, lesu, dan menggigil, yang diikuti dengan dispnea, batuk, dan gangguan napas sebagai gejala tingkat lanjut.
en-mt: Patients infected with SARS-CoV initially experience myalgia, headache, fever, lethargy, and chills, followed by dyspnea, cough, and difficulty breathing as advanced symptoms.

sourceString: Lymphopenia, deranged liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS.
targetString: Limfopenia, uji fungsi hati yang tidak normal, dan peningkatan kreatin kinase merupakan kelainan laboratorium yang lazim pada SARS.
en-mt: Lymphopenia, abnormal liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities in SARS.

sourceString: Diffuse alveolar damage, epithelial cell proliferation and an increase of macrophages are also observed in SARS patients.
targetString: Kerusakan difusi alveolar, proliferasi sel epitel, dan peningkatan makrofag juga teramati pada pasien SARS.
en-mt: Impaired alveolar diffusion, epithelial cell proliferation, and increased macrophages were also observed in SARS patients.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of patients subsequently require intensive care and mechanical ventilation.
targetString: Selanjutnya, sekitar 20-30% pasien memerlukan perawatan intensif dan ventilasi mekanis.
en-mt: Furthermore, approximately 20-30% of patients require intensive care and mechanical ventilation.

sourceString: In addition to lower respiratory tract, multiple organs including gastrointestinal tract, liver and kidney can also be infected in these severe cases, usually accompanied with a cytokine storm, which might be lethal particularly in immunocompromised patients.
targetString: Selain saluran pernapasan bawah, beberapa organ yang mencakup saluran gastrointestinal, hati, dan ginjal juga dapat terinfeksi dalam kasus berat, biasanya disertai dengan badai sitokin, yang bisa mematikan, khususnya pada pasien yang kekebalannya lemah.
en-mt: Apart from the lower respiratory tract, several organs including the gastrointestinal tract, liver and kidneys can also be infected in severe cases, usually accompanied by a cytokine storm, which can be lethal, especially in immunocompromised patients.

sourceString: The virus was first isolated from the open lung biopsy of a relative of the index patient who travelled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou.
targetString: Virus pertama kali diisolasi dari biopsi paru terbuka kerabat pasien nol yang melakukan perjalanan ke Hong Kong dari Guangzhou.
en-mt: The virus was first isolated from an open lung biopsy of patient null's relative who traveled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou.

sourceString: Since then, tremendous efforts have been dedicated to HCoV research.
targetString: Sejak itu, upaya sangat besar didedikasikan untuk penelitian HCoV.
en-mt: Since then, enormous effort has been dedicated to HCoV research.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 was isolated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands during late 2004.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 diisolasi dari anak berusia 7 bulan dari Belanda pada akhir tahun 2004.
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 was isolated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands at the end of 2004.

sourceString: It was initially found to be prevalent in young children, the elderly and immunocompromised patients with respiratory illnesses.
targetString: Virus ini awalnya sangat lazim pada anak kecil, lansia, dan pasien yang kekebalannya lemah yang menderita penyakit pernapasan.
en-mt: The virus was initially highly prevalent in young children, the elderly and immunocompromised patients with respiratory diseases.

sourceString: Presentation of coryza, conjunctivitis, fever, and bronchiolitis is common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63.
targetString: Gambaran koriza, konjungtivitis, demam, dan bronkiolitis lazim dijumpai pada penyakit yang disebabkan oleh HCoV-NL63.
en-mt: Features of corrhiza, conjunctivitis, fever, and bronchiolitis are common in disease caused by HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: Another independent study described the isolation of the same virus from a nasal specimen from an 8-month-old boy suffering from pneumonia in the Netherlands.
targetString: Studi independen lain menjelaskan isolasi virus yang sama dari spesimen nasal anak laki-laki berusia 8 bulan yang menderita pneumonia di Belanda.
en-mt: Another independent study describes the isolation of the same virus from nasal specimens of an 8-month-old boy with pneumonia in the Netherlands.

sourceString: Although it was identified in Netherlands, it is actually distributed globally.
targetString: Walaupun diidentifikasi di Belanda, virus ini sebenarnya tersebar di seluruh dunia.
en-mt: Despite being identified in the Netherlands, this virus is actually spreading worldwide.

sourceString: It has been estimated that HCoV-NL63 accounts for approximately 4.7% of common respiratory diseases, and its peak incidence occurs during early summer, spring and winter.
targetString: Diperkirakan bahwa HCoV-NL63 mewakili sekitar 4,7% penyakit pernapasan umum dan puncak kejadiannya terjadi pada awal musim panas, musim semi, dan musim dingin.
en-mt: It is estimated that HCoV-NL63 represents approximately 4.7% of common respiratory diseases and peaks of incidence occur in early summer, spring and winter.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngitis, also known as croup.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 dikaitkan dengan laringitis obstruktif, yang disebut juga krup.
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngitis, which is also called croup.

sourceString: In the same year, HCoV-HKU1 was isolated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized with pneumonia and bronchiolitis in Hong Kong.
targetString: Di tahun yang sama, HCoV-HKU1 diisolasi dari pria berusia 71 tahun yang pernah dirawat inap karena pneumonia dan bronkiolitis di Hong Kong.
en-mt: In the same year, HCoV-HKU1 was isolated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized for pneumonia and bronchiolitis in Hong Kong.

sourceString: Besides community-acquired pneumonia and bronchiolitis, HCoV-HKU1 was reported to be associated with acute asthmatic exacerbation.
targetString: Selain pneumonia dan bronkiolitis komunitas, HCoV-HKU1 dilaporkan berkaitan dengan eksaserbasi asma akut.
en-mt: In addition to community-acquired pneumonia and bronchiolitis, HCoV-HKU1 has been reported to be associated with acute asthma exacerbations.

sourceString: Similar to HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 was found worldwide, causing mild respiratory diseases.
targetString: Serupa dengan HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E, dan HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 ditemukan di seluruh dunia, menyebabkan penyakit pernapasan ringan.
en-mt: Similar to HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E, and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 is found worldwide, causing mild respiratory illness.

sourceString: All these four community-acquired HCoVs have been well adapted to humans and are generally less likely to mutate to cause highly pathogenic diseases, though accidents did occur for unknown reasons as in the rare case of a more virulent subtype of HCoV-NL63, which has recently been reported to cause severe lower respiratory tract infection in China.
targetString: Empat HCoV komunitas ini seluruhnya telah beradaptasi dengan manusia dan umumnya memiliki kemungkinan kecil bermutasi menjadi penyakit sangat patogen. Meski demikian, kasus luar biasa memang terjadi karena alasan yang tidak diketahui, seperti dalam kasus subtipe HCoV-NL63 lebih virulen yang baru-baru ini dilaporkan menyebabkan infeksi saluran napas bawah berat di Tiongkok.
en-mt: All four of these community HCoVs have adapted to humans and generally have a low probability of mutating into highly pathogenic diseases. However, exceptional cases do occur for unknown reasons, such as in the case of the more virulent HCoV-NL63 subtype which was recently reported to cause severe lower respiratory tract infections in China.

sourceString: Generally, when these HCoVs acquire the abilities to transmit efficiently and to maintain themselves continuously within humans, they also become less virulent or pathogenic.
targetString: Umumnya, ketika mendapat kemampuan untuk berpindah secara efisien dan terus mempertahankan diri di dalam manusia, virulensi dan patogenitas HCoV ini juga berkurang.
en-mt: In general, when the ability to move efficiently and continue to survive within humans is acquired, the virulence and pathogenicity of this HCoV also decreases.

sourceString: MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012 from the lung of a 60-year-old patient who developed acute pneumonia and renal failure in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: MERS-CoV pertama kali diisolasi pada tahun 2012 dari paru pasien berusia 60 tahun yang mengalami pneumonia akut dan gagal ginjal di Arab Saudi.
en-mt: MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012 from the lungs of a 60-year-old patient with acute pneumonia and kidney failure in Saudi Arabia.

sourceString: Whereas most of the laboratory-confirmed cases originate from the Middle East, imported cases with occasional secondary spreads to close contacts have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia.
targetString: Walaupun kebanyakan kasus terkonfirmasi laboratorium berasal dari Timur Tengah, kasus impor dengan sesekali penyebaran sekunder kepada kontak erat telah dilaporkan di berbagai negara Eropa dan Tunisia.
en-mt: Although most laboratory confirmed cases are from the Middle East, imported cases with occasional spread secondary to close contacts have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia.

sourceString: Another secondary outbreak occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases.
targetString: Wabah sekunder lainnya terjadi di Korea Selatan pada tahun 2015 dengan 186 kasus terkonfirmasi.
en-mt: Another secondary outbreak occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases.

sourceString: Clinical manifestations of MERS resemble those of SARS, characterized by progressive acute pneumonia.
targetString: Manifestasi klinis MERS mirip dengan manifestasi klinis SARS, yang dicirikan dengan pneumonia akut progresif.
en-mt: The clinical manifestations of MERS are similar to those of SARS, which is characterized by progressive acute pneumonia.

sourceString: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS also developed acute renal failure, which is thus far unique for MERS among HCoV-caused diseases.
targetString: Tidak seperti SARS, banyak pasien MERS juga mengalami gagal ginjal akut, yang sejauh ini hanya terjadi pada MERS di antara penyakit yang disebabkan HCoV.
en-mt: Unlike SARS, many MERS patients also developed acute renal failure, which has so far only occurred in MERS among HCoV-caused diseases.

sourceString: More than 30% of patients present with gastrointestinal symptoms, such as diarrhea and vomiting.
targetString: Lebih dari 30% pasien memperlihatkan gejala gastrointestinal, seperti diare dan muntah.
en-mt: More than 30% of patients have gastrointestinal symptoms, such as diarrhea and vomiting.

sourceString: As of February 14, 2020, over 2500 laboratory confirmed cases were reported with a high case fatality of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the most devastating viruses known to humans.
targetString: Hingga 14 Februari 2020, lebih dari 2500 kasus terkonfirmasi laboratorium dilaporkan dengan kematian kasus yang tinggi, yaitu sebesar 34,4%, membuat MERS-CoV menjadi salah satu virus paling menakutkan yang dikenal oleh manusia.
en-mt: As of 14 February 2020, more than 2500 laboratory confirmed cases were reported with a high case fatality rate of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the scariest viruses known to mankind.

sourceString: During middle to late December 2019, clusters of pneumonia patients retrospectively known to be associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection were detected in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: Pada pertengahan hingga akhir Desember 2019, klaster pasien pneumonia yang secara retrospektif dikaitkan dengan infeksi SARS-CoV-2 ditemukan di Wuhan, Provinsi Hubei, Tiongkok.
en-mt: In mid to late December 2019, a cluster of pneumonia patients retrospectively associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection was found in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

sourceString: World Health Organization declared the ongoing outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern and also named the disease COVID-19.
targetString: Organisasi Kesehatan Dunia (WHO) menyatakan bahwa wabah infeksi saluran napas bawah yang sedang berlangsung dan disebabkan oleh SARS-CoV-2 sebagai Darurat Kesehatan Global serta menamai penyakit tersebut COVID-19.
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a Global Health Emergency and named the disease COVID-19.

sourceString: As of March 3, 2020, 90,053 cases have been confirmed worldwide, with a crude case fatality of 3.4%.
targetString: Hingga 3 Maret 2020, 90.053 kasus telah dikonfirmasi di seluruh dunia, dengan angka kematian kasus kasar sebesar 3,4%.
en-mt: As of 3 March 2020, 90,053 cases have been confirmed worldwide, with a crude case fatality rate of 3.4%.

sourceString: Notably, the case fatality in Hubei, China is 4.2%, whereas the one outside of it is 1.2%.
targetString: Perlu dicatat, kematian kasus di Hubei, Tiongkok, sebesar 4,2%, sementara kematian kasus di luar Hubei sebesar 1,2%.
en-mt: It should be noted, case fatalities in Hubei, China, amounted to 4.2%, while case fatalities outside Hubei were 1.2%.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 causes severe respiratory infection like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, presented as fever, cough and dyspnea.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 menyebabkan infeksi pernapasan berat seperti SARS-CoV dan MERS-CoV dengan gambaran demam, batuk, dan sesak napas.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 causes severe respiratory infections like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV with fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Diarrhea is also seen in some patients.
targetString: Diare juga dijumpai pada sejumlah pasien.
en-mt: Diarrhea was also found in a number of patients.

sourceString: Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can progress rapidly to acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Pneumonia adalah salah satu gejala paling berat dan dapat berkembang cepat menjadi sindrom gangguan napas akut.
en-mt: Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can rapidly progress to acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar due to high nucleotide sequence homology of 82%, they cluster into different branches in the phylogenetic tree.
targetString: Walaupun SARS-CoV dan SARS-CoV-2 sangat mirip karena homologi urutan nukleotida yang tinggi, sebesar 82%, keduanya mengelompok ke dalam cabang pohon filogenetik yang berbeda.
en-mt: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar due to the high nucleotide sequence homology of 82%, the two cluster into different branches of the phylogenetic tree.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is apparently less pathogenic but more transmissible compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: Patogonisitas SARS-CoV-2 jelas lebih rendah, tetapi lebih menular dibandingkan dengan SARS-CoV dan MERS-CoV.
en-mt: The pathogenicity of SARS-CoV-2 is clearly lower, but it is more infectious than SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Asymptomatic subjects infected with SARS-CoV-2 have been reported and might contribute to its rapid spreading around the world.
targetString: Subjek terinfeksi SARS-CoV-2 tanpa gejala telah dilaporkan dan mungkin berperan dalam penyebaran SARS-CoV-2 yang cepat di seluruh dunia.
en-mt: Asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infected subjects have been reported and may play a role in the rapid spread of SARS-CoV-2 worldwide.

sourceString: Comparing and contrasting SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs reveal similarities and differences of great interest.
targetString: Membandingkan dan membedakan SARS-CoV-2 dengan enam HCoV lain menunjukkan persamaan dan perbedaan yang sangat menarik.
en-mt: Comparing and contrasting SARS-CoV-2 with six other HCoVs shows very interesting similarities and differences.

sourceString: First, the incubation period and the duration of the course of HCoV disease are very similar.
targetString: Pertama, masa inkubasi dan durasi perjalanan penyakit HCoV sangat mirip.
en-mt: First, the incubation period and duration of HCoV disease course are very similar.

sourceString: In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of the other six HCoVs.
targetString: Dalam hal ini, SARS-CoV-2 mengikuti tren umum enam HCoV lainnya.
en-mt: In this respect, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of the other six HCoVs.

sourceString: Second, the severity of symptoms of COVID-19 lies between SARS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs (i.e. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).
targetString: Kedua, keparahan COVID-19 terletak di antara SARS-CoV dan empat HCoV komunitas yang lain (yakni HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, dan HCoV-NL63).
en-mt: Second, the severity of COVID-19 lies between SARS-CoV and four other community HCoVs (namely HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, and HCoV-NL63).

sourceString: On one hand, SARS-CoV-2 infection exhibits features that are more commonly seen during infection with community-acquired HCoVs, including the presentation of non-specific, mild or even no symptoms.
targetString: Di satu sisi, infeksi SARS-CoV-2 memperlihatkan gambaran yang lebih umum terlihat pada infeksi HCoV Komunitas, yang mencakup gambaran gejala nonspesifik ringan atau bahkan tanpa gejala.
en-mt: On the one hand, SARS-CoV-2 infection exhibits a more general picture than Community HCoV infection, which includes mild or even no symptoms of nonspecific symptoms.

sourceString: On the other hand, a small subset of severe cases of COVID-19 can also be seen as in the case of SARS-CoV infection, although the ratio is a bit lower.
targetString: Di sisi lain, sebagian kecil kasus COVID-19 yang parah dapat terlihat seperti infeksi SARS-CoV walaupun dengan rasio yang sedikit lebih rendah.
en-mt: On the other hand, a small proportion of severe cases of COVID-19 may look like SARS-CoV infection although at a slightly lower ratio.

sourceString: Third, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 also shows interesting patterns characteristic of both community-acquired HCoVs and SARS-CoV.
targetString: Ketiga, transmisi SARS-CoV-2 juga memperlihatkan karakteristik pola yang menarik, memiliki kemiripan dengan HCoV komunitas maupun SARS-CoV.
en-mt: Third, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 also shows an interesting characteristic pattern, having similarities with community HCoV and SARS-CoV.

sourceString: On one hand, the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 is at least as high as that of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: Di satu sisi, kemampuan transmisi SARS-CoV-2 setidaknya sama tinggi dengan HCoV komunitas.
en-mt: On the one hand, the transmission ability of SARS-CoV-2 is at least as high as that of community HCoV.

sourceString: On the other hand, it remains to be verified whether the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 decreases after passages in humans as in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: Di sisi lain, menurun tidaknya kemampuan transmisi SARS-CoV-2 setelah beberapa jalur pada manusia masih perlu diverifikasi, sebagaimana kasus SARS-CoV dan MERS-CoV.
en-mt: On the other hand, whether the transmission ability of SARS-CoV-2 has decreased after several routes to humans still needs to be verified, as is the case with SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Finally, same as the other HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 can be detected in fecal samples.
targetString: Terakhir, sama seperti HCoV lainnya, SARS-CoV-2 dapat dideteksi dari sampel feses.
en-mt: Finally, like other HCoV, SARS-CoV-2 can be detected from stool samples.

sourceString: Whether fecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2 plays an important role as in the case of SARS-CoV at least under some circumstance remains to be clarified by future studies.
targetString: Apakah transmisi SARS-CoV-2 fekal-oral berperan penting, seperti dalam kasus transmisi SARS-CoV, setidaknya pada situasi tertentu, hal itu masih harus diklarifikasi oleh studi selanjutnya.
en-mt: Whether faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2 plays an important role, as in the case of SARS-CoV transmission, at least in certain situations, remains to be clarified by future studies.

sourceString: It is also of particularly great interest to see whether SARS-CoV-2 might exhibit seasonality as in the cases of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: Hal yang juga sangat penting untuk diketahui adalah apakah SARS-CoV-2 bersifat musiman seperti pada kasus HCoV komunitas.
en-mt: It is also very important to know whether SARS-CoV-2 is seasonal like in the case of community HCoV.

sourceString: Nevertheless, the features of SARS-CoV-2 including its transmissibility, pathogenicity and sustainable spreading after passages in humans will be influential on the ultimate fate of the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19.
targetString: Bagaimana pun, gambaran SARS-CoV-2, yang mencakup kemampuan transmisi, patogenisitas, dan penyebaran berkelanjutan dalam beberapa jalur pada manusia, akan sangat berpengaruh pada nasib akhir wabah COVID-19 yang sedang berlangsung.
en-mt: However, the description of SARS-CoV-2, which includes its transmissibility, pathogenicity and sustained spread in multiple pathways in humans, will greatly influence the ultimate fate of the ongoing COVID-19 outbreak.

sourceString: All four community-acquired HCoVs causing mild symptoms have been well adapted to humans.
targetString: Empat HCoV komunitas yang menyebabkan gejala ringan semua telah beradaptasi dengan manusia.
en-mt: The four community HCoV that cause mild symptoms have all adapted to humans.

sourceString: From another perspective, it might also be true that humans have been well adapted to these four HCoVs.
targetString: Dilihat dari sudut pandang lain, dapat dikatakan manusia telah beradaptasi dengan empat HCoV ini.
en-mt: Viewed from another perspective, it can be said that humans have adapted to these four HCoV.

sourceString: In other words, both could be the survivors of ancient HCoV pandemics.
targetString: Dengan kata lain, baik HCoV maupun manusia mungkin adalah spesies penyintas pandemi HCoV zaman purba.
en-mt: In other words, both HCoV and humans may be ancient HCoV pandemic survivor species.

sourceString: HCoVs that cause severe diseases in humans and humans who developed severe HCoV diseases have been eliminated.
targetString: HCoV yang menyebabkan penyakit berat pada manusia dan manusia yang mengalami sakit HCoV berat telah musnah.
en-mt: HCoV that causes serious disease in humans and humans who are seriously ill HCoV has been eradicated.

sourceString: For this to happen, HCoVs have to replicate in humans to sufficient extent to allow the accumulation of adaptive mutations that counteract host restriction factors.
targetString: Agar hal ini terjadi, HCoV harus bereplikasi dalam manusia dalam jumlah yang memadai untuk memungkinkan akumulasi mutasi adaptif guna melawan faktor pembatasan inang.
en-mt: For this to occur, HCoV must replicate in humans in sufficient numbers to allow the accumulation of adaptive mutations to counteract host limiting factors.

sourceString: In this sense, the longer the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak persists and the more people that it infects, the greater chance that it will fully adapt to humans.
targetString: Dengan demikian, semakin lama wabah SARS-CoV-2 bertahan dan semakin banyak orang terinfeksi, semakin besar kemungkinan virus ini beradaptasi penuh dengan manusia.
en-mt: Thus, the longer the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak lasts and the more people are infected, the more likely it is for this virus to fully adapt to humans.

sourceString: If it adapts well, its transmission in humans would be difficult to stop by quarantine or other infection control measures.
targetString: Jika virus beradaptasi dengan baik, transmisinya pada manusia akan sulit dihentikan dengan karantina atau langkah pengendalian infeksi lainnya.
en-mt: If the virus is well adapted, its transmission to humans will be difficult to stop with quarantine or other infection control measures.

sourceString: For many years, the four community-acquired CoVs circulate in human populations, triggering common cold in immunocompetent subjects.
targetString: Selama bertahun-tahun, empat CoV komunitas beredar di populasi manusia dan memicu selesma pada orang yang imunokompetensi.
en-mt: Over the years, four community CoVs circulated in the human population and triggered colds in immunocompetent people.

sourceString: These viruses do not need an animal reservoir.
targetString: Virus ini tidak memerlukan reservoir hewan.
en-mt: This virus does not require an animal reservoir.

sourceString: In contrast, highly pathogenic SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have not adapted to humans well and their transmission within humans cannot be sustained.
targetString: Sebaliknya, SARS-CoV dan MERS-CoV yang sangat patogenik belum beradaptasi dengan manusia dan transmisinya dalam manusia tidak bisa dipertahankan.
en-mt: In contrast, the highly pathogenic SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have not adapted to humans and their transmission within humans is unsustainable.

sourceString: They need to maintain and propagate in their zoonotic reservoirs and seek the chance to spillover to susceptible human targets, possibly via one or more intermediate and amplifying hosts.
targetString: Keduanya harus mempertahankan diri dan melakukan pembiakan dalam reservoir zoonotik serta mencari peluang untuk menyebar ke target manusia yang rentan, kemungkinan melalui satu atau beberapa inang perantara dan pengamplifikasi.
en-mt: Both must maintain and reproduce in zoonotic reservoirs and seek opportunities to spread to susceptible human targets, possibly via one or several intermediate hosts and amplifiers.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 has features that are similar to both SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 memiliki gambaran yang mirip dengan SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV dan empat HCoV komunitas.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 has a similar picture to SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV and four community HCoVs.

sourceString: It is highly transmissible like community-acquired HCoVs, at least for the time being.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 sangat mudah ditransmisikan seperti HCoV komunitas, setidaknya sekarang ini.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is as easily transmitted as community HCoV, at least for now.

sourceString: However, it is more pathogenic than community-acquired HCoVs and less pathogenic than SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV.
targetString: Namun, SARS-CoV-2 lebih patogenik dibanding HCoV komunitas dan tidak sepatogenik SARS-CoV atau MERS-CoV.
en-mt: However, SARS-CoV-2 is more pathogenic than community HCoV and is not sepathogenic for SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It remains to be seen whether it will adapt fully to humans and circulate within humans without a reservoir or intermediate animal host.
targetString: Masih harus diamati apakah SARS-CoV-2 akan beradaptasi penuh dengan manusia dan bersirkulasi dalam manusia tanpa inang hewan reservoir atau perantara.
en-mt: It remains to be seen whether SARS-CoV-2 will fully adapt to humans and circulate within humans without a reservoir or intermediate animal host.

sourceString: Before discussing the animal origins of HCoVs, it will serve us well to discuss the definitions and characteristics of evolutionary, natural, reservoir, intermediate and amplifying hosts of HCoVs.
targetString: Sebelum membahas asal hewan HCoV, kita perlu membahas definisi dan karakteristik inang evolusioner, alami, reservoir, perantara, dan pengamplifikasi HCoV.
en-mt: Before discussing the animal origin of HCoV, we need to discuss the definition and characteristics of the evolutionary, natural hosts, reservoirs, intermediates, and amplifiers of HCoV.

sourceString: An animal serves as the evolutionary host of an HCoV if it harbours a closely related ancestor sharing high homology at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: Hewan bertindak sebagai inang evolusioner HCoV jika memiliki leluhur yang berkerabat dekat dan berbagi homologi yang tinggi di tingkat sekuens nukleotida.
en-mt: Animals act as evolutionary hosts for HCoV if they have closely related ancestors and share high homology at the nucleotide sequence level.

sourceString: The ancestral virus is usually well adapted and non-pathogenic in this host.
targetString: Virus leluhur biasanya beradaptasi dengan baik dan bersifat nonpatogenik dalam inang ini.
en-mt: Ancestral viruses are usually well adapted and nonpathogenic in these hosts.

sourceString: Likewise, a reservoir host harbours HCoV continuously and for long term.
targetString: Begitu pula, inang reservoir membawa HCoV secara berkelanjutan dan dalam kurun waktu lama.
en-mt: Similarly, reservoir hosts carry HCoV continuously and over a long period of time.

sourceString: In both cases, the hosts are naturally infected and are the natural hosts of HCoV or its parental virus.
targetString: Dalam dua kasus tersebut, inang terinfeksi secara alami dan merupakan inang alami untuk HCoV atau virus induk.
en-mt: In both cases, the host was infected naturally and is the natural host for the HCoV or mother virus.

sourceString: In contrast, if the HCoV is newly introduced to an intermediate host right before or around its introduction to humans, it is not well adapted to the new host and is often pathogenic.
targetString: Sebaliknya, jika HCoV baru masuk ke inang perantara tepat sebelum atau sekitar waktu virus masuk ke manusia, virus belum beradaptasi dengan inang baru dan sering kali bersifat patogenik.
en-mt: Conversely, if new HCoV enters an intermediate host just before or around the time the virus enters humans, the virus has not yet adapted to the new host and is often pathogenic.

sourceString: This intermediate host can serve as the zoonotic source of human infection and play the role of an amplifying host by allowing the virus to replicate transiently and then transmitting it to humans to amplify the scale of human infection.
targetString: Inang perantara ini dapat berfungsi sebagai sumber zoonotik infeksi manusia dan berperan sebagai inang pengamplifikasi dengan memungkinkan virus untuk bereplikasi secara sementara, lalu mentransmisikannya kepada manusia untuk mengamplifikasi skala infeksi manusia.
en-mt: These intermediate hosts can serve as a zoonotic source of human infection and act as amplifying hosts by allowing the virus to replicate temporarily, then transmitting it to humans to amplify the scale of human infection.

sourceString: An HCoV can undergo a dead-end infection if it cannot sustain its transmission within the intermediate host.
targetString: HCoV dapat mengalami infeksi buntu jika tidak dapat mempertahankan transmisinya dalam inang perantara.
en-mt: HCoV can develop a dead-end infection if it cannot maintain its transmission in an intermediate host.

sourceString: On the contrary, HCoVs can also adapt to the intermediate host and even establish long-term endemicity.
targetString: Sebaliknya, HCoV juga dapat beradaptasi dengan inang perantara dan bahkan menyebabkan endemisitas jangka panjang.
en-mt: Conversely, HCoV can also adapt to intermediate hosts and even cause long-term endemicity.

sourceString: In this case, the intermediate host becomes a natural reservoir host.
targetString: Dalam hal ini, inang perantara menjadi inang reservoir alami.
en-mt: In this case, the intermediate host becomes the natural reservoir host.

sourceString: Epidemiological data revealed retrospectively that the index case of SARS had a contact history with game animals.
targetString: Data epidemiologis mengungkapkan secara retrospektif bahwa kasus nol SARS memiliki riwayat kontak dengan hewan buruan.
en-mt: Epidemiological data revealed retrospectively that case zero of SARS had a history of contact with game.

sourceString: Subsequent seroprevalence investigations indicated that animal traders had a higher prevalence of anti-SARS-CoV IgG compared with that of the general population.
targetString: Penelitian seroprevalensi selanjutnya mengindikasikan bahwa penjual hewan tersebut memiliki prevalensi IgG anti-SARS-CoV yang lebih tinggi dibandingkan dengan populasi umum.
en-mt: Subsequent seroprevalence studies indicated that these pet dealers had a higher prevalence of anti-SARS-CoV IgG compared to the general population.

sourceString: Masked palm civets (Paguma larvata) and a racoon dog in live animal markets were first identified to carry SARS-CoV-like viruses that are almost identical to SARS-CoV.
targetString: Musang bulan (Paguma larvata) dan anjing rakun di pasar hewan hidup adalah yang pertama kali diidentifikasi membawa virus mirip-SARS-CoV yang hampir identik dengan SARS-CoV.
en-mt: Moon badgers (Paguma larvata) and raccoon dogs in live animal markets were the first to be identified as carrying a SARS-CoV-like virus that is almost identical to SARS-CoV.

sourceString: This was indirectly supported by the fact that no further SARS was reported after killing all civets in the markets.
targetString: Secara tidak langsung, hal ini didukung oleh fakta bahwa tidak ada lagi kasus SARS dilaporkan sejak semua musang di pasar itu dibunuh.
en-mt: Indirectly, this is supported by the fact that no further cases of SARS have been reported since all the civets in the market were killed.

sourceString: However, it has been reported that masked palm civets from the wild or farms without exposure to the live animal markets were largely negative for SARS-CoV, suggesting that masked palm civets might only serve as the intermediate amplifying host but not the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Kendati demikian, dilaporkan bahwa musang bulan dari alam liar atau peternakan yang tidak terpapar ke pasar hewan hidup tersebut sebagian besar memberi hasil uji negatif untuk SARS-CoV. Hal ini mengisyaratkan bahwa musang bulan mungkin hanya bertindak sebagai inang pengamplifikasi perantara, tetapi bukan resorvoir alami SARS-CoV.
en-mt: However, it has been reported that wild or farmed ferrets not exposed to the live animal market mostly test negative for SARS-CoV. This suggests that the moon civet may only act as an intermediate amplifying host, but not a natural absorber for SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Notably, since 80% of the different animals in the markets in Guangzhou have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, the possibilities that multiple species of small mammals might also serve as intermediate amplifying hosts of SARS-CoV cannot be excluded.
targetString: Perlu dicatat, karena 80% dari berbagai hewan di pasar Guangzhou memiliki antibodi anti-SARS-CoV, tidak dapat dikesampingkan bahwa mungkin banyak spesies mamalia kecil juga berfungsi sebagai inang pengamplifikasi perantara SARS-CoV.
en-mt: It should be noted, since 80% of the various animals in the Guangzhou market have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, it cannot be ruled out that perhaps many species of small mammals also serve as intermediate amplifying hosts for SARS-CoV.

sourceString: All of these appear to be dead-end hosts of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Semua inang ini tampaknya merupakan inang akhir SARS-CoV.
en-mt: All of these hosts appear to be the final hosts for SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Subsequent search for the natural animal host of SARS-CoV unveiled a closely related bat CoV, termed SARS-related Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), which exists in Chinese horseshoe bats.
targetString: Pencarian inang hewan alami untuk SARS-CoV selanjutnya mengungkapkan CoV kelelawar yang berkerabat dekat, yang disebut CoV kelelawar Rhinolopus kerabat-SARS HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), yang terdapat di kelelawar tapal kuda Tiongkok.
en-mt: The search for a natural animal host for SARS-CoV further revealed a closely related bat CoV, called the SARS-related bat CoV Rhinolopus HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), which is present in the Chinese horseshoe bat.

sourceString: These bats are positive for anti-SARS-CoV antibodies and genome sequence of SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.
targetString: Kelelawar ini memberi hasil uji positif untuk antibodi anti-SARS-CoV dan sekuens genom SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.
en-mt: This bat gave positive test results for anti-SARS-CoV antibodies and the SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3 genome sequence.

sourceString: This and other bat CoVs share 88-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV.
targetString: CoV ini dan CoV kelelawar lainnya berbagi homologi sekuens nukleotida 88-92% dengan SARS-CoV.
en-mt: This and other bat CoVs share 88–92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV.

sourceString: These studies have laid the foundation for the new concept that bats host emerging human pathogens.
targetString: Studi ini menjadi fondasi untuk konsep baru bahwa kelelawar adalah inang untuk patogen manusia yang baru muncul.
en-mt: This study lays the foundation for the new concept that bats are hosts for emerging human pathogens.

sourceString: Several SARS-like CoVs (SL-CoVs) have also been identified from bats, but none except for one designated WIV1 can be isolated as live virus.
targetString: Beberapa CoV mirip-SARS (SL-CoV) juga diidentifikasi dari kelelawar, tetapi hanya satu, yang diberi nama WIV1, dapat diisolasi sebagai virus hidup.
en-mt: Several SARS-like CoV (SL-CoV) were also identified from bats, but only one, designated WIV1, could be isolated as a live virus.

sourceString: Human angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is known to be the receptor of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Enzim pengubah angiotensin 2 (ACE2) diketahui merupakan reseptor SARS-CoV.
en-mt: Angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is known to be a receptor for SARS-CoV.

sourceString: WIV1 derived from fecal sample of bats was demonstrated to use bat, civet and human ACE2 as receptor for cell entry.
targetString: WIV1 yang berasal dari sampel feses kelelawar diperlihatkan menggunakan ACE2 kelelawar, musang, dan manusia sebagai reseptor untuk masuk ke dalam sel.
en-mt: WIV1 derived from bat faecal samples was shown to use bat, civet, and human ACE2 as receptors to enter cells.

sourceString: Intriguingly, sera of convalescent SARS patients were capable of neutralizing WIV1.
targetString: Hal yang menarik, serum pasien SARS konvalesen dapat menetralkan WIV1.
en-mt: Interestingly, the serum of convalescent SARS patients can neutralize WIV1.

sourceString: Thus far, WIV1 represents the most closely related ancestor of SARS-CoV in bats, sharing 95% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: Sejauh ini, WIV1 mewakili leluhur yang berkerabat paling dekat dengan SARS-CoV di kelelawar, dengan homologi sekuens nukleotida sebesar 95%.
en-mt: So far, WIV1 represents the most closely related ancestor to SARS-CoV in bats, with 95% nucleotide sequence homology.

sourceString: Albeit the high homology between these two viruses, it is generally believed that WIV1 is not the immediate parental virus of SARS-CoV and bats are not the immediate reservoir host of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Terlepas dari tingginya homologi antara dua virus ini, umumnya dipercaya bahwa WIV1 bukan virus induk langsung SARS-CoV dan kelelawar bukan inang reservoir langsung SARS-CoV.
en-mt: Despite the high homology between these two viruses, it is generally believed that WIV1 is not a direct parent virus of SARS-CoV and that bats are not direct reservoir hosts of SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis clusters MERS-CoV to the same group as bat CoV-HKU4 and bat CoV-HKU5.
targetString: Analisis filogenetik mengelompokkan MERS-CoV ke dalam kelompok yang sama dengan CoV-HKU4 kelelawar dan CoV-HKU5 kelelawar.
en-mt: Phylogenetic analysis grouped MERS-CoV into the same group as bat CoV-HKU4 and bat CoV-HKU5.

sourceString: Bat CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV utilize the same host receptor, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), for virus entry.
targetString: CoV-HKU4 kelelawar dan MERS-CoV menggunakan reseptor inang yang sama, yakni dipeptidil peptidase 4 (DPP4), sebagai jalan masuk virus.
en-mt: Bat CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV use the same host receptor, namely dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), as a pathway for virus entry.

sourceString: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase sequences of MERS-CoV are phylogenetically closer to counterparts in bat beta-CoVs identified from Europe and Africa.
targetString: Sekuens RNA polimerase tergantung-RNA MERS-CoV secara filogenetis lebih dekat dengan padanannya di beta-CoV kelelawar yang diidentifikasi dari Eropa dan Afrika.
en-mt: The MERS-CoV RNA-dependent RNA polymerase sequences are phylogenetically closer to their counterparts in bat beta-CoV identified from Europe and Africa.

sourceString: Up to now, no live MERS-CoV can be found in wild bats.
targetString: Hingga saat ini, belum ada MERS-CoV hidup ditemukan dalam kelelawar liar.
en-mt: To date, no live MERS-CoV has been found in wild bats.

sourceString: MERS-CoV and its closest relative bat CoV-HKU25 share only 87% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: MERS-CoV dan kerabat terdekatnya CoV-HKU25 kelelawar hanya berbagi 87% homologi sekuens nukleotida.
en-mt: MERS-CoV and its closest relative bat CoV-HKU25 share only 87% nucleotide sequence homology.

sourceString: Thus, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: Karena itu, kelelawar mungkin bukan inang reservoir langsung MERS-CoV.
en-mt: Therefore, bats may not be direct reservoir hosts for MERS-CoV.

sourceString: On the other hand, studies in Middle East have shown that dromedary camels are seropositive for MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies, same as camels of Middle East origin in multiple African countries.
targetString: Di sisi lain, studi di Timur Tengah menunjukkan bahwa unta Arab memberi hasil seropositif untuk antibodi spesifik yang menetralkan MERS-CoV, sama seperti unta asal Timur Tengah di beberapa negara Afrika.
en-mt: On the other hand, studies in the Middle East show that Arabian camels give seropositive results for specific antibodies that neutralize MERS-CoV, the same as camels from the Middle East in several African countries.

sourceString: Live MERS-CoV identical to the virus found in humans was isolated from the nasal swabs of dromedary camels, further indicating that camels serve as the bona fide reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: MERS-CoV hidup yang identik dengan virus yang ditemukan di manusia diisolasi dari usap nasal unta Arab. Hal ini mengindikasikan lebih lanjut bahwa unta adalah inang reservoir yang sebenarnya untuk MERS-CoV.
en-mt: Live MERS-CoV identical to viruses found in humans was isolated from the nasal swabs of Arabian camels. This further indicates that camels are the true reservoir host for MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It is also noteworthy that generally mild symptoms but massive virus shedding were observed in camels experimentally infected with MERS-CoV.
targetString: Hal yang juga penting diperhatikan bahwa peluruhan virus masif dengan gejala yang biasanya ringan teramati pada unta percobaan yang diinfeksi dengan MERS-CoV.
en-mt: It is also important to note that massive viral shedding with usually mild symptoms was observed in experimental camels infected with MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Notably, infected camels shed viruses not only through respiratory route but also through fecal-oral route, which is also the main route for virus shedding from bats.
targetString: Perlu dicatat, unta yang terinfeksi meluruhkan virus bukan hanya melalui rute pernapasan, tetapi juga melalui rute fekal-oral, yang juga merupakan rute utama peluruhan virus dari kelelawar.
en-mt: Of note, infected camels shed virus not only via the respiratory route, but also via the faecal-oral route, which is also the main route of viral shedding from bats.

sourceString: However, questions still remain since many confirmed cases of MERS have no contact history with camels prior to symptom onset, plausibly ascribed to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unrecognized animal species that harbour MERS-CoV.
targetString: Meski demikian, pertanyaan masih belum terjawab sebab banyak kasus MERS terkonfirmasi tidak memiliki riwayat kontak dengan unta sebelum awitan gejala, kemungkinan akibat transmisi manusia-ke-manusia atau rute transmisi tidak diketahui yang melibatkan spesies hewan tidak dikenal yang membawa MERS-CoV.
en-mt: However, questions remain unanswered because many confirmed MERS cases have no history of contact with camels prior to the onset of symptoms, possibly due to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unknown animal species carrying MERS-CoV.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 shares 96.2% nucleotide homology with a bat CoV RaTG13 isolated from Rhinolophus affinis bats.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 berbagi 96,2% homologi nukleotida dengan CoV kelelawar RaTG13 yang diisolasi dari kelelawar Rhinolophus affinis.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 shares 96.2% nucleotide homology with the bat CoV RaTG13 isolated from the bat Rhinolophus affinis.

sourceString: As in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is too great to assign parental relationship.
targetString: Seperti pada kasus SARS-CoV dan MERS-CoV, perbedaan sekuens antara SARS-CoV-2 dan RaTG13 terlalu besar untuk menetapkan hubungan induk.
en-mt: As in the case of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence differences between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 were too great to establish a parental link.

sourceString: That is to say, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host(s) of SARS-CoV-2 unless almost identical bat CoVs are found in future.
targetString: Dengan kata lain, kelelawar mungkin bukan inang reservoir langsung SARS-CoV-2, kecuali jika CoV kelelawar yang hampir identik ditemukan di kemudian hari.
en-mt: In other words, bats may not be direct reservoir hosts for SARS-CoV-2, unless a nearly identical bat CoV is found at a later date.

sourceString: Presumably, the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2 should be among the wildlife species sold and killed at the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, with which many of the initial cases of COVID-19 were associated, indicative of a probable animal-to-human transmission event.
targetString: Kemungkinan, inang hewan perantara SARS-CoV-2 ada di antara spesies satwa liar yang dijual dan dibunuh di Pasar Grosir Makanan Laut Huanan. Banyak kasus awal COVID-19 terkait dengan pasar ini, yang mengindikasikan kemungkinan terjadinya transmisi hewan-ke-manusia.
en-mt: It is likely that the intermediate animal host for SARS-CoV-2 is among the wildlife species being sold and killed at the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market. Many of the early cases of COVID-19 were linked to this market, indicating the possibility of animal-to-human transmission.

sourceString: Several recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing have suggested that a group of endangered small mammals known as pangolins (Manis javanica) could also harbour ancestral beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Beberapa studi terbaru berdasarkan sekuensi metagenomik menunjukkan bahwa sekelompok mamalia kecil yang terancam punah, dikenal sebagai trenggiling (Manis javanica), juga mungkin membawa beta-CoV leluhur yang berkerabat dengan SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Several recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing suggest that an endangered group of small mammals, known as pangolins (Manis javanica), may also carry an ancestral beta-CoV related to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: These novel pangolin CoV genomes share 85-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Genom CoV trenggiling baru ini berbagi 85-92% homologi sekuens nukleotida dengan SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: The novel pangolin CoV genome shares 85–92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, they are equally closely related to RaTG13 with about 90% identity at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: Namun, CoV tersebut berkerabat sama dekat dengan RaTG13 dengan kesamaan sebesar 90% pada tingkat sekuens nukleotida.
en-mt: However, the CoV is equally closely related to RaTG13 with a similarity of 90% at the nucleotide sequence level.

sourceString: They cluster into two sub-lineages of SARS-CoV-2-like viruses in the phylogenetic tree, one of which share a more similar receptor binding domain (RBD) with SARS-CoV-2, with 97.4% amino acid sequence identity.
targetString: Keduanya dikelompokkan ke dalam dua subgaris-keturunan virus mirip SARS-CoV-2 dalam pohon filogenetik, salah satu berbagi domain pengikatan reseptor (RBD) yang lebih mirip dengan SARS-CoV-2, dengan kesamaan sekuens asam amino sebesar 97,4%.
en-mt: Both are grouped into two SARS-CoV-2-like virus sublineages in the phylogenetic tree, one of which shares a more similar receptor binding domain (RBD) to SARS-CoV-2, with an amino acid sequence similarity of 97.4%.

sourceString: In stark contrast, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 are more divergent, albeit a higher degree of sequence homology genome-wide.
targetString: Hal yang mencolok, RBD SARS-CoV-2 dan RaTG13 lebih jauh berbeda, walaupun tingkat homologi sekuens seluruh genom lebih tinggi.
en-mt: Strikingly, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 are more widely dissimilar, despite a higher degree of whole-genome sequence homology.

sourceString: An earlier study on diseased pangolins also reported the detection of viral contigs from lung samples, which turn out to be similarly related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Studi sebelumnya pada trenggiling yang sakit juga melaporkan deteksi contig virus dari sampel paru, yang ternyata juga berkerabat dengan SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Previous studies on sick pangolins also reported the detection of contig virus from lung samples, which turned out to be related to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: This study adopted different assembly methods and manual curation to generate a partial genome sequence comprising about 86.3% of the full-length viral genome.
