targetString: Surat kabar Italia La Stampa mengutip "sumber politik tingkat tinggi" anonim yang mengatakan bahwa 80 persen bantuan Rusia "tidak berguna atau sedikit gunanya bagi Italia."
en-mt: Italian newspaper La Stampa quoted an anonymous "high-level political source" as saying that 80 percent of Russian aid was "of no or little use to Italy."

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: Sumber itu menuduh Rusia melakukan serangan pesona "geopolitik dan diplomatik".
en-mt: The source accused Russia of carrying out a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm attack.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: Presiden Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, dan Menteri Luar Negeri Italia Luigi Di Maio mengabaikan laporan media tersebut dan mengungkapkan rasa terima kasih mereka.
en-mt: Lombardy President Attilio Fontana and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio ignored the media reports and expressed their gratitude.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: Rusia juga mengirim pesawat kargo berisi bantuan medis ke Amerika Serikat.
en-mt: Russia also sent cargo planes filled with medical aid to the United States.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: Juru bicara Kremlin Dmitry Peskov mengatakan bahwa "ketika menawarkan bantuan kepada rekan-rekan di AS, [Putin] berasumsi bahwa jika produsen peralatan dan bahan medis AS mendapatkan kesempatan, mereka juga akan dapat membalas jika diperlukan."
en-mt: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US counterparts, [Putin] assumes that if US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials get the chance, they will also be able to reciprocate if needed."

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: Latihan militer NATO "Defender 2020" yang direncanakan di Jerman, Polandia, dan negara-negara Baltik, yakni latihan perang NATO terbesar sejak akhir Perang Dingin, akan diadakan pada skala lebih kecil.
en-mt: The planned NATO military exercise "Defender 2020" in Germany, Poland and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war games since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a smaller scale.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: Sekretaris Jenderal Kampanye Perlucutan Senjata Nuklir Kate Hudson mengkritik latihan Defender 2020: "Dalam krisis kesehatan publik saat ini, latihan ini bukan hanya membahayakan nyawa pasukan AS dan banyak negara Eropa yang berpartisipasi, tetapi juga penduduk negara tempat mereka beroperasi."Pemerintah Iran terdampak sangat berat oleh virus ini, dengan sekitar dua lusin anggota parlemen terinfeksi beserta lima belas tokoh politik saat ini atau sebelumnya.
en-mt: Secretary-General of the Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercises: "In the current public health crisis, these exercises endanger not only the lives of US troops and many European countries participating, but also the residents of the countries in which they operate." The Iranian government has been hit hard. by the virus, with around two dozen MPs infected along with fifteen current or former political figures.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: Pada 14 Maret 2020, Presiden Iran Hassan Rouhani menulis surat terbuka kepada para pemimpin dunia untuk meminta bantuan dan mengatakan bahwa negaranya kesulitan memerangi wabah karena kurangnya akses ke pasar internasional sebagai akibat dari sanksi Amerika Serikat terhadap Iran. Wabah ini telah mendorong seruan kepada Amerika Serikat untuk mengadopsi kebijakan sosial yang umum di negara-negara kaya lainnya, mencakup perawatan kesehatan universal, perawatan anak universal, cuti keluarga berbayar, dan tingkat pendanaan yang lebih tinggi untuk kesehatan masyarakat.
en-mt: On March 14, 2020, Iranian President Hassan Rouhani wrote an open letter to world leaders asking for help and said that his country was having a hard time fighting the outbreak due to the lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States' sanctions on Iran. The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common to other wealthy nations, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of public health funding.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: Analis politik menduga hal itu dapat berdampak negatif pada peluang Donald Trump untuk terpilih kembali dalam pemilihan presiden 2020. Hubungan diplomatik antara Jepang dan Korea Selatan memburuk karena pandemi ini.
en-mt: Political analysts suspect it could negatively impact Donald Trump's chances of being re-elected in the 2020 presidential election. Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea have deteriorated due to the pandemic.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: Korea Selatan mengkritik "upaya karantina Jepang yang ambigu dan pasif" setelah Jepang mengumumkan bahwa setiap orang yang datang dari Korea Selatan akan ditempatkan dalam karantina dua minggu di lokasi yang ditunjuk pemerintah.
en-mt: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced that anyone arriving from South Korea would be placed in a two-week quarantine at a government-designated location.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Awalnya, pandangan masyarakat Korea Selatan terbagi berkaitan respons Presiden Moon Jae-in terhadap krisis ini.
en-mt: Initially, the views of the South Korean public were divided regarding President Moon Jae-in's response to this crisis.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: Banyak warga Korea menandatangani petisi, baik menyerukan pemakzulan Moon, berdasarkan klaim mereka tentang kesalahan pemerintah dalam menangani wabah, maupun memuji tanggapannya. Pandemi telah memungkinkan banyak negara untuk menanggapi dengan mengeluarkan undang-undang darurat.
en-mt: Many Koreans signed the petition, both calling for Moon's impeachment, based on their claims of the government's mishandling of the outbreak, and praising his response. The pandemic has allowed many countries to respond by passing emergency laws.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: Beberapa komentator menyatakan keprihatinan bahwa hal itu dapat memungkinkan pemerintah untuk memperkuat cengkeramannya atas kekuasaan.
en-mt: Some commentators expressed concern that it could allow the government to tighten its grip on power.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: Di Hungaria, parlemennya memilih untuk mengizinkan Perdana Menteri, Viktor Orbán, untuk memerintah melalui dekret tanpa batas waktu, menangguhkan parlemen dan pemilihan umum, serta menghukum orang yang dianggap menyebarkan informasi palsu tentang virus dan penanganan krisis oleh pemerintah.
en-mt: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the Prime Minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspending parliament and general elections, and punishing people it perceives as spreading false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: Wabah koronavirus dituding atas kasus kekurangan pasokan, yang berasal dari peningkatan penggunaan peralatan secara global untuk melawan wabah, pembelian karena panik, dan gangguan operasi pabrik dan logistik.
en-mt: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for a supply shortage, stemming from increased use of equipment globally to fight the outbreak, panic buying and disruption to factory and logistics operations.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: Badan Pengawas Obat dan Makanan Amerika Serikat mengeluarkan peringatan tentang kekurangan obat-obatan dan peralatan medis karena meningkatnya permintaan konsumen dan gangguan pemasok.
en-mt: The United States Food and Drug Administration issued a warning about shortages of medicines and medical devices due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruptions.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: Beberapa daerah juga mengalami pembelian karena panik yang mengakibatkan kekosongan kebutuhan pokok, seperti makanan, tisu toilet, dan air botolan, yang memicu kekurangan pasokan.
en-mt: Some areas also experienced panic buying which resulted in a shortage of basic necessities, such as food, toilet paper and bottled water, triggering supply shortages.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: Secara khusus, industri teknologi telah memperingatkan tentang keterlambatan pengiriman barang elektronik.
en-mt: In particular, the tech industry has warned about delays in shipping electronics.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: Menurut direktur jenderal WHO Tedros Adhanom, permintaan untuk alat pelindung diri meningkat 100 kali lipat.
en-mt: According to WHO director general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protective equipment has increased 100 times.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Permintaan ini menyebabkan peningkatan harga hingga dua puluh kali lipat harga normal serta memicu penundaan pasokan barang medis selama empat hingga enam bulan.
en-mt: This demand led to price hikes of up to twenty times the normal price as well as triggering delays in the supply of medical goods for four to six months.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: Hal ini juga menyebabkan kekurangan alat pelindung diri di seluruh dunia, dan WHO memperingatkan bahwa ini akan membahayakan tenaga kesehatan.
en-mt: It has also led to a worldwide shortage of personal protective equipment, and WHO warns that this will put health workers at risk.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Di Australia, pandemi memberikan peluang baru bagi pembeli daigou untuk menjual produk Australia di dalam Tiongkok.
en-mt: In Australia, the pandemic is providing new opportunities for daigou buyers to sell Australian products within China.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Kegiatan ini mengakibatkan kelangkaan susu formula di beberapa supermarket dan akhirnya dilarang oleh pemerintah Australia. Terlepas dari tingginya prevalensi kasus COVID-19 di Italia Utara dan wilayah Wuhan, serta tingginya permintaan akan produk makanan, dua area tersebut terhindar dari kekurangan bahan makanan.
en-mt: This activity resulted in a shortage of formula milk in some supermarkets and was eventually banned by the Australian government. Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, as well as the high demand for food products, the two areas are spared from food shortages.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: Langkah-langkah Tiongkok dan Italia dalam melawan penimbunan dan perdagangan ilegal produk penting berhasil sehingga kekurangan makanan akut yang diantisipasi akan terjadi di Eropa dan Amerika Utara dapat dihindarkan.
en-mt: China's and Italy's measures against the hoarding and illegal trade of essential products succeeded in avoiding the acute food shortages anticipated in Europe and North America.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: Italia Utara, dengan produksi pertaniannya yang berjumlah besar, belum mengalami penurunan berarti, tetapi harga dapat meningkat menurut perwakilan industri.
en-mt: Northern Italy, with its large amount of agricultural production, has not seen a significant decline, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: Rak makanan kosong hanya dijumpai sementara, bahkan di kota Wuhan, seiring pejabat pemerintah Tiongkok melepas cadangan daging babi untuk memastikan kecukupan gizi masyarakat.
en-mt: Empty food shelves were only seen temporarily, even in the city of Wuhan, as Chinese government officials released pork reserves to ensure adequate nutrition for the people.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: Undang-undang serupa juga ada di Italia, yang mewajibkan produsen makanan untuk menyimpan cadangan untuk keadaan darurat seperti ini.
en-mt: A similar law exists in Italy, which requires food manufacturers to keep reserves for emergencies like this.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: Kemerosotan ekonomi global telah dirasakan di Tiongkok: menurut laporan media pada 16 Maret, ekonomi di Tiongkok sangat terpukul dalam dua bulan pertama tahun 2020 akibat langkah-langkah yang diambil pemerintah untuk menahan penyebaran virus, dan penjualan ritel anjlok sebesar 20,5%.
en-mt: The global economic downturn has been felt in China: according to media reports on March 16, China's economy took a huge hit in the first two months of 2020 due to measures taken by the government to contain the spread of the virus, and retail sales plunged by 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: Karena Tiongkok daratan adalah pusat ekonomi dan manufaktur besar, wabah virus dianggap menyebabkan ancaman destabilisasi besar terhadap ekonomi global.
en-mt: As mainland China is a major economic and manufacturing hub, the virus outbreak is considered to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Agathe Demarais dari Economist Intelligence Unit memperkirakan bahwa pasar akan tetap bergejolak hingga ada gambaran yang lebih jelas tentang potensi hasil akhir.
en-mt: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit predicts that the market will remain volatile until there is a clearer picture of the potential outcome.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: Pada Januari 2020, beberapa analis memperkirakan bahwa dampak kejatuhan ekonomi akibat epidemi pada pertumbuhan global dapat melampaui wabah SARS tahun 2002-2004.
en-mt: In January 2020, some analysts predicted that the impact of the economic fallout from the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002-2004 SARS outbreak.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: Sebuah estimasi dari ahli di Universitas Washington di St. Louis menyatakan wabah memberi dampak lebih dari $300 miliar pada rantai pasokan dunia, yang dapat bertahan hingga dua tahun.
en-mt: An estimate from experts at the University of Washington in St. Louis said the outbreak had an impact of more than $300 billion on the world's supply chains, which could last up to two years.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: Organisasi Negara-Negara Pengekspor Minyak Bumi (OPEC) dilaporkan "kucar-kacir" setelah harga minyak bumi mengalami penurunan tajam akibat berkurangnya permintaan dari Tiongkok.
en-mt: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) was reportedly "in disarray" after the price of crude oil fell sharply due to reduced demand from China.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: Pada 24 Februari, pasar saham global jatuh karena kenaikan signifikan jumlah kasus COVID-19 di luar Tiongkok daratan.
en-mt: On February 24, global stock markets plunged due to a significant increase in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: Pada 27 Februari, karena meningkatnya kekhawatiran tentang wabah koronavirus, berbagai indeks saham AS, yang mencakup NASDAQ-100, Indeks S&P 500, dan Dow Jones Industrial Average, mencatat penurunan tertajam sejak 2008, dengan Dow jatuh 1.191 poin, penurunan satu hari terbesar sejak krisis keuangan tahun 2007–2008.
en-mt: On February 27, due to growing concerns about the coronavirus outbreak, various US stock indexes, which include the NASDAQ-100, S&P 500 Index, and Dow Jones Industrial Average, recorded their steepest decline since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, its biggest one-day drop since the crisis. financial year 2007–2008.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: Tiga indeks saham tersebut menutup minggu dengan penurunan lebih dari 10%.
en-mt: The three stock indexes closed the week with losses of more than 10%.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: Pada 28 Februari, Scope Ratings GmbH menegaskan peringkat kredit pemerintah Tiongkok, tetapi mempertahankan Outlook Negatif.
en-mt: On February 28, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained the Negative Outlook.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: Saham anjlok lagi karena kekhawatiran akan koronavirus, penurunan terbesar terjadi pada 16 Maret.
en-mt: Stocks plunged again on coronavirus fears, the biggest drop coming on March 16.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: Banyak orang berpikir resesi ekonomi mungkin terjadi.
en-mt: Many people think an economic recession is possible.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: Ekonom Mohamed El-Erian memuji langkah darurat bank sentral dan negara bagian yang tepat waktu.
en-mt: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised the timely emergency measures of the central bank and states.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: Bank sentral bereaksi lebih cepat dibandingkan yang mereka lakukan pada saat krisis moneter tahun 2008.
en-mt: Central banks reacted more quickly than they did during the 2008 financial crisis.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: Pariwisata adalah salah satu sektor yang terdampak paling parah karena larangan perjalanan, penutupan tempat umum termasuk tempat wisata, dan tindakan pemerintah yang membatasi perjalanan di seluruh dunia.
en-mt: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closures of public places including tourist attractions, and government actions that restrict travel around the world.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: Sebagai akibatnya, banyak maskapai membatalkan penerbangan karena sedikitnya permintaan, termasuk British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, dan Qantas, sementara maskapai regional Inggris Flybe runtuh.
en-mt: As a result, many airlines canceled flights due to poor demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines and Qantas, while British regional carrier Flybe collapsed.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: Dampak pada industri jalur pelayaran berada pada tingkat yang belum pernah terlihat sebelumnya.
en-mt: The impact on the cruise line industry is at a level never seen before.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: Beberapa stasiun kereta api dan pelabuhan feri juga telah ditutup.
en-mt: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: Epidemi bertepatan dengan Chunyun, musim perjalanan utama yang berkaitan dengan liburan Tahun Baru Imlek.
en-mt: The epidemic coincided with Chunyun, the main travel season related to the Lunar New Year holiday.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: Sejumlah acara yang melibatkan banyak orang dibatalkan oleh pemerintah pusat dan daerah, termasuk festival Tahun Baru Imlek tahunan, dan perusahaan swasta juga secara mandiri menutup toko dan tempat wisata, seperti Hong Kong Disneyland dan Shanghai Disneyland.
en-mt: Several events involving large numbers of people were canceled by the central and local governments, including the annual Chinese New Year festival, and private companies also independently closed shops and tourist attractions, such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: Banyak acara Tahun Baru Imlek dan tempat wisata ditutup untuk mencegah pertemuan massal, mencakup Kota Terlarang di Beijing dan pameran kuil tradisional.
en-mt: Many Chinese New Year events and tourist attractions were closed to prevent mass gatherings, including Beijing's Forbidden City and traditional temple fairs.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: Di 24 dari 31 provinsi, kotamadya, dan wilayah Tiongkok, pihak berwenang memperpanjang liburan Tahun Baru hingga 10 Februari dan memerintahkan sebagian besar tempat kerja untuk tidak dibuka kembali sampai tanggal tersebut.
en-mt: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and territories, authorities extended the New Year holidays until February 10 and ordered most workplaces not to reopen until that date.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: Wilayah-wilayah ini merupakan penghasil 80% PDB negara dan 90% ekspor.
en-mt: These regions account for 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: Hong Kong meningkatkan penanggulangan penyakit menular ke tingkat tertinggi dan mengumumkan keadaan darurat, menutup sekolah hingga Maret, dan membatalkan perayaan Tahun Baru. Sektor ritel terdampak secara global karena pengurangan jam kerja atau penutupan sementara.
en-mt: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease control to the highest level and declared a state of emergency, closing schools until March and canceling New Year's celebrations. The retail sector has been impacted globally due to reduced working hours or temporary closures.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: Kunjungan ke pengecer di Eropa dan Amerika Latin menurun sebesar 40%.
en-mt: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America decreased by 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: Pengecer Amerika Utara dan Timur Tengah mengalami penurunan 50–60%.
en-mt: North American and Middle Eastern retailers saw 50–60% declines.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: Hal ini juga mengakibatkan penurunan 33-43% lalu lintas pejalan kaki ke pusat perbelanjaan di bulan Maret dibandingkan dengan bulan Februari.
en-mt: This also resulted in a 33-43% decrease in foot traffic to shopping centers in March compared to February.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: Operator pusat perbelanjaan di seluruh dunia memberlakukan langkah-langkah tambahan, seperti peningkatan sanitasi, pemasangan pemindai termal untuk memeriksa suhu pembeli, dan pembatalan acara. Menurut perkiraan Komisi Ekonomi PBB untuk Amerika Latin, resesi yang disebabkan pandemi dapat menyebabkan orang yang berada dalam kemiskinan ekstrem di Amerika Latin bertambah antara 14 dan 22 juta orang dibandingkan situasi tanpa pandemi.
en-mt: Shopping center operators around the world are imposing additional measures, such as increased sanitation, installing thermal scanners to check shoppers' temperatures, and canceling events. According to estimates by the United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America, a recession caused by the pandemic could leave Latin America in extreme poverty between 14 and 22 million more than without the pandemic.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: Pada bulan Januari dan Februari 2020, selama puncak epidemi di Wuhan, sekitar 5 juta orang di Tiongkok kehilangan pekerjaan.
en-mt: In January and February 2020, during the peak of the epidemic in Wuhan, around 5 million people in China lost their jobs.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: Sebagian besar dari 300 juta pekerja migran pedesaan Tiongkok terlantar di rumah di provinsi pedalaman atau terperangkap di provinsi Hubei. Pada Maret 2020, lebih dari 10 juta orang Amerika kehilangan pekerjaan dan mengajukan permohonan bantuan pemerintah.
en-mt: Most of China's 300 million rural migrant workers are either stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province. In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government assistance.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: Menurut perkiraan Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis, wabah koronavirus dapat menyebabkan hilangnya 47 juta pekerjaan di Amerika Serikat dan tingkat pengangguran dapat mencapai 32%. Karantina wilayah di India menyebabkan puluhan juta pekerja migran India (yang dibayar melalui upah harian) menganggur. Survei dari Angus Reid Institute menemukan bahwa 44% rumah tangga di Kanada mengalami semacam hilang pekerjaan. Hampir 900.000 pekerja kehilangan pekerjaan di Spanyol sejak diberlakukannya karantina wilayah pada pertengahan Maret 2020.
en-mt: According to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis, the coronavirus outbreak could cause the loss of 47 million jobs in the United States and the unemployment rate could reach 32%. India's lockdown has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (paid through daily wages) unemployed. A survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of households in Canada have experienced some form of job loss. Nearly 900,000 workers have lost their jobs in Spain since the lockdown was imposed in mid-March 2020.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: Selama paruh kedua bulan Maret, sebanyak 4 juta pekerja Prancis mengajukan tunjangan pengangguran sementara dan 1 juta pekerja Inggris mengajukan skema kredit universal. Hampir setengah juta perusahaan di Jerman mengajukan skema kerja jangka pendek disubsidi pemerintah untuk pegawainya, yang disebut Kurzarbeit.
en-mt: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme. Nearly half a million companies in Germany apply for a government-subsidized short-term employment scheme for their employees, called Kurzarbeit.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: Skema kompensasi kerja jangka pendek Jerman diadopsi oleh Prancis dan Inggris.
en-mt: The German short-term work compensation scheme was adopted by France and Britain.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: Di seluruh dunia, sektor seni pertunjukan dan warisan budaya terdampak sangat besar oleh pandemi, yang memengaruhi pengoperasian organisasi serta individu, baik yang dipekerjakan maupun yang mandiri.
en-mt: Across the world, the performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been hit hard by the pandemic, affecting the operations of organizations and individuals, both employed and independent.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: Organisasi sektor seni dan budaya berusaha untuk menjunjung tinggi misi mereka (yang seringkali didanai publik) untuk memberikan akses warisan budaya kepada masyarakat, menjaga keselamatan karyawan dan masyarakat, dan mendukung seniman jika memungkinkan.
en-mt: Arts and culture sector organizations strive to uphold their mission (which is often publicly funded) to provide access to cultural heritage to the public, keep employees and the public safe, and support artists where possible.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: Pada Maret 2020, di seluruh dunia dan pada tingkat yang berbeda-beda, museum, perpustakaan, tempat pertunjukan, dan lembaga budaya lainnya ditutup tanpa batas waktu, dengan pameran, acara, dan pertunjukannya dibatalkan atau ditunda.
en-mt: In March 2020, around the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues and other cultural institutions were closed indefinitely, with their exhibitions, events and shows being canceled or postponed.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: Sebagai tanggapan, upaya intensif dikerahkan untuk memberikan layanan alternatif melalui platform digital. Dampak merugikan lain penyakit ini yang terbaru dan sangat cepat berkembang adalah pembatalan layanan keagamaan, acara olahraga besar, dan acara sosial lainnya, seperti festival musik dan konser, konferensi teknologi, serta peragaan busana.
en-mt: In response, intensive efforts were made to provide alternative services through digital platforms. Another recent and rapidly growing adverse effect of this disease is the cancellation of religious services, major sporting events and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences and fashion shows.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: Industri film juga mengalami gangguan. Vatikan mengumumkan bahwa perayaan Pekan Suci di Roma, yang jatuh pada minggu terakhir musim pertobatan Kristen Prapaskah, dibatalkan.
en-mt: The film industry also experienced disruptions. The Vatican announced that Holy Week celebrations in Rome, which falls in the last week of the Lenten season of Christian conversions, were cancelled.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: Banyak keuskupan menganjurkan lansia Kristen untuk tinggal di rumah dan tidak menghadiri Misa pada hari Minggu; beberapa gereja menyediakan layanan gereja melalui radio, siaran langsung daring atau televisi, sementara yang lain menawarkan ibadah drive-in atau lantatur.
en-mt: Many dioceses encourage older Christians to stay home and not attend Mass on Sundays; some churches provide church services via radio, live online or television, while others offer drive-in or dive services.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: Dengan ditutupnya gereja dan kapel oleh Keuskupan Katolik Roma serta dikosongkannya Lapangan Santo Petrus dari para peziarah Kristen, badan-badan keagamaan lainnya juga membatalkan layanan dan membatasi pertemuan publik di gereja, masjid, sinagoga, kuil, dan gurdwara.
en-mt: With the closure of churches and chapels by the Roman Catholic Diocese and St. Peter's Square emptying of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies have also canceled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: Kementerian Kesehatan Iran mengumumkan pembatalan salat Jumat di daerah yang terdampak wabah dan tempat-tempat ibadah kemudian ditutup, sementara Arab Saudi melarang masuknya peziarah asing serta penduduknya ke tempat-tempat suci di Mekah dan Madinah.
en-mt: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and places of worship subsequently closed, while Saudi Arabia banned entry of foreign pilgrims and residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: Pandemi ini menyebabkan gangguan paling signifikan terhadap kalender olahraga sedunia sejak Perang Dunia Kedua.
en-mt: This pandemic caused the most significant disruption to the world sporting calendar since the Second World War.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: Kebanyakan acara olahraga besar dibatalkan atau ditunda, termasuk Liga Champions UEFA 2019-2020, Liga Premier 2019-2020, UEFA Euro 2020, NBA musim 2019-2020, dan NHL musim 2019-2020.
en-mt: Most major sporting events have been canceled or postponed, including the 2019-2020 UEFA Champions League, 2019-2020 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019-2020 NBA season and 2019-2020 NHL season.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: Wabah ini mengacaukan rencana Olimpiade Musim Panas 2020, yang awalnya dijadwalkan akan dimulai pada akhir Juli; Komite Olimpiade Internasional mengumumkan pada 24 Maret bahwa acara tersebut akan "dijadwal ulang hingga setelah 2020, tetapi tidak akan lebih dari musim panas 2021."Di seluruh dunia, kasino dan tempat permainan lainnya ditutup dan siaran langsung turnamen poker ditunda atau dibatalkan.
en-mt: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; The International Olympic Committee announced on March 24 that the event would be "rescheduled for after 2020, but no later than the summer of 2021."Around the world, casinos and other gaming venues were closed and live telecasts of poker tournaments were postponed or cancelled.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: Hal ini menyebabkan banyak penjudi berpindah ke judi daring, banyak situs judi daring melaporkan peningkatan pendaftaran baru yang signifikan. Industri hiburan juga telah terpengaruh, dengan berbagai grup musik menunda atau membatalkan tur konser.
en-mt: This caused many gamblers to switch to online gambling, many online gambling sites reported a significant increase in new registrations. The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various bands delaying or canceling concert tours.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: Banyak teater besar seperti Broadway juga menunda semua pertunjukan.
en-mt: Many major theaters such as Broadway have also suspended all showings.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: Seniman mengeksplorasi berbagai cara untuk terus menghasilkan dan berbagi karya melalui internet sebagai alternatif untuk pertunjukan langsung tradisional, seperti konser siaran langsung daring atau membuat "festival" berbasis web bagi para seniman untuk tampil, menyebarkan, dan mempublikasikan karya mereka.
en-mt: Artists are exploring ways to continue to produce and share work via the internet as an alternative to traditional live performances, such as live online concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, share, and publish their work.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: Banyak meme Internet bertema koronavirus disebarkan daring dengan banyaknya orang yang beralih ke humor dan pengalih perhatian di tengah ketidakpastian.
en-mt: Many coronavirus-themed Internet memes are being shared online with many turning to humor and distraction amidst the uncertainty.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: Sejak merebaknya wabah COVID-19, teramati adanya peningkatan prasangka, xenofobia, dan rasisme terhadap orang keturunan Tionghoa dan Asia Timur, serta terhadap orang dari wilayah yang terdampak di Eropa, Amerika Serikat, dan negara-negara lain.
en-mt: Since the outbreak of the COVID-19 outbreak, there has been an increase in prejudice, xenophobia and racism against people of Chinese and East Asian descent, as well as towards people from affected regions in Europe, the United States and other countries.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: Insiden ketakutan, kecurigaan, dan permusuhan teramati di banyak negara, terutama di Eropa, Asia Timur, Amerika Utara, dan wilayah Asia-Pasifik.
en-mt: Incidents of fear, suspicion and hostility were observed in many countries, especially in Europe, East Asia, North America and the Asia-Pacific region.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: Laporan dari bulan Februari (ketika mayoritas kasus masih terbatas di Tiongkok) mencatat sentimen rasis yang diungkapkan dalam berbagai grup di seluruh dunia bahwa orang Tionghoa pantas menerima virus atau menerima hal yang mereka klaim sebagai ganjaran yang setimpal.
en-mt: Reports from February (when the majority of cases were still confined to China) noted racist sentiments expressed in groups around the world that Chinese people deserved the virus or received what they claimed to be repaid in kind.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: Beberapa negara di Afrika juga mengalami peningkatan sentimen anti-Tiongkok.
en-mt: Several countries in Africa have also experienced an increase in anti-China sentiment.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: Banyak penduduk Wuhan dan Hubei melaporkan diskriminasi karena asal daerah mereka.
en-mt: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei report discrimination because of their regional origins.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: Sudah ada dukungan untuk orang Tionghoa, baik daring maupun luring, dan untuk orang-orang di daerah yang terdampak virus.
en-mt: There is already support for Chinese people, both online and offline, and for people in areas impacted by the virus.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: Menyusul perkembangan wabah ke negara-negara hotspot baru, orang dari Italia, negara pertama di Eropa yang mengalami wabah serius COVID-19, juga bisa menjadi sasaran kecurigaan dan xenofobia. Warga di negara-negara mencakup Malaysia, Selandia Baru, Singapura, dan Korea Selatan pada awalnya menandatangani petisi untuk melarang orang Tionghoa memasuki negara mereka dalam upaya untuk menghentikan penyakit.
en-mt: Following the spread of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also become targets of suspicion and xenophobia. Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore and South Korea initially signed petitions to ban Chinese from entering their countries in a bid to stop the disease.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: Di Jepang, tagar #ChineseDontComeToJapan menjadi tren di Twitter.
en-mt: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan is trending on Twitter.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: Orang Tionghoa serta orang Asia lainnya di Inggris Raya dan Amerika Serikat melaporkan peningkatan tingkat pelecehan rasis dan penyerangan.
en-mt: Chinese as well as other Asian people in the UK and the US are reporting increasing rates of racist harassment and assault.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: Presiden AS Donald Trump dikritik karena menyebut koronavirus sebagai "Virus Tiongkok", istilah yang oleh para kritikus dianggap rasis dan anti-Tiongkok.
en-mt: US President Donald Trump has been criticized for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term critics see as racist and anti-China.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: Para pengunjuk rasa di Ukraina menyerang bus-bus yang membawa orang Ukraina dan orang asing yang dievakuasi dari Wuhan ke Novi Sanzhary.
en-mt: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainians and foreigners evacuated from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Siswa yang berasal dari India Timur Laut, yang berbatasan dengan Tiongkok, dan belajar di kota-kota besar India dilaporkan mengalami pelecehan terkait wabah koronavirus.
en-mt: Students hailing from Northeast India, which borders China, and studying in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: Presiden Partai Bharatiya Janata unit negara bagian di Benggala Barat Dilip Ghosh menyatakan bahwa Tiongkok telah menghancurkan alam dan "itulah sebabnya Tuhan membalas dendam kepada mereka."
en-mt: West Bengal state unit Bharatiya Janata Party President Dilip Ghosh stated that China has destroyed nature and "that is why God is taking revenge on them."

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: Pernyataan itu kemudian dikecam oleh konsulat Tiongkok di Kolkata, dengan menyebutnya "keliru".Di Tiongkok, xenofobia dan rasisme terhadap penduduk non-Tionghoa berkobar karena pandemi, dengan orang asing digambarkan sebagai "sampah asing" dan ditargetkan untuk "pembuangan".
en-mt: The statement was later denounced by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous". In China, xenophobia and racism towards non-Chinese residents has flared due to the pandemic, with foreigners being described as "foreign scum" and targeted for "disposal".

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: Banyak surat kabar yang menggunakan penyekatan berbayar telah menghapusnya untuk sebagian atau semua liputan koronavirus mereka.
en-mt: Many newspapers that used paid insulation have removed it for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: Banyak penerbit ilmiah membuat makalah ilmiah terkait wabah tersedia dengan akses terbuka.
en-mt: Many scientific publishers are making scientific papers related to the outbreak available in open access.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: Beberapa ilmuwan memilih untuk membagikan hasilnya dengan cepat di server pracetak, seperti bioRxiv.
en-mt: Some scientists prefer to share their results quickly on preprint servers, such as bioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: Penyakit menular baru – Penyakit infeksi patogen yang baru muncul, sering kali baru dalam jangkauan wabah atau metode penularannya
en-mt: New infectious disease – A newly emerging infectious disease pathogen, often new in scope of outbreak or method of transmission

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: Globalisasi dan penyakit - Tinjauan globalisasi dan penularan penyakit
en-mt: Globalization and disease - An overview of globalization and disease transmission

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: Daftar epidemi dan pandemi - Daftar korban jiwa karena penyakit menular
en-mt: Epidemic and pandemic lists - Lists of fatalities due to communicable diseases

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: Penyelundupan satwa liar dan zoonosis - Risiko kesehatan yang terkait dengan perdagangan satwa liar eksotis
en-mt: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses - Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: Pengujian laboratorium untuk penyakit pernapasan koronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) dan virus SARS-CoV-2 mencakup metode yang mendeteksi keberadaan virus dan yang mendeteksi antibodi yang diproduksi sebagai respons terhadap infeksi.
en-mt: Laboratory testing for the coronavirus respiratory disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of the virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: Keberadaan virus dalam sampel dikonfirmasi dengan RT-PCR, yang mendeteksi RNA koronavirus.
en-mt: The presence of virus in the sample is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects coronavirus RNA.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Pengujian ini spesifik dan dirancang untuk mendeteksi RNA virus SARS-CoV-2 semata.
en-mt: This test is specific and designed to detect only the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: Pengujian ini digunakan untuk mengonfirmasi infeksi baru atau masih aktif.
en-mt: This test is used to confirm a new or active infection.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: Deteksi antibodi (serologi) dapat digunakan untuk diagnosis dan surveilans populasi.
en-mt: Antibody detection (serology) can be used for diagnosis and population surveillance.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: Uji antibodi menunjukkan jumlah orang yang sudah tertular, mencakup orang yang gejalanya terlalu ringan untuk dilaporkan atau yang tanpa gejala.
en-mt: Antibody tests show the number of people who have been infected, including people whose symptoms are too mild to report or who are asymptomatic.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: Angka mortalitas penyakit yang akurat dan tingkat kekebalan kelompok dalam populasi dapat ditentukan dari hasil uji ini.
en-mt: Accurate disease mortality rates and herd immunity levels in the population can be determined from the results of this test.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: Karena pengujian terbatas, hingga Maret 2020, belum ada negara yang memiliki data andal tentang prevalensi virus dalam populasinya.
en-mt: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020, no country has reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in its population.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: Hingga 23 Maret, belum ada negara yang menguji lebih dari 3% populasinya, dan ada variasi besar dalam jumlah pengujian yang telah dilakukan negara-negara.
en-mt: As of March 23, no country has tested more than 3% of its population, and there is wide variation in the number of tests countries have carried out.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: Variabilitas ini mungkin juga memengaruhi secara signifikan angka fatalitas kasus yang dilaporkan, yang kemungkinan besar dihitung terlalu tinggi di beberapa negara.
en-mt: This variability may also significantly influence reported case-fatality rates, which are likely to be overestimated in some countries.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: Menggunakan reaksi rantai polimerase transkripsi balik real-time (rRT-PCR), uji ini dapat dilakukan pada sampel pernapasan yang diperoleh dengan berbagai metode, termasuk usap nasofaring atau sampel sputum.
en-mt: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), this test can be performed on respiratory samples obtained by a variety of methods, including nasopharyngeal swabs or sputum samples.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: Umumnya, hasil tersedia dalam beberapa jam hingga dua hari.
en-mt: Generally, results are available within a few hours to two days.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: Uji RT-PCR yang dilakukan pada usap tenggorokan hanya dapat diandalkan pada minggu pertama penyakit.
en-mt: The RT-PCR test performed on a throat swab is only reliable in the first week of illness.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: Nantinya, virus bisa menghilang di tenggorokan selagi terus bereplikasi di paru.
en-mt: Later, the virus can disappear in the throat while continuing to replicate in the lungs.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: Sebagai alternatif, untuk orang terinfeksi yang diuji pada minggu kedua, bahan sampel dapat diambil dari saluran napas dalam dengan menggunakan kateter isap atau bahan yang dikeluarkan melalui batuk (sputum) dapat digunakan.
en-mt: Alternatively, for infected persons who are tested in the second week, sample material can be collected from the deep airway using a suction catheter or material coughed up (sputum) can be used.

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: Salah satu uji PCR awal dikembangkan di Charité, Berlin, pada Januari 2020 menggunakan reaksi rantai polimerase transkripsi balik real-time (rRT-PCR), dan membentuk setidaknya 250.000 alat uji untuk didistribusikan oleh Organisasi Kesehatan Dunia (WHO).
en-mt: One of the initial PCR assays was developed at Charité, Berlin, in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and constituted at least 250,000 assays for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: Inggris Raya juga mengembangkan pengujian pada 23 Januari 2020.Perusahaan Korea Selatan Kogenebiotech mengembangkan alat pendeteksi SARS-CoV-2 berbasis PCR (PowerChek Coronavirus) yang bertaraf klisnis pada 28 Januari 2020.
en-mt: The United Kingdom also developed a test on January 23, 2020. South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical-grade PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on January 28, 2020.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: Perangkat ini mencari gen "E" yang dimiliki semua beta koronavirus, dan gen RdRp yang spesifik untuk SARS-CoV-2.Di Tiongkok, BGI Group adalah salah satu perusahaan pertama yang menerima persetujuan penggunaan darurat dari Administrasi Produk Medis Nasional Tiongkok untuk alat pendeteksi SARS-CoV-2 berbasis PCR. Di Amerika Serikat, Pusat Pengendalian dan Pencegahan Penyakit (CDC) mendistribusikan Panel Diagnostik RT-PCR Real-Time Koronavirus Baru 2019 (2019-nCoV) ke laboratorium kesehatan masyarakat melalui International Reagent Resource.
en-mt: The device looks for the “E” gene that all beta coronaviruses share, and the RdRp gene that is specific for SARS-CoV-2. In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from the China National Medical Products Administration for a SARS detection kit. PCR-based CoV-2. In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing the 2019 New Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health laboratories through the International Reagent Resource.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: Satu dari tiga uji genetik di alat uji versi lama memberikan hasil yang tidak meyakinkan karena kesalahan reagen, dan jumlah pengujian di CDC di Atlanta terbatas; hal ini mengakibatkan rata-rata kurang dari 100 sampel per hari berhasil diproses sepanjang Februari 2020.
en-mt: One in three genetic tests on older assays yields inconclusive results due to reagent errors, and the number of tests at the CDC in Atlanta is limited; this resulted in an average of less than 100 samples per day being successfully processed throughout February 2020.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: Pengujian menggunakan dua komponen dianggap tidak dapat diandalkan hingga 28 Februari 2020, dan baru setelah itu laboratorium negara bagian dan laboratorium lokal diizinkan untuk melakukan pengujian.
en-mt: Tests using two components were deemed unreliable until February 28, 2020, and only then were state and local laboratories authorized to perform the test.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: Uji ini disetujui oleh Badan Pengawas Obat dan Makanan Amerika Serikat berdasarkan Otorisasi Penggunaan Darurat. Laboratorium komersial AS mulai melakukan pengujian pada awal Maret 2020.
en-mt: This test was approved by the United States Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization. US commercial labs started testing in early March 2020.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: Per 5 Maret 2020, LabCorp mengumumkan ketersediaan pengujian COVID-19 berbasis RT-PCR pada skala nasional.
en-mt: As of March 5, 2020, LabCorp announced the availability of RT-PCR-based COVID-19 testing on a national scale.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Begitu pula, Quest Diagnostics membuat pengujian COVID-19 tersedia secara nasional pada 9 Maret 2020.
en-mt: Likewise, Quest Diagnostics made COVID-19 testing available nationwide on March 9, 2020.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: Tidak ada batasan kuantitas yang diumumkan; pengumpulan dan pemrosesan spesimen harus dilakukan sesuai dengan persyaratan CDC.
en-mt: No quantity limit has been announced; Collection and processing of specimens must be carried out in accordance with CDC requirements.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: Di Rusia, uji COVID-19 dikembangkan dan diproduksi oleh Pusat Riset Negara Bagian Virologi dan Bioteknologi VECTOR.
en-mt: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the VECTOR State Research Center for Virology and Biotechnology.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Pada 11 Februari 2020, uji tersebut didaftarkan oleh Layanan Federal untuk Surveilans dalam Perawatan Kesehatan. Pada 12 Maret 2020, Mayo Clinic dilaporkan mengembangkan uji untuk mendeteksi infeksi COVID-19. Pada 13 Maret 2020, Roche Diagnostics menerima persetujuan FDA untuk pengujian yang dapat dilakukan dalam waktu 3,5 jam dengan volume tinggi sehingga satu mesin dapat melakukan sekitar 4.128 pengujian dalam waktu 24 jam.
en-mt: On February 11, 2020, the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Health Care. On March 12, 2020, the Mayo Clinic was reported to be developing a test to detect COVID-19 infection. On March 13, 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for high-volume testing that can be performed within 3.5 hours, allowing one machine to perform approximately 4,128 tests in 24 hours.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: Pada 19 Maret 2020, FDA mengeluarkan otorisasi penggunaan darurat (EUA) kepada Abbott Laboratories untuk pengujian pada sistem m2000 Abbott; FDA sebelumnya telah mengeluarkan otorisasi yang sama kepada Hologic, LabCorp, dan Thermo Fisher Scientific.
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for testing on Abbott's m2000 system; The FDA has previously issued the same authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: Pada 21 Maret 2020, Cepheid juga menerima EUA dari FDA untuk pengujian yang memakan waktu sekitar 45 menit.
en-mt: On March 21, 2020, Cepheid also received an EUA from the FDA for testing which took approximately 45 minutes.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA telah menyetujui pengujian yang menggunakan teknologi amplifikasi asam nukleat isotermal yang bukan PCR.
en-mt: The FDA has approved assays that use isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: Karena tidak memerlukan serangkaian siklus pergantian suhu, metode ini dapat memberikan hasil positif hanya dalam waktu lima menit dan hasil negatif dalam 13 menit.
en-mt: Because it does not require a series of temperature change cycles, this method can give a positive result in as little as five minutes and a negative result in 13 minutes.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: Saat ini ada sekitar 18.000 mesin ini di AS dan Abbott mengantisipasi untuk meningkatkan produksi hingga menghasilkan 50.000 uji per hari. Uji yang menggunakan antibodi monoklonal yang secara spesifik mengikat protein nukleokapsid (protein N) koronavirus baru sedang dikembangkan di Taiwan, dengan harapan dapat memberikan hasil dalam waktu 15 hingga 20 menit seperti uji influenza cepat.
en-mt: There are currently approximately 18,000 of these machines in the US and Abbott anticipates increasing production to 50,000 tests per day. A test using a monoclonal antibody that specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (protein N) of the new coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope of providing results within 15 to 20 minutes like the rapid influenza test.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: Sebuah tinjauan pustaka yang diterbitkan pada Maret 2020 menyimpulkan bahwa "foto toraks memiliki nilai diagnostik yang kecil pada tahap awal, sememtara temuan CT [tomografi terkomputasi] mungkin sudah ada sebelum awitan gejala."
en-mt: A review of the literature published in March 2020 concluded that "thoracic radiographs are of little diagnostic value in the early stages, while CT [computed tomography] findings may predate the onset of symptoms."

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: Fitur khas pada CT termasuk opasitas ground-glass multilobar bilateral dengan distribusi perifer, asimetri, dan posterior.
en-mt: Distinctive features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacity with a peripheral, asymmetric, and posterior distribution.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: Dominasi subpleura, crazy paving, dan konsolidasi terbentuk seiring perkembangan penyakit.
en-mt: Subpleural predominance, crazy paving, and consolidation develop as the disease progresses.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: Di Wuhan, sebuah studi yang membandingkan PCR dengan CT di titik asal pandemi saat ini menunjukkan bahwa CT secara signifikan lebih sensitif daripada PCR, meskipun kurang spesifik, dengan banyak fitur pencitraan tumpang tindih dengan pneumonia dan proses penyakit lainnya.
en-mt: In Wuhan, a study comparing PCR to CT at the point of origin of the current pandemic demonstrated that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, although less specific, with many imaging features overlapping with pneumonia and other disease processes.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: Pada Maret 2020, American College of Radiology merekomendasikan "CT tidak boleh digunakan untuk penapisan atau sebagai uji lini pertama dalam mendiagnosis COVID-19."Pada Maret 2020, CDC merekomendasikan PCR untuk penapisan awal.
en-mt: In March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommended "CT should not be used for screening or as a first-line test in diagnosing COVID-19." In March 2020, the CDC recommended PCR for initial screening.

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: Bagian dari respons imun terhadap infeksi adalah pembentukan antibodi yang mencakup IgM dan IgG.
en-mt: Part of the immune response to infection is the formation of antibodies which include IgM and IgG.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: Hal ini dapat digunakan untuk mendeteksi infeksi pada individu sejak sekitar 7 hari setelah awitan gejala, untuk menentukan imunitas terhadap penyakit, dan dalam surveilans populasi. Pemeriksaan dapat dilakukan di laboratorium pusat (CLT) atau dengan pengujian point-of-care (PoCT).
en-mt: It can be used to detect infection in individuals as early as 7 days after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity to disease, and in population surveillance. Testing can be done in a central laboratory (CLT) or with point-of-care testing (PoCT).

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: Sistem otomatis dengan hasil tinggi di banyak laboratorium klinis akan dapat melakukan pemeriksaan ini, tetapi ketersediaannya akan tergantung pada tingkat produksi untuk setiap sistem.
en-mt: High-yield automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these checks, but availability will depend on production rates for each system.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: Untuk CLT, umumnya digunakan satu spesimen darah perifer, meskipun serangkaian spesimen dapat digunakan untuk mengikuti respon imun.
en-mt: For CLT, a single peripheral blood specimen is generally used, although a series of specimens may be used to follow the immune response.

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: Untuk PoCT, umumnya digunakan satu spesimen darah perifer yang diperoleh melalui tusukan kulit.
en-mt: For PoCT, a single peripheral blood specimen obtained by skin puncture is generally used.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: Tidak seperti metode PCR, langkah ekstraksi tidak diperlukan sebelum pemeriksaan. Pada 26 Maret 2020, FDA menyebutkan 29 lembaga yang menyediakan pemberitahuan kepada agensi sebagaimana diperlukan dan karena itu kini dapat mendistribusikan uji antibodi mereka.
en-mt: Unlike the PCR method, an extraction step is not required prior to testing. As of March 26, 2020, the FDA identified 29 agencies that provided notifications to the agency as required and can therefore now distribute their antibody tests.

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: Pada 7 April 2020, hanya satu uji yang telah disetujui oleh FDA berdasarkan otorisasi penggunaan darurat. Pada akhir Maret 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics dan Epitope Diagnostics mendapat persetujuan Eropa untuk alat uji mereka yang dapat mendeteksi antibodi IgG dan IgA terhadap virus dalam sampel darah.
en-mt: As of April 7, 2020, only one test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization. In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approval for their assay that can detect IgG and IgA antibodies to the virus in blood samples.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
