sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Namun, dunia tidak dapat diprediksi saat ini, dan entah Anda perlu merawat orang terkasih, berbelanja kebutuhan pokok, atau pergi ke dokter, kesejahteraan Anda adalah prioritas kami.
en-mt: However, today's world is unpredictable, and whether you need to look after loved ones, shop for essentials, or visit the doctor, your well-being is our priority.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Kami tidak memantau waktu kerja Anda.
en-mt: We do not monitor your work time.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Jika Anda sakit, jangan bekerja.
en-mt: If you are sick, don't work.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Hal ini seharusnya tidak perlu dikatakan, tetapi kami mengatakannya.
en-mt: This should go without saying, but we say it.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: Cuti sakit atau PTO tidak diperlukan, cukup beri tahu manajer Anda dan bantu tim Anda merevisi kalender dan jadwal untuk memastikan bidang-bidang kerja yang utama dapat diselesaikan.
en-mt: No sick leave or PTO needed, just notify your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to ensure key areas of work get completed.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Jika Anda didiagnosis positif menderita COVID-19, harap beri tahu Bryan di dalam T&C Ops agar T&C dapat membantu dengan dukungan dan memastikan situasi Anda mendapat perhatian yang tepat dari manajemen).
en-mt: (If you are diagnosed with positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan know in T&C Ops so T&C can help with support and ensure your situation gets proper attention from management).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Rekan-rekan yang upahnya berbasis jam akan dibayar penuh.
en-mt: Associates who are paid on an hourly basis will be paid in full.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Kami telah mengatakannya, dan mengatakannya sekali lagi, untuk menghormati komitmen kami kepada rekan kontraktor dan staf berbasis jam.
en-mt: We have said it, and said it again, to honor our commitments to our hour-based co-contractors and staff.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Semua orang akan dibayar berdasarkan jam kerja mereka biasa ketika keadaan normal.
en-mt: Everyone will be paid based on their usual hours worked under normal circumstances.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Hal ini termasuk jika Anda sakit dan tidak bisa bekerja.
en-mt: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Jika Anda mau bekerja, kami mendukung Anda.
en-mt: If you're willing to work, we've got your back.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Banyak orang menggunakan pekerjaan sebagai cara menyalurkan stres terhadap dunia di sekitar kita.
en-mt: Many people use work as a way of channeling stress into the world around us.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Pekerjaan yang kita lakukan bisa sangat memberi kepuasan, terutama di masa-masa seperti ini.
en-mt: The work we do can be very fulfilling, especially in times like these.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Sekali lagi, hal yang terutama adalah menjaga diri Anda.
en-mt: Again, the most important thing is to take care of yourself.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Permintaan kami adalah Anda berkomunikasi dengan manajer Anda sehingga kami tahu hal yang harus diantisipasi dan dapat mengambil tindakan yang sesuai.
en-mt: Our request is that you communicate with your manager so that we know what to anticipate and can take appropriate action.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Pekerjaan tertentu dianggap esensial.
en-mt: Certain jobs are considered essential.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Ada beberapa pekerjaan yang harus terus berjalan.
en-mt: There is some work that must go on.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: SRE, Operasi SDM, Kepercayaan & Keamanan, serta tim Penggalangan Dana, antara lain, melakukan pekerjaan penting yang mungkin memerlukan dukungan tambahan.
en-mt: SRE, HR Operations, Trust & Security, and Fundraising teams, among others, do important work that may require additional support.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Kita akan memulai proses dengan semua departemen untuk menilai tujuan saat ini dan mengalihkan fokus kita untuk mendukung hal yang esensial untuk misi kita.
en-mt: We will begin a process with all departments to assess current goals and shift our focus to supporting what is essential to our mission.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Ada banyak yang harus dilakukan bagi kita semua, kita hanya akan berfokus penuh pada proyek yang paling esensial.
en-mt: There is much to be done for all of us, we will only focus fully on the most essential projects.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Memperlambat saat ini tidak akan apa-apa untuk masa depan.
en-mt: Slowing down now would do nothing for the future.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Kita tidak berencana untuk "kerja lembur mengejar ketinggalan" setelah pandemi ini berlalu.
en-mt: We do not plan to "work overtime catch-up" after this pandemic is over.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Anda tidak akan diharapkan bekerja lembur untuk memenuhi tenggat waktu yang tidak realistis saat ini.
en-mt: You won't be expected to work overtime to meet today's unrealistic deadlines.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Kami menyadari bahwa situasi berubah dan akan berupaya untuk menetapkan target dan garis waktu baru jika perlu.
en-mt: We recognize that situations change and will work to set new targets and timelines if necessary.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Bagaimana dengan APP (Perencanaan Tahunan)?
en-mt: What about APP (Annual Planning)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Untuk menyesuaikan dengan kenyataan baru dan ekspektasi jam kerja harian, kami bermaksud untuk menyesuaikan garis waktu untuk pelaksanaan Rencana Tahunan 2020-2021.
en-mt: In order to adapt to the new realities and expectations of daily working hours, we intend to adjust the timeline for the implementation of the 2020-2021 Annual Plan.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Maksud kami adalah untuk mengusulkan perpanjangan rencana 2019-2020 yang memungkinkan lebih banyak waktu untuk membuat anggaran sehingga karyawan dapat memprioritaskan pekerjaan yang penting, perawatan diri, dan perawatan orang terkasih sambil mengakomodasi mereka yang perlu atau ingin bekerja dengan jadwal lebih sedikit selama beberapa minggu ke depan.
en-mt: Our intention is to propose an extension of the 2019-2020 plan to allow more time for budgeting so employees can prioritize important work, self-care, and care of loved ones while accommodating those who need or want to work smaller schedules over the next few weeks. .

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Perpanjangan garis waktu ini sangat mengurangi beban kerja dan tekanan perencanaan saat ini di seluruh organisasi.
en-mt: This timeline extension greatly reduces the current workload and planning pressure across the organization.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Kami akan menyampaikan proposal kami kepada Dewan minggu depan dan akan memperbarui delegasi dan tim pada langkah selanjutnya segera setelah kami mendapat konfirmasi.
en-mt: We will present our proposal to the Council next week and will update the delegation and team on next steps as soon as we have confirmation.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Terima kasih tim APP untuk kepemimpinan Anda dalam hal ini.
en-mt: Thank you APP team for your leadership in this matter.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Status, paparan, dan pembersihan kantor
en-mt: Office status, exposure and cleaning

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Minggu lalu, kami diberi tahu bahwa salah satu rekan kita yang berbasis di SF mungkin telah terpapar virus COVID-19.
en-mt: Last week, we were notified that one of our colleagues based in SF may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Namun, karena sangat khawatir, kami mempekerjakan kru pembersih antivirus untuk mendisinfeksi semua permukaan di kantor San Francisco.
en-mt: However, because we were so concerned, we hired an anti-virus cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in our San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Mereka menggunakan cairan antivirus bertaraf rumah sakit untuk mendisinfeksi setiap permukaan, lobi, dan semua lift yang mengakses lantai kita.
en-mt: They use hospital grade antivirus to disinfect every surface, lobby and all elevators that access our floors.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Pihak gedung menerapkan protokol pemastian keselamatannya sendiri dengan menggunakan produk yang mendukung keselamatan penyewanya.
en-mt: The building applies its own safety assurance protocol by using products that support the safety of its tenants.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Kami merasa senang bahwa kantor akan siap dipakai ketika kita memutuskan untuk kembali.
en-mt: We were delighted that the office would be ready for use when we decided to return.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Kantor DC kita terletak di WeWork, yang telah membagikan protokol COVID-19 kepada kita dan semua anggota staf yang berbasis di DC.
en-mt: Our DC office is located at WeWork, which has shared COVID-19 protocols with us and all DC-based staff members.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Mulai minggu lalu, kantor DC kita telah pindah ke tatanan kerja jarak jauh penuh, sejalan dengan panduan yang dibagikan dengan San Francisco.
en-mt: Starting last week, our DC office has moved to a full remote work arrangement, in line with guidance shared with San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Seperti diketahui oleh beberapa rekan kita yang berbasis di NYC, kami juga sedang mendiskusikan tentang menyewa lokasi di Brooklyn.
en-mt: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we are also discussing renting a location in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Diskusi ini masih berlanjut, tetapi mungkin akan tertunda.
en-mt: This discussion is still ongoing, but may be delayed.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Beberapa rekan kita bekerja dari jarak jauh untuk pertama kalinya.
en-mt: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Rekan kita yang sudah lama bekerja jarak jauh menyadari bahwa hal itu mungkin perlu penyesuaian dan mereka ingin memberi saran kepada Anda:
en-mt: Our colleagues who have worked remotely for a long time recognize that it may need some adjustments and they would like to advise you:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Batasi durasi rapat paling lama satu atau dua jam.
en-mt: Limit the duration of the meeting to an hour or two at most.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Jika sesi yang lebih lama diperlukan, pertimbangkan cara membaginya menjadi beberapa hari.
en-mt: If longer sessions are needed, consider how to break them up over multiple days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Definisikan rapat dengan jelas, buat agenda, dan kirim bahan bacaan sebelumnya.
en-mt: Clearly define the meeting, create an agenda, and send out reading materials ahead of time.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Jadikan video sebagai default, dengan alat seperti Google Docs dan Zoom untuk memfasilitasi kolaborasi dan koneksi langsung.
en-mt: Set video as the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate collaboration and live connection.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Tunjuk pemimpin untuk memfasilitasi setiap rapat, seseorang untuk memantau obrolan untuk pertanyaan dan mencatat daftar pembicara, dan seseorang untuk membantu membuat catatan rapat (atau lakukan pembuatan catatan kolaboratif).
en-mt: Designate a leader to facilitate each meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and record the list of speakers, and someone to help take meeting notes (or do collaborative note-taking).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Kirim email ke dukungan teknis jika Anda membutuhkan headset yang nyaman.
en-mt: Email tech support if you need a comfortable headset.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Gunakan kompensasi kesejahteraan Anda untuk membeli makanan kecil.
en-mt: Use your welfare compensation to buy snacks.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Bergabunglah dengan saluran #remoties di Slack untuk berbicara dengan rekan tentang pekerjaan yang dibagikan
en-mt: Join the #remoties channel on Slack to talk to colleagues about shared work

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Tim Operasi SDM sedang mencari pedoman ergonomi berbasis webinar untuk mendukung peningkatan pekerjaan yang didistribusikan di seluruh Yayasan.
en-mt: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidelines to support improving work distributed across the Foundation.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Minggu belakangan ini kami meminta semua penerima dana hibah komunitas untuk membatalkan acara publik yang didanai Wikimedia, seperti Edit-a-thon, hingga WHO menyatakan pandemi telah berakhir.
en-mt: This past week we asked all community grantees to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as an Edit-a-thon, until the WHO declares the pandemic over.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Kami memberi tahu mereka bahwa kami memahami permintaan kami untuk pembatalan dan pembatasan lainnya dapat membuat mereka tidak mungkin menyelesaikan kegiatan hibah yang disetujui dan bahwa tidak ada yang akan diberi pinalti karena harus menunda atau memodifikasi sasaran tersebut.
en-mt: We let them know that we understand our requests for cancellations and other restrictions may make it impossible for them to complete their approved grant activities and that no one will be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Minggu mendatang ini kami akan menindaklanjuti dengan panduan tambahan tentang Wikimania dan konferensi komunitas regional dan tematik lainnya.
en-mt: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Secara umum, sentimen dari seluruh komunitas global tampaknya berupa kesedihan akibat gangguan ini, tetapi sekaligus lega atas kejelasan dan kemampuan untuk berfokus pada komunitasnya sendiri, baik Wikimedia maupun yang lain.
en-mt: In general, the sentiment across the global community appears to be one of sadness at the interruption, but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on one's own community, both Wikimedia and beyond.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Ke depan, CRT sedang berupaya untuk menyiapkan halaman di Meta-Wiki untuk menyediakan ruang bagi komunitas untuk memantau dampak dan mengikuti komunikasi kami dengan mereka.
en-mt: Going forward, CRT is working on setting up a page on the Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor impact and follow our communications with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Tetap terhubung selama situasi COVID-19
en-mt: Stay connected during the COVID-19 situation

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Kami akan mengirimkan undangan ke kalender Anda untuk Kamis mendatang, pukul 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT untuk rapat staf khusus.
en-mt: We'll send an invite to your calendar for this coming Thursday, at 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Kami akan menggunakan waktu ini untuk membagikan pembaruan tambahan, menjawab pertanyaan Anda, dan meluangkan waktu untuk saling terhubung.
en-mt: We'll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions, and take the time to connect.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Kita sama-sama berada dalam situasi ini dan kami ingin membantu sebisa kami.
en-mt: We are all in this situation and we want to help as much as we can.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Sementara itu, Anda dapat terus mendapatkan informasi dari email ini dan semua informasi esensial terkait COVID-19 lainnya di Office Wiki.
en-mt: In the meantime, you can stay informed of this email and all other essential information regarding COVID-19 on the Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT akan terus memperbarui halaman ini dan memastikan semua informasi ada di satu tempat.
en-mt: CRT will constantly update this page and make sure all the information is in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Kami juga berupaya menjaga komunikasi rutin dengan staf yang tinggal di negara-negara yang saat ini terdampak secara signifikan.
en-mt: We are also working to maintain regular communication with staff living in countries currently significantly affected.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan tentang perjalanan, acara, alur kerja utama, atau kesulitan mengenai liputan, atau hal lain yang mungkin memerlukan bantuan, jangan ragu untuk memberi tahu dan bekerja sama dengan CRT.
en-mt: If you have any questions about travel, events, key workflows, or difficulties with coverage, or anything else you might need assistance with, don't hesitate to let CRT know and work.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Kami ada di sini untuk membantu memberikan dukungan dan menjadi penghubung sesuai kebutuhan.
en-mt: We are here to help provide support and serve as a contact as needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Jika Anda memiliki masalah rahasia atau sensitif, silakan kirimkan email kepada Bryan Judan, Direktur Operasi Global SDM Internasional.
en-mt: If you have a confidential or sensitive concern, please email Bryan Judan, HR International Director of Global Operations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Jangan ada satu pun perubahan ini dilihat sebagai pengabaian pekerjaan dan kewajiban kita.
en-mt: Never should any of these changes be seen as a neglect of our jobs and obligations.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Sebaliknya, perubahan ini merupakan pengakuan bahwa, saat ini, pekerjaan dan kewajiban kita mungkin perlu diadaptasi dalam cara yang belum pernah kita lakukan sebelumnya.
en-mt: Rather, these changes are an acknowledgment that, today, our jobs and obligations may need to be adapted in ways we have not previously done.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Perubahan ini adalah langkah-langkah yang kami yakini penting untuk saling mendukung dalam situasi ini sehingga kita dapat terus bekerja, menyediakan dukungan yang diperlukan gerakan kita, dan memberi dunia layanan yang mereka andalkan.
en-mt: These changes are steps that we believe are important to support each other in this situation so that we can continue to work, providing the support our movements need, and providing the world with the services they depend on.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Pekerjaan yang kita rencanakan sebelumnya akan ada di sana menanti kita ketika waktunya tiba.
en-mt: The work we planned beforehand will be there waiting for us when the time comes.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Untuk sekarang, inilah waktunya untuk saling mendukung dan menciptakan ruang untuk pekerjaan penting yang akan datang dalam beberapa minggu dan mungkin beberapa bulan ke depan.
en-mt: For now, it's time to support each other and create space for the important work to come in the weeks and maybe months.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Kami membutuhkan Anda semua untuk mewujudkannya, untuk itu, kami ingin Anda mengurus diri Anda dan keluarga Anda supaya Anda dapat bekerja sebaik-baiknya saat dibutuhkan.
en-mt: We need all of you to make this happen, for that, we want you to take care of yourselves and your families so that you can do your best work when needed.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Akhirnya, mohon cuci tangan Anda dan jangan sentuh wajah Anda!
en-mt: Finally, please wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, dan Tony S), dan anggota Tim Kepemimpinan lainnya (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, dan Toby N).
en-mt: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and other members of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V , Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: b'Enzim pengubah angiotensin 2 (ACE2) adalah enzim yang melekat pada permukaan luar sel (membran sel) di paru, arteri, jantung, ginjal, dan usus.
en-mt: b'Angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface of cells (cell membranes) in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidneys, and intestines.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 memiliki aktivitas yang berlawanan dengan enzim pengonversi angiotensin (ACE), dengan mengurangi jumlah angiotensin-II dan meningkatkan Angiotensin (1-7), sehingga membuatnya menjadi target obat yang menjanjikan untuk mengobati penyakit kardiovaskular. ACE2 juga berfungsi sebagai titik masuk ke dalam sel untuk beberapa koronavirus.
en-mt: ACE2 has opposite activity to the angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE), by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing the amount of Angiotensin (1-7), thereby making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular disease. ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: ACE2 versi manusia sering disebut sebagai hACE2.
en-mt: The human version of ACE2 is often referred to as hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: Enzim pengoversi angiotensin 2 adalah metaloenzim mengandung seng yang terletak di permukaan sel endotel dan sel lainnya.
en-mt: Angiotensin converting enzyme 2 is a zinc-containing metalloenzyme that is located on the surface of endothelial cells and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: Protein ACE2 memiliki domain M2 peptidase terminal-N dan domain transporter asam amino renal collectrin terminal-C.
en-mt: The ACE2 protein has an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 adalah protein membran pelewat tunggal tipe I, dengan domain aktif secara enzimatik terpapar pada permukaan sel di paru dan jaringan lainnya.
en-mt: ACE2 is a type I single-passer membrane protein, with an enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in the lung and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: Domain ekstrasel ACE2 dipisahkan dari domain transmembran oleh enzim lain, yang dikenal sebagai sheddase, dan protein terlarut yang dihasilkan dilepaskan ke dalam aliran darah dan akhirnya diekskresi ke dalam urin.
en-mt: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is separated from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme, known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the bloodstream and eventually excreted in the urine.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 ada di sebagian besar organ: ACE2 melekat pada membran sel terutama sel alveolar paru tipe II, enterosit usus kecil, sel endotel arteri dan vena, dan sel otot polos arteri di sebagian besar organ.
en-mt: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to cell membranes especially pulmonary type II alveolar cells, small intestinal enterocytes, arterial and venous endothelial cells, and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: Ekspresi mRNA ACE2 juga ditemukan di korteks serebral, striatum, hipotalamus, dan batang otak.
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Fungsi utama ACE2 adalah sebagai penyeimbang ACE.
en-mt: The main function of ACE2 is to balance ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE memecah hormon angiotensin I menjadi angiotensin II vasokonstriksi.
en-mt: ACE breaks down the hormone angiotensin I into the vasoconstrictor angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: Akhirnya, ACE2 memotong asam amino fenilalanin terminal karboksil dari angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) dan menghidrolisisnya menjadi angiotensin (1-7) vasodilator (H-Asp-Arg -Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
en-mt: Finally, ACE2 cleaves the carboxyl terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyzes it to the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7) (H-Asp-Arg -Val-Tyr- Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 juga dapat memecah sejumlah peptida lain mencakup [des-Arg9] -bradikinin, apelin, neurotensin, dinorfin A, dan ghrelin.
en-mt: ACE2 can also break down a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, Apelin, Neurotensin, Dynorphin A, and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 juga mengatur lalu lintas membran transporter asam amino netral SLC6A19 dan terlibat dalam penyakit Hartnup.
en-mt: ACE2 also regulates membrane traffic of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and is implicated in Hartnup disease.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Sebagai protein transmembran, ACE2 berfungsi sebagai titik masuk utama ke dalam sel untuk beberapa koronavirus, yang mencakup HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (virus yang menyebabkan SARS); dan SARS-CoV-2 (virus yang menyebabkan COVID-19).
en-mt: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for several coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Lebih spesifik lagi, pengikatan protein S1 pada spike atau tonjolan SARS-CoV dan SARS-CoV2 dengan domain enzimatik ACE2 pada permukaan sel mengakibatkan endositosis dan translokasi virus dan enzim ke dalam endosom yang terletak di dalam sel.
en-mt: More specifically, the binding of the S1 protein to the spike of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 with the ACE2 enzymatic domain on the cell surface results in endocytosis and translocation of viruses and enzymes into endosomes located inside the cell.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Proses masuk virus ini juga memerlukan priming protein S oleh serin protease inang TMPRSS2, yang penghambatannya sedang diselidiki saat ini sebagai terapi yang potensial. Fakta ini membuat orang berhipotesis bahwa penurunan kadar ACE2 dalam sel mungkin dapat membantu memerangi infeksi.
en-mt: This viral entry process also requires protein S priming by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is currently being investigated as a potential therapy. This fact led one to hypothesize that lowering ACE2 levels in cells might help fight infection.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Namun, banyak masyarakat profesional dan badan regulasi merekomendasikan melanjutkan terapi inhibitor ACE dan ARB standar.
en-mt: However, many professional societies and regulatory agencies recommend continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Sebuah tinjauan sistematis dan metaanalisis, yang dipublikasikan pada 11 Juli 2012, menemukan bahwa "penggunaan inhibitor ACE menyebabkan penurunan signifikan 34% dalam risiko pneumonia dibandingkan dengan kontrol."
en-mt: A systematic review and meta-analysis, published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors led to a significant 34% reduction in the risk of pneumonia compared with controls."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Lebih lanjut, "penggunaan inhibitor ACE juga menurunkan risiko pneumonia pada pasien yang memiliki risiko lebih tinggi untuk pneumonia, terutama pasien penderita stroke dan gagal jantung.
en-mt: Furthermore, "the use of ACE inhibitors also reduces the risk of pneumonia in patients who are at higher risk for pneumonia, especially patients with stroke and heart failure.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Penggunaan inhibitor ACE juga dikaitkan dengan penurunan mortalitas terkait pneumonia, meskipun hasilnya kurang kuat dibandingkan dengan risiko pneumonia keseluruhan."
en-mt: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with reduced pneumonia-related mortality, although the results were less robust than overall pneumonia risk."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ACE2 manusia rekombinan (rhACE2) diharapkan menjadi terapi baru untuk cedera paru akut, dan tampaknya meningkatkan hemodinamik paru dan saturasi oksigen pada anak babi dengan sindrom gawat napas akut yang diinduksi oleh lipoplisakarida.
en-mt: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is expected to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appears to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Waktu paruh rhACE2 pada manusia sekitar 10 jam dengan awitan kerja 30 menit selain panjangnya efek (durasi) 24 jam.
en-mt: The half-life of rhACE2 in humans is approximately 10 hours with an onset of action of 30 minutes in addition to a length of effect (duration) of 24 hours.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Beberapa temuan menunjukkan bahwa rhACE2 mungkin merupakan obat yang menjanjikan bagi pasien dengan intoleransi terhadap inhibitor sistem renin-angiotensin (inhibitor RAS) klasik atau pada penyakit dengan angiotensin II dalam sirkulasi darah meningkat. Infus rhACE2 telah dievaluasi dalam uji klinis untuk pengobatan sindrom gawat napas akut.
en-mt: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for patients with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases with increased circulating angiotensin II. rhACE2 infusion has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: b'Aplikasi COVID-19 adalah aplikasi perangkat lunak seluler yang dirancang untuk membantu pelacakan kontak untuk menanggulangi pandemi koronavirus 2019-2020, yakni proses mengidentifikasi orang ("kontak") yang mungkin telah melakukan kontak dengan orang yang terinfeksi.
en-mt: b'The COVID-19 app is a mobile software application designed to assist contact tracing for the response to the 2019-2020 coronavirus pandemic, the process of identifying people ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected person.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Banyak aplikasi dikembangkan atau diusulkan, yang mendapat dukungan resmi pemerintah di beberapa wilayah dan yurisdiksi.
en-mt: Many applications are developed or proposed, which have official government support in several regions and jurisdictions.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Beberapa kerangka kerja untuk membangun aplikasi pelacakan kontak telah dikembangkan.
en-mt: Several frameworks for building contact tracing applications have been developed.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Masalah privasi dipertanyakan, terutama berkaitan dengan sistem yang didasarkan pada pelacakan lokasi geografis pengguna aplikasi.
en-mt: Privacy issues are questionable, especially with regards to systems based on tracking the geographic location of app users.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Alternatif yang tidak terlalu menyusupi privasi mencakup penggunaan sinyal Bluetooth untuk mencatat kedekatan pengguna dengan ponsel lain.
en-mt: Less privacy-intrusive alternatives include using Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other phones.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Pada 10 April 2020, Google dan Apple bersama-sama mengumumkan bahwa mereka akan mengintegrasikan fungsionalitas untuk mendukung aplikasi berbasis Bluetooth tersebut langsung ke dalam sistem operasi Android dan iOS.
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would be integrating functionality to support such Bluetooth-based applications directly into the Android and iOS operating systems.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: Di Tiongkok, pemerintah Tiongkok, bersama dengan Alipay, telah menyebarkan aplikasi yang memungkinkan warga untuk memeriksa jika mereka telah kontak dengan penderita COVID-19.
en-mt: In China, the Chinese government, together with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with someone with COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Aplikasi ini digunakan di lebih dari 200 kota Tiongkok. Di Singapura, digunakan aplikasi bernama TraceTogether.
en-mt: This app is used in more than 200 Chinese cities. In Singapore, an application called TraceTogether is used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: Aplikasi ini dikembangkan oleh komunitas TI lokal, dirilis sebagai sumber terbuka dan akan diserahkan kepada pemerintah. Makedonia Utara meluncurkan "StopKorona!", sebuah aplikasi berbasis Bluetooth untuk melacak paparan terhadap orang yang berpotensi terinfeksi dan memberikan respons cepat kepada otoritas perawatan kesehatan.
en-mt: This application was developed by the local IT community, released as open source and will be submitted to the government. North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based application to track exposure of potentially infected people and provide rapid response to healthcare authorities.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: Aplikasi ini dikembangkan oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Teknologi dan Kementerian Kesehatan.
en-mt: This application was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Hingga 14 April 2020, aplikasi tersebut masih menunggu persetujuan Google Play Store dan Apple App Store.
en-mt: As of April 14, 2020, the application is still awaiting approval from the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Pada 12 April, pemerintah menyatakan bahwa aplikasi pelacakan kontak sedang dalam tahap pengembangan lanjutan dan akan tersedia untuk disebarkan dalam beberapa minggu. Aplikasi serupa direncanakan di Irlandia dan di Prancis ("StopCovid").
en-mt: On April 12, the government stated that the contact tracing app is in an advanced stage of development and will be available for deployment in a few weeks. Similar apps are planned in Ireland and in France ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Australia dan Selandia Baru sedang mempertimbangkan aplikasi yang didasarkan pada aplikasi TraceTogether Singapura dan protokol BlueTrace. Rusia bermaksud memperkenalkan aplikasi geofencing untuk pasien terdiagnosis COVID-19 yang tinggal di Moskow; aplikasi ini dirancang untuk memastikan mereka tidak meninggalkan rumah.
en-mt: Australia and New Zealand are considering an app based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and the BlueTrace protocol. Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow; this app is designed to make sure they don't leave the house.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: Ross Anderson, profesor teknik keamanan di Universitas Cambridge, menyebutkan sejumlah masalah praktis yang mungkin terjadi pada sistem berbasis aplikasi, yang mencakup positif palsu dan kemungkinan kurangnya efektivitas jika data yang diambil aplikasi terbatas pada sebagian kecil populasi saja.
en-mt: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at the University of Cambridge, mentions a number of practical problems that can occur with app-based systems, including false positives and possible lack of effectiveness if the data that apps capture is limited to a small percentage of the population.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Untuk mengatasi kekhawatiran tentang penyebaran aplikasi "koronavirus" yang menyesatkan atau berbahaya, Apple menetapkan batasan pada jenis organisasi yang dapat menambahkan aplikasi terkait koronavirus ke App Store, yakni membatasi hanya untuk organisasi "resmi" atau yang memiliki reputasi baik.
en-mt: To address concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple is placing limits on the types of organizations that can add coronavirus-related apps to the App Store, limiting them to "official" or reputable organizations only.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: Google dan Amazon menerapkan pembatasan serupa.
en-mt: Google and Amazon apply similar restrictions.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Para pendukung privasi menyuarakan keprihatinan mereka mengenai implikasi surveilans massal menggunakan aplikasi koronavirus, khususnya mengenai apakah infrastruktur surveilans yang dibuat untuk menangani pandemi koronavirus akan dihentikan setelah ancaman berlalu.
en-mt: Privacy advocates voice their concerns about the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether the surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be discontinued after the threat has passed.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Amnesty International dan lebih dari 100 organisasi lainnya mengeluarkan pernyataan yang menyerukan batasan pada surveilans semacam ini.
en-mt: Amnesty International and more than 100 other organizations issued statements calling for limits to this kind of surveillance.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: Organisasi ini menyatakan delapan syarat pada proyek pemerintah:
en-mt: The organization states eight requirements on government projects:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: surveilans harus "sesuai hukum, perlu, dan proporsional";
en-mt: surveillance must be "legal, necessary, and proportionate";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: perluasan pemantauan dan surveilans harus memiliki klausa matahari terbenam;
en-mt: expansion of monitoring and surveillance must have a sunset clause;

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: penggunaan data harus dibatasi untuk tujuan COVID-19;
en-mt: data use should be restricted for COVID-19 purposes;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: keamanan dan anonimitas data harus dilindungi dan terbukti dilindungi berdasarkan bukti;
en-mt: data security and anonymity must be protected and proven to be protected based on evidence;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: surveilans digital harus menghindari semakin parahnya diskriminasi dan marginalisasi;
en-mt: digital surveillance must avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalization;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: setiap pembagian data dengan pihak ketiga harus didefinisikan dalam undang-undang;
en-mt: any sharing of data with third parties must be defined in law;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: harus ada perlindungan terhadap penyalahgunaan dan hak warga negara untuk merespons penyalahgunaan;
en-mt: there must be protection against abuse and the right of citizens to respond to abuse;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: partisipasi bermakna semua "pemangku kepentingan yang relevan" diperlukan, yang mencakup pakar kesehatan masyarakat dan kelompok termarginalisasi. Chaos Computer Club (CCC) Jerman dan Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) juga mengeluarkan daftar periksa.
en-mt: meaningful participation of all “relevant stakeholders” is required, including public health experts and marginalized groups. Germany's Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Rencana Google/Apple yang diusulkan bermaksud untuk mengatasi masalah surveilans terus menerus dengan menghapus mekanisme pelacakan dari sistem operasi perangkat setelah tidak diperlukan lagi.
en-mt: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address persistent surveillance issues by removing tracking mechanisms from device operating systems once they are no longer needed.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: Beberapa negara menggunakan pelacakan lokasi berbasis jaringan, dan bukan aplikasi, sehingga menghilangkan keharusan mengunduh aplikasi dan kemampuan untuk menghindari pelacakan.
en-mt: Some countries use network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating the need to download apps and the ability to avoid tracking.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: Di Israel, pelacakan berbasis jaringan disetujui.
en-mt: In Israel, network-based tracking is approved.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Solusi berbasis jaringan yang memiliki akses ke data lokasi mentah memiliki potensi masalah privasi yang signifikan.
en-mt: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data pose significant potential privacy concerns.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Namun, tidak semua sistem dengan server pusat perlu mengakses data lokasi pribadi; sejumlah sistem yang melindungi privasi telah dibuat dan menggunakan server pusat hanya untuk antarkomunikasi (lihat bagian di bawah).
en-mt: However, not all systems with central servers need to access personal location data; a number of privacy-protecting systems have been established and use a central server for intercommunication only (see section below).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: Di Korea Selatan, sistem yang tidak berbasis aplikasi digunakan untuk melakukan pelacakan kontak.
en-mt: In South Korea, non-app-based systems are used to carry out contact tracing.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Sebagai ganti menggunakan aplikasi khusus, sistem mengumpulkan informasi pelacakan dari berbagai sumber, mencakup data pelacakan perangkat seluler dan data transaksi kartu, dan menggabungkan informasi ini untuk menghasilkan pemberitahuan melalui pesan teks kepada orang yang berpotensi terinfeksi.
en-mt: Instead of using a dedicated application, the system collects tracking information from a variety of sources, including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combines this information to generate notifications via text messages to potentially infected people.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Selain menggunakan informasi ini untuk memperingatkan kontak potensial, pemerintah juga membuat informasi lokasi tersebut tersedia untuk umum, hal yang diizinkan dengan adanya perubahan luas pada undang-undang privasi informasi setelah merebaknya MERS di negara itu.
en-mt: As well as using this information to alert potential contacts, the government also made the location information publicly available, which was permitted by widespread changes to information privacy laws following the country's MERS outbreak.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Informasi ini tersedia untuk umum melalui sejumlah aplikasi dan situs web. Negara-negara seperti Jerman mempertimbangkan untuk menggunakan sistem terpusat sekaligus sistem yang melindungi privasi.
en-mt: This information is publicly available through a number of applications and websites. Countries like Germany are considering using a centralized system as well as a privacy-protecting system.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: Hingga 6 April 2020, detailnya belum dirilis.
en-mt: As of April 6, 2020, details have not been released.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Pelacakan kontak yang melindungi privasi adalah konsep yang sudah mapan, dengan sejumlah besar literatur penelitian mulai dari setidaknya tahun 2013.Pada 7 April 2020, lebih dari selusin kelompok pakar mengerjakan solusi ramah privasi, seperti menggunakan Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), untuk mencatat kedekatan pengguna dengan ponsel lain.
en-mt: Privacy-protecting contact tracing is an established concept, with a large body of research literature dating back to at least 2013. As of April 7, 2020, more than a dozen expert groups are working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), to track user proximity with another phone.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Namun, PEPP-PT adalah upaya koordinasi yang berisi pendekatan tersentralisasi dan terdesentralisasi, dan bukan protokol tunggal. Protokol terdesentralisasi mencakup Pelacakan Kedekatan yang Melindungi Privasi Terdesentralisasi (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Nomor Kontak Sementara (TCN, sebelumnya disebut Nomor Kejadian Kontak, CEN), Protokol dan Mekanisme Sensitif Privasi untuk Pelacakan Kontak Seluler (PACT), dan lain-lain.
en-mt: However, PEPP-PT is a coordination effort containing both centralized and decentralized approaches, and not a single protocol. Decentralized protocols include Decentralized Privacy Protecting Proximity Tracking (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, formerly called Event Contact Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT), and others- other.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: Dalam protokol ini, data pribadi yang dapat teridentifikasi tidak pernah meninggalkan perangkat, dan semua pencocokan terjadi di perangkat.
en-mt: In this protocol, personally identifiable data never leaves the device, and all matching occurs on the device.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: Grup Privasi di MIT Media Lab mengembangkan SafePaths, platform untuk menggunakan teknik yang melindungi privasi saat mengumpulkan dan menggunakan lokasi atau data interseksi alur untuk melacak penyebaran COVID-19.
en-mt: The Privacy Group at the MIT Media Lab developed SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-protecting techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: Ini didasarkan pada penelitian dari lembar putih "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" yang dirilis pada Maret 2020.Upaya lain yang serupa adalah platform SafeTrace oleh Enigma MPC, perusahaan yang mengembangkan teknologi privasi dan awalnya juga didirikan di MIT Media Lab.
en-mt: It is based on research from the white paper “Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic” released in March 2020. Another such endeavor is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company that develops privacy technologies and was originally also founded at the MIT Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: SafeTrace menggunakan teknologi perangkat keras yang aman untuk memungkinkan pengguna berbagi lokasi dan data kesehatan sensitif dengan pengguna lain dan petugas tanpa mengorbankan privasi data tersebut.
en-mt: SafeTrace uses secure hardware technology to enable users to share their location and sensitive health data with other users and officials without compromising the privacy of that data.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: Pada 5 April 2020, Koalisi TCN global didirikan oleh kelompok-kelompok yang memiliki pendekatan yang pada dasarnya sama dan merupakan protokol yang banyak tumpang tindih, dengan tujuan untuk mengurangi fragmentasi dan memungkinkan interoperabilitas global untuk aplikasi pelacakan dan peringatan, yang merupakan aspek utama untuk mencapai penerimaan yang luas.
en-mt: On April 5, 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that share a fundamentally similar approach and are heavily overlapping protocols, with the aim of reducing fragmentation and enabling global interoperability for tracking and warning applications, which are key aspects to achieving acceptance broad.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: Pada 9 April 2020, pemerintah Singapura mengumumkan bahwa mereka telah membuat protokol BlueTrace yang digunakan oleh aplikasi resmi pemerintahnya menjadi sumber terbuka.
en-mt: On 9 April 2020, the government of Singapore announced that it had made the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government application open source.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: Pada 10 April 2020, Google dan Apple, perusahaan yang mengendalikan platform seluler Android dan iOS, mengumumkan inisiatif untuk pelacakan kontak, yang mereka klaim akan melindungi privasi, berdasarkan kombinasi teknologi Bluetooth Low Energy dan kriptografi yang melindungi privasi.
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claim will protect privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-protecting cryptography.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: Mereka juga memublikasikan spesifikasi teknologi inti yang digunakan dalam sistem tersebut.
en-mt: They also publish specifications of the core technology used in the system.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: Menurut Apple dan Google, sistem ini dimaksudkan untuk diluncurkan dalam tiga tahap:
en-mt: According to Apple and Google, the system is meant to be rolled out in three stages:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: peluncuran alat untuk memungkinkan pemerintah membuat aplikasi resmi pelacakan koronavirus yang melindungi privasi
en-mt: launch of tool to allow governments to create official privacy-protecting coronavirus tracking apps

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: integrasi fungsi ini secara langsung ke iOS dan Android Google dan Apple berencana untuk mengatasi masalah pengambilan data dan surveilans terus menerus dengan awalnya mendistribusikan sistem melalui pembaruan sistem operasi, lalu menghapusnya dengan cara yang sama setelah ancaman berlalu.
en-mt: direct integration of this functionality into iOS and Android Google and Apple plan to address continuous data capture and surveillance issues by initially distributing systems via operating system updates, then removing them in the same way after the threat has passed.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: b'Reposisi obat (disebut juga pemberian tujuan baru, profil baru, atau tugas baru pada obat atau peralihan terapi) adalah penggunaan obat yang telah disetujui untuk tujuan pengobatan baru, yakni untuk penyakit atau kondisi medis yang berbeda dengan tujuan awal pengembangan obat.
en-mt: b'Repositioning of drugs (also known as giving new purposes, new profiles, or new tasks on drugs or switching therapy) is the use of drugs that have been approved for new treatment purposes, namely for diseases or medical conditions that are different from the initial goals of drug development.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: Jalur ini merupakan jalur penelitian ilmiah yang saat ini sedang dilakukan untuk mengembangkan pengobatan COVID-19 yang aman dan efektif.
en-mt: This line is a line of scientific research that is currently being carried out to develop a safe and effective treatment for COVID-19.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: Arah penelitian lain mencakup pengembangan vaksin COVID-19 dan transfusi plasma konvalesen. SARS-CoV-2 memiliki sekitar 66 protein yang dapat menjadi target obat, masing-masing protein memiliki beberapa situs pengikatan ligan.
en-mt: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion. SARS-CoV-2 has around 66 proteins that can become drug targets, each protein having multiple ligand-binding sites.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: Analisis terhadap situs-situs pengikatan ligan tersebut dapat menjadi dasar proyek pengembangan obat antivirus yang efektif terhadap protein COVID-19.
en-mt: Analysis of these ligand-binding sites can form the basis of a project to develop antiviral drugs that are effective against the COVID-19 protein.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: Beberapa protein target SARS-CoV-2 yang paling penting adalah protease mirip papain, RNA polimerase tergantung-RNA, helikase, protein S, dan ADP ribofosfatase.
en-mt: Some of the most important target proteins of SARS-CoV-2 are papain-like protease, RNA-dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, protein S, and ADP ribophosphatase.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: Hussein A A, et al meneliti beberapa senyawa kandidat yang kemudian dioptimalkan dan dianalisis kemiripan kerangkanya dengan obat yang telah disetujui dan memiliki kemipiripan tertinggi guna mempercepat pengembangan obat anti-SARS-CoV-2 poten dalam studi praklinisnya untuk direkomendasikan dalam desain studi klinis.
en-mt: Hussein AA, et al examined several candidate compounds which were then optimized and analyzed for similarity of the framework with approved drugs and had the highest similarity to accelerate the development of potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drugs in preclinical studies to be recommended in clinical study designs.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: Klorokuin adalah obat antimalaria yang juga digunakan melawan beberapa penyakit autoimun.
en-mt: Chloroquine is an antimalarial drug that is also used against some autoimmune diseases.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: Pada 18 Maret, WHO mengumumkan bahwa klorokuin dan hidroklorokuin yang terkait adalah dua di antara empat obat yang akan diteliti sebagai bagian dari uji klinis Solidaritas.
en-mt: On March 18, WHO announced that chloroquine and related hydroxychloroquine were two of four drugs to be studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: Gubernur New York, Andrew Cuomo, mengumumkan bahwa uji coba klorokuin dan hidroklorokuin di New York akan dimulai pada 24 Maret. Pada 28 Maret, FDA mengotorisasi penggunaan hidroksiklorokuin sulfat dan klorokuin fosfat berdasarkan Otorisasi Penggunaan Darurat (EUA).
en-mt: The governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo, announced that trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine in New York would begin on March 24. On March 28, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: Pengobatan ini belum disetujui oleh proses uji klinis FDA dan diotorisasi berdasarkan EUA hanya sebagai pengobatan eksperimental untuk penggunaan darurat pada pasien yang dirawat inap, tetapi tidak dapat menerima pengobatan dalam uji klinis.
en-mt: This medication has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trial process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not amenable to treatment in clinical trials.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC mengatakan bahwa "penggunaan, dosis, atau durasi hidroksiklorokuin untuk profilaksis atau pengobatan infeksi SARS-CoV-2" belum ditetapkan.
en-mt: The CDC says that "the use, dosage, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for the prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" has not been established.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: Dokter mengatakan mereka menggunakan obat itu ketika "tidak ada pilihan lain".
en-mt: Doctors say they use the drug when there is "no other option".

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: Sebuah tim peneliti Turki di Istanbul sedang melakukan studi kecil tentang penggunaan klorokuin yang dikombinasikan dengan seng, vitamin A, vitamin C, dan vitamin D.
en-mt: A team of Turkish researchers in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: Studi besar sedang berlangsung di Duke University dan University of Oxford.
en-mt: Major studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: NYU Langone Medical School sedang melakukan uji coba keamanan dan kemanjuran penggunaan preventif hidroksiklorokuin.
en-mt: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a safety and efficacy trial of the preventive use of hydroxychloroquine.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Uji klinis Tiongkok di Wuhan dan Shenzhen mengklaim bahwa favipiravir terbukti "jelas efektif".
en-mt: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claim that favipiravir has been shown to be "clearly effective".

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Tiga puluh lima pasien di Shenzhen teruji negatif dalam median 4 hari, sedangkan durasi penyakit adalah 11 hari pada 45 pasien yang tidak menerima obat tersebut.
en-mt: Thirty-five patients in Shenzhen tested negative for a median of 4 days, whereas disease duration was 11 days in 45 patients who did not receive the drug.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Dalam sebuah penelitian yang dilakukan di Wuhan pada 240 pasien dengan pneumonia, setengah dari jumlah pasien diberi favipiravir dan setengahnya lagi menerima umifenovir.
en-mt: In a study conducted in Wuhan in 240 patients with pneumonia, half of the patients were given favipiravir and the other half received umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: Badan Farmasi Italia mengingatkan publik bahwa bukti yang ada untuk mendukung obat tersebut tidak banyak dan terlalu dini.
en-mt: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminds the public that the evidence available to support the drug is scant and premature.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Pada tanggal 2 April, Jerman mengumumkan akan membeli obat tersebut dari Jepang untuk persediaan dan menggunakan militer untuk mengirimkan obat ke rumah sakit universitas, tempat obat akan digunakan untuk mengobati pasien COVID-19.
en-mt: On April 2, Germany announced it would purchase the drug from Japan for stock and use the military to deliver the drug to a university hospital, where it will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: Menurut South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe telah membuat penawaran kepada pemerintahan Trump tentang pembelian obat tersebut. Obat ini mungkin kurang efektif dalam kasus penyakit berat dengan virus yang telah bermultiplikasi.
en-mt: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made offers to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug. These drugs may be less effective in cases of severe disease with multiplied viruses.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: Obat ini mungkin tidak aman jika digunakan oleh ibu hamil atau orang yang mencoba untuk mengandung.
en-mt: This medication is POSSIBLY UNSAFE for use by pregnant women or people who are trying to conceive.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
