targetString: Sebuah studi tentang lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), yaitu kombinasi antivirus lopinavir dan ritonavir, menyimpulkan bahwa “tidak ada manfaat yang teramati”.
en-mt: A study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), which is an antiviral combination of lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: Obat ini dirancang untuk menghambat replikasi HIV dengan mengikat protease.
en-mt: These drugs are designed to inhibit HIV replication by binding to proteases.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: Sebuah tim peneliti di University of Colorado sedang mencoba memodifikasi obat untuk menemukan senyawa yang akan berikatan dengan protease SARS-CoV-2.Ada kritik dalam masyarakat ilmiah mengenai pengarahan sumber daya untuk mereposisi obat yang dikembangkan khusus untuk HIV/AIDS.
en-mt: A research team at the University of Colorado is trying to modify a drug to find a compound that will bind to the SARS-CoV-2 protease. There has been criticism in the scientific community about directing resources to repositioning a drug developed specifically for HIV/AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: WHO memasukkan lopinavir/ritonavir dalam uji coba Solidaritas internasional.
en-mt: WHO has included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: Remdesivir dibuat dan dikembangkan oleh Gilead Sciences sebagai pengobatan untuk penyakit virus Ebola dan infeksi virus Marburg. Kemudian, Gilead Sciences menemukan bahwa Remdesivir memiliki aktivitas antivirus secara in vitro terhadap beberapa filo-, pneumo-, paramikso-, dan koronavirus.
en-mt: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infection. Later, Gilead Sciences found that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against several filo-, pneumo-, paramixo-, and coronaviruses.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: Salah satu masalah dengan pengobatan antivirus adalah terjadinya resistensi melalui mutasi yang dapat menyebabkan penyakit dan transmisi yang lebih parah.
en-mt: One of the problems with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations which can lead to more severe disease and transmission.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: Beberapa studi prauji-coba awal menunjukkan remdesivir mungkin memiliki hambatan genetik yang tinggi terhadap resistensi. Ada beberapa uji klinis yang sedang berlangsung, mencakup dua uji klinis yang dilakukan oleh Rumah Sakit Universitas Cleveland, yakni satu untuk orang dengan penyakit sedang dan satu lagi untuk orang yang sakit parah.
en-mt: Some early pre-trial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance. There are several ongoing clinical trials, including two clinical trials conducted by Cleveland University Hospital, one for people with moderate disease and one for people with severe disease.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: Ada tiga uji klinis sedang berlangsung untuk vitamin C intravena untuk orang yang dirawat inap dan sakit COVID-19 parah, yakni dua plasebo terkontrol (Tiongkok, Kanada) dan satu tanpa kontrol (Italia).
en-mt: There are three ongoing clinical trials for intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19, namely two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one uncontrolled (Italy).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: Negara Bagian New York memulai uji coba untuk antibiotik azitromisin pada 24 Maret 2020.
en-mt: New York State began a trial for the antibiotic azithromycin on March 24, 2020.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Pusat Nasional Kesehatan dan Kedokteran Global (NCGM) Jepang sedang merencanakan uji coba klinis untuk Alvesco (ciclesonide) Teijin, kortikosteroid inhalasi untuk asma, untuk perawatan pasien infeksi koronavirus baru yang prasimtomatik.
en-mt: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Alvesco (ciclesonide) Teijin, an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of presymptomatic new coronavirus infection patients.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: Untuk suatu bentuk enzim pengonversi angiotensin 2, uji coba Fase II sedang berlangsung dengan 200 pasien akan direkrut dari kasus parah yang dirawat inap di Denmark, Jerman, dan Austria untuk mengetahui efektivitas pengobatan.
en-mt: For a form of the angiotensin 2 converting enzyme, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe cases hospitalized in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: Peneliti dari Montreal Heart Institute di Kanada saat ini sedang meneliti peran kolkisin dalam mengurangi inflamasi dan komplikasi paru pada pasien yang menderita gejala COVID-19 ringan.
en-mt: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients with mild COVID-19 symptoms.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: Studi tersebut, yang diberi nama COLCORONA, merekrut 6000 orang dewasa berusia 40 tahun dan lebih tua yang didiagnosis menderita COVID-19 dan mengalami gejala ringan sehingga tidak memerlukan rawat inap.
en-mt: The study, called COLCORONA, recruited 6,000 adults aged 40 and older who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and had mild symptoms that did not require hospitalization.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: Wanita yang sedang hamil atau menyusui atau tidak menggunakan metode kontrasepsi yang efektif tidak memenuhi syarat.
en-mt: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or not using an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: Beberapa antikoagulan sedang diuji di Italia.
en-mt: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: Heparin berbobot molekul rendah banyak digunakan untuk mengobati pasien sehingga mendorong Badan Obat Italia untuk menerbitkan pedoman tentang penggunaannya.
en-mt: Low molecular weight heparin is widely used to treat patients prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to issue guidelines on its use.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: Sebuah penelitian multipusat pada 300 pasien yang meneliti penggunaan natrium enoksaparin pada dosis profilaksis dan terapeutik diumumkan di Italia pada 14 April.
en-mt: A multicenter study of 300 patients examining the use of enoxaparin sodium in prophylactic and therapeutic doses was announced in Italy on 14 April.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: Karena SARS-CoV-2 adalah virus, banyak perhatian ilmiah difokuskan untuk memberi tujuan pengobatan baru pada obat antivirus yang disetujui dan dikembangkan untuk wabah sebelumnya, seperti MERS, SARS, dan virus West Nile.
en-mt: Because SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, a great deal of scientific attention has focused on new treatment goals for antiviral drugs approved and developed for previous outbreaks, such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Ribavirin: ribavirin direkomendasikan untuk pengobatan COVID-19 menurut pedoman Tiongkok edisi ke-7
en-mt: Ribavirin: ribavirin is recommended for the treatment of COVID-19 according to the Chinese guidelines 7th edition

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Umifenovir: umifenovir direkomendasikan untuk pengobatan COVID-19 menurut pedoman Tiongkok edisi ke-7
en-mt: Umifenovir: umifenovir is recommended for the treatment of COVID-19 according to the Chinese guidelines 7th edition

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: Beberapa antibiotik yang diidentifikasi berpotensi sebagai obat yang dapat diberi tujuan baru untuk pengobatan COVID-19:
en-mt: Several antibiotics have been identified as potential drugs that can be given new goals for the treatment of COVID-19:

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: Tocilizumab (Anti-reseptor IL-6): Disetujui oleh Tiongkok.
en-mt: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: Selain itu, uji coba juga dilakukan di Italia dan Tiongkok, lihat juga Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
en-mt: Additionally, trials are also underway in Italy and China, see also Tocilizumab#COVID-19.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: b'Vaksin COVID-19 adalah vaksin hipotetis terhadap penyakit koronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).
en-mt: b'The COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: Meskipun belum ada vaksin yang menyelesaikan uji klinis, ada banyak upaya sedang dilakukan untuk mengembangkan vaksin tersebut.
en-mt: While no vaccine has completed clinical trials yet, there are a lot of efforts being made to develop one.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: Pada akhir Februari 2020, Organisasi Kesehatan Dunia (WHO) mengatakan bahwa, menurut WHO, vaksin terhadap SARS-CoV-2, virus kausatif penyakit ini, tidak akan tersedia dalam waktu kurang dari 18 bulan.
en-mt: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said that, according to WHO, a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes the disease, will not be available in less than 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: Lima kandidat vaksin sedang dalam studi keamanan Fase I pada bulan April.
en-mt: Five vaccine candidates are in a Phase I safety study in April.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: COVID-19 diidentifikasi pada Desember 2019.
en-mt: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Wabah besar menyebar ke seluruh dunia pada tahun 2020, yang mengakibatkan investasi dan kegiatan penelitian yang besar untuk mengembangkan vaksin.
en-mt: A major outbreak spread worldwide in 2020, resulting in heavy investment and research activities to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Banyak organisasi menggunakan genom yang dipublikasikan untuk mengembangkan vaksin yang mungkin dapat melawan SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop vaccines that could possibly fight SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: Inisiatif CEPI memberikan pernyataan pada bulan April bahwa hal yang harus diperhatikan dalam mengembangkan vaksin adalah kecepatan, kapasitas produksi, penyebaran pada skala yang dibutuhkan, serta akses global.
en-mt: The CEPI Initiative stated in April that the areas that must be considered in developing a vaccine are speed, production capacity, deployment at the scale needed, and global access.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Pada bulan April, lmuwan CEPI melaporkan bahwa 10 platform teknologi berbeda sedang dalam penelitian dan pengembangan selama awal 2020 untuk membuat vaksin yang efektif terhadap COVID-19.
en-mt: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were in research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: Target platform utama yang maju ke studi keamanan Fase I, meliputi:
en-mt: Key platform targets advancing to a Phase I security study include:

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: asam nukleat (DNA dan RNA) (pengembang Fase I dan kandidat vaksin: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
en-mt: nucleic acids (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: vektor virus (pengembang Fase I dan kandidat vaksin: CanSino Biologics, vektor adenovirus tipe 5)
en-mt: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh ilmuwan CEPI pada bulan April, total 115 kandidat vaksin sedang dalam tahap awal pengembangan, dengan 78 dikonfirmasi sebagai proyek aktif (79, menurut Milken Institute), dan 37 lainnya diumumkan, tetapi dengan sedikit informasi publik tersedia (dianggap sedang dalam perencanaan atau sedang dirancang).
en-mt: As CEPI scientists reported in April, a total of 115 vaccine candidates are in the early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and another 37 announced, but with little publicly available information (thought to be in the planning stages). or are being designed).

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: Uji coba Fase I-II melakukan uji keamanan dan imunogenisitas awal, biasanya dilakukan secara acak, terkontrol plasebo, dan di beberapa lokasi, sambil menentukan dosis efektif yang lebih tepat.
en-mt: Phase I–II trials carry out initial safety and immunogenicity trials, usually in a randomized, placebo-controlled, and multiple-site setting, while determining a more precise effective dose.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: Uji coba Fase III biasanya melibatkan lebih banyak peserta, termasuk kelompok kontrol, dan menguji efektivitas vaksin untuk mencegah penyakit, sambil memantau efek samping pada dosis optimal.
en-mt: Phase III trials typically involve a larger number of participants, including a control group, and test the vaccine's effectiveness at preventing disease, while monitoring side effects at optimal doses.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: Dari 79 kandidat vaksin yang sedang aktif dikembangkan (dikonfirmasi pada awal April 2020), 74 di antaranya belum berada dalam evaluasi manusia (masih dalam penelitian "praklinis").
en-mt: Of the 79 vaccine candidates currently in active development (confirmed in early April 2020), 74 are not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: Pada 24 Januari 2020 di Australia, Universitas Queensland mengumumkan bahwa mereka sedang menyelidiki potensi vaksin penjepit molekuler yang secara genetik akan memodifikasi protein virus untuk merangsang reaksi imun.
en-mt: On 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it was investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins to stimulate an immune response.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: Pada 24 Januari 2020 di Kanada, Pusat Vaksin Internasional (VIDO-InterVac) di Universitas Saskatchewan mengumumkan bahwa mereka mulai mengembangkan vaksin, dengan target pengujian pada manusia pada tahun 2021.
en-mt: On January 24, 2020 in Canada, the International Center for Vaccines (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced that they had begun developing a vaccine, with a target of testing in humans in 2021.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: Proyek pengembangan vaksin diumumkan di Pusat Pengendalian dan Pencegahan Penyakit Tiongkok pada 26 Januari 2020 dan Universitas Hong Kong pada 28 Januari.
en-mt: The vaccine development project was announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020 and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: Pada 29 Januari 2020, Perusahaan Farmasi Janssen, yang dipimpin oleh Hanneke Schuitemaker, mengumumkan bahwa mereka mulai mengembangkan vaksin.
en-mt: On January 29, 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Company, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that they had begun developing a vaccine.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: Janssen bekerja sama dengan mitra bioteknologinya, Vaxart, untuk mengembangkan vaksin oral.
en-mt: Janssen is working with his biotechnology partner, Vaxart, to develop an oral vaccine.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: Pada 18 Maret 2020, Emergent BioSolutions mengumumkan kemitraan produksi dengan Vaxart untuk mengembangkan vaksin.
en-mt: On March 18, 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a production partnership with Vaxart to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: Pada 8 Februari 2020, laboratorium OncoGen di Rumania memublikasikan makalah tentang desain vaksin dengan teknologi serupa dengan teknologi yang digunakan untuk terapi vaksinasi neoantigen kanker.
en-mt: On 8 February 2020, the OncoGen laboratory in Romania published a paper on vaccine design with technology similar to that used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: Pada 25 Maret, kepala lembaga penelitian mengumumkan bahwa mereka telah menyelesaikan sintesis vaksin dan akan memulai pengujian.
en-mt: On March 25, the head of the research institute announced that they had completed the synthesis of the vaccine and would start testing.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Pada 27 Februari 2020, anak perusahaan Generex, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, mengumumkan mereka memulai proyek vaksin untuk membuat vaksin peptida Ii-Key terhadap COVID-19.
en-mt: On February 27, 2020, Generex subsidiary, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were starting a vaccine project to manufacture the Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: Mereka ingin memproduksi kandidat vaksin yang dapat diuji pada manusia "dalam waktu 90 hari."
en-mt: They want to produce a vaccine candidate that can be tested on humans "within 90 days."

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Pada 5 Maret 2020, Universitas Washington di St. Louis mengumumkan proyeknya untuk mengembangkan vaksin.
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announces his project to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: Pada 5 Maret 2020, Komando Riset Medis dan Pasokan Angkatan Darat Amerika Serikat di Fort Detrick dan Institut Riset Angkatan Darat Walter Reed di Silver Spring, keduanya di Maryland barat, mengumumkan bahwa mereka sedang mengembangkan vaksin.
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Supply Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Research Institute in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced that they were developing a vaccine.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: Pada 10 Maret 2020, Emergent Biosolutions mengumumkan bahwa mereka bekerja sama dengan Novavax Inc.
en-mt: On March 10, 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that they were working with Novavax Inc.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: dalam pengembangan dan pembuatan vaksin.
en-mt: in the development and manufacture of vaccines.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: Lebih lanjut, kemitraan ini smengumumkan rencana pengujian praklinis dan uji klinis Fase I pada Juli 2020.
en-mt: Furthermore, the partnership announced plans for preclinical testing and Phase I clinical trials in July 2020.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Pada 12 Maret 2020, Kementerian Kesehatan India mengumumkan mereka sedang mengerjakan 11 isolat, dan bahkan pada jalur cepat, pengembangan vaksin setidaknya memerlukan waktu sekitar satu setengah hingga dua tahun.
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, India's Ministry of Health announced they were working on 11 isolates, and even on the fast track, vaccine development should take around one and a half to two years at the very least.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: Pada 12 Maret 2020, Medicago, sebuah perusahaan bioteknologi di Quebec City, Quebec, melaporkan pengembangan partikel mirip koronavirus dengan pendanaan parsial dari Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported the development of coronavirus-like particles with partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: Kandidat vaksin ini sedang dalam penelitian laboratorium, dengan pengujian pada manusia direncanakan pada bulan Juli atau Agustus 2020.
en-mt: This vaccine candidate is currently in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: Awal pekan itu, The Guardian melaporkan bahwa Presiden AS, Donald Trump, telah menawarkan "'sejumlah besar uang' untuk akses eksklusif ke vaksin Covid-19" kepada CureVac, yang diprotes oleh pemerintah Jerman.
en-mt: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that US President Donald Trump had offered "'significant sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine" to CureVac, which the German government protested.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: Pada 17 Maret 2020, perusahaan farmasi Amerika Pfizer mengumumkan kemitraan dengan perusahaan Jerman, BioNTech, untuk bersama-sama mengembangkan vaksin berbasis mRNA.
en-mt: On March 17, 2020, the American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop an mRNA-based vaccine.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: Saat ini, kandidat vaksin berbasis mRNA, BNT162, berada dalam pengujian praklinis dengan uji klinis diperkirakan akan dimulai pada April 2020.
en-mt: Currently, the mRNA-based vaccine candidate, BNT162, is in preclinical testing with clinical trials expected to start in April 2020.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: Pada 17 Maret 2020 di Italia, perusahaan biotek Italia Takis Biotech mengumumkan mereka akan mendapatkan hasil pengujian praklinis pada bulan April 2020 dan kandidat vaksin yang berada di tahap akhir dapat mulai diuji pada manusia pada musim gugur.
en-mt: On March 17, 2020 in Italy, the Italian biotech company Takis Biotech announced they would have preclinical testing results in April 2020 and vaccine candidates that are in the final stages could start testing in humans in the fall.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: Pada 19 Maret 2020 di Prancis, Koalisi Inovasi Kesiapsiagaan Epidemi (CEPI) mengumumkan investasi sebesar US$4,9 juta dalam konsorsium penelitian vaksin COVID-19 yang melibatkan Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Wina, Austria), dan Universitas Pittsburgh, dengan total investasi CEPI dalam pengembangan vaksin COVID-19 mencapai US$29 juta.
en-mt: On March 19, 2020 in France, the Epidemic Preparedness Innovation Coalition (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Pasteur Institute, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, totaling CEPI's investment in the development of the COVID-19 vaccine reached US$29 million.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: Mitra investasi CEPI lainnya untuk pengembangan vaksin COVID-19 adalah Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, Universitas Hong Kong, Universitas Oxford, dan Universitas Queensland.
en-mt: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, University of Hong Kong, University of Oxford, and University of Queensland.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: Pada 20 Maret 2020, pejabat kesehatan Rusia mengumumkan bahwa ilmuwan telah memulai pengujian enam kandidat vaksin pada hewan.
en-mt: On March 20, 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists had started testing six vaccine candidates in animals.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: Peneliti Imperial College London mengumumkan pada 20 Maret 2020 bahwa mereka sedang mengembangkan vaksin RNA yang dapat mengamplifikasi sendiri untuk COVID-19.
en-mt: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they were developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: Kandidat vaksin dikembangkan dalam 14 hari setelah menerima sekuens dari Tiongkok.
en-mt: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: Pada akhir Maret, pemerintah Kanada mengumumkan dana sebesar C$275 juta untuk 96 proyek penelitian penanggulangan medis terhadap COVID-19, yang mencakup sejumlah kandidat vaksin di perusahaan dan universitas Kanada, seperti inisiatif Medicago dan Universitas Saskatchewan.
en-mt: In late March, the Canadian government announced funding of C$275 million for 96 research projects in the medical response to COVID-19, which includes vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago Initiative and the University of Saskatchewan.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Di waktu yang hampir bersamaan, pemerintah Kanada mengumumkan dana sebesar C$192 juta khusus untuk mengembangkan vaksin COVID-19, dengan rencana untuk mendirikan "bank vaksin" nasional berisi beberapa vaksin baru yang dapat digunakan jika wabah koronavirus lain terjadi.
en-mt: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced a special C$192 million fund to develop a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to set up a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used in the event of another coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: Pada 2 April 2020, para peneliti di Fakultas Kedokteran Universitas Pittsburgh melaporkan pengujian PittCoVacc, kandidat vaksin COVID-19, pada tikus; mereka menyatakan bahwa "MNA yang memberikan vaksin subunit S1 SARS-CoV-2 menimbulkan respons antibodi spesifik antigen yang poten [pada tikus] yang mulai terlihat 2 minggu setelah imunisasi."
en-mt: On April 2, 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported testing PittCoVacc, a COVID-19 vaccine candidate, in mice; they stated that "MNAs delivering the SARS-CoV-2 subunit S1 vaccine elicited a potent antigen-specific antibody response [in mice] that became apparent 2 weeks after immunization."

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: Pada 16 April 2020 di Kanada, Fakultas Farmasi Universitas Waterloo mengumumkan desain kandidat vaksin berbasis DNA sebagai semprotan nasal potensial.
en-mt: On April 16, 2020 in Canada, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced the design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a potential nasal spray.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Dengan menggunakan bakteriofag, DNA dirancang untuk bereplikasi di dalam bakteri manusia untuk memproduksi partikel mirip-virus yang tidak berbahaya, yang dapat merangsang sistem imun untuk menghasilkan antibodi terhadap virus SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Using bacteriophages, DNA is designed to replicate within human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which can stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: Pada Maret 2020, pemerintah, industri, dan tiga universitas AS mengumpulkan sumber daya untuk mengakses superkomputer dari IBM, dikombinasikan dengan sumber daya komputasi awan dari Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, dan Google.
en-mt: In March 2020, the US government, industry and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft and Google.

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: Beberapa vaksin memiliki efek heterolog, yang disebut juga efek nonspesifik.
en-mt: Some vaccines have a heterologous effect, which is also called a nonspecific effect.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: Hal itu berarti bahwa vaksin-vaksin ini dapat memiliki manfaat di luar penyakit yang dicegahnya.
en-mt: That means that these vaccines could have benefits beyond the diseases they prevent.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: Uji coba teracak lebih lanjut di Australia berusaha mengikutkan 4.170 petugas kesehatan.
en-mt: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to include 4,170 healthcare workers.

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: Ada kemungkinan vaksin dalam pengembangan tidak akan aman atau efektif.
en-mt: It is possible that a vaccine under development will not be safe or effective.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: Penelitian awal untuk menilai kemanjuran vaksin menggunakan model hewan COVID-19 spesifik, seperti tikus ACE2-transgenik, hewan laboratorium lain, dan primata nonmanusia, menunjukkan perlunya langkah-langkah pembendungan untuk mencapai level keselamatan biologi 3 dalam menangani virus hidup, dan koordinasi internasional untuk memastikan prosedur keselamatan standar.
en-mt: Early studies to assess vaccine efficacy using specific COVID-19 animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and nonhuman primates, point to the need for containment measures to achieve biosafety level 3 in handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standard safety procedures.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: Vaksin terhadap SARS dan MERS telah diuji pada model hewan nonmanusia.
en-mt: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in nonhuman animal models.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: Hingga 2020, belum ada obat atau vaksin pelindung untuk SARS yang terbukti aman dan efektif pada manusia.
en-mt: As of 2020, no protective drug or vaccine for SARS has been proven safe and effective in humans.

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: Menurut makalah penelitian yang dipublikasikan tahun 2005 dan 2006, identifikasi dan pengembangan vaksin dan obat baru untuk mengobati SARS adalah prioritas bagi pemerintah dan lembaga kesehatan masyarakat di seluruh dunia. Selain itu, vaksin yang terbukti untuk MERS juga belum ada.
en-mt: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of new vaccines and drugs to treat SARS is a priority for governments and public health agencies worldwide. In addition, there is no proven vaccine for MERS.

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: Ketika MERS menjadi prevalen, penelitian SARS yang ada diyakini dapat menjadi templat yang berguna untuk mengembangkan vaksin dan terapi terhadap infeksi MERS-CoV.
en-mt: When MERS becomes prevalent, it is believed that existing SARS research can become a useful template for developing vaccines and therapies against MERS-CoV infection.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: Pada Maret 2020, ada satu vaksin MERS (berbasis DNA) yang menyelesaikan uji klinis fase I pada manusia, dan tiga vaksin lainnya sedang dalam proses, yang semuanya adalah vaksin bervektor virus, dua bervektor adenovirus (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac), dan satu bervektor-MVA (MVA-MERS-S).
en-mt: As of March 2020, one MERS (DNA-based) vaccine has completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three other vaccines are in progress, all of which are viral vectors, two are adenovirus vectors (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: Postingan media sosial menggaungkan teori konspirasi yang mengklaim virus di balik COVID-19 telah dikenal sebelumnya dan bahwa vaksin telah tersedia.
en-mt: Social media posts echo conspiracy theories claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known beforehand and that a vaccine is available.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: Paten-paten yang dikutip oleh berbagai postingan media sosial merujuk paten yang ada untuk sekuens genetik dan vaksin untuk galur koronavirus lain, seperti koronavirus SARS.
en-mt: The patents cited by various social media posts refer to existing patents for genetic sequencing and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus, such as the SARS coronavirus.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: b'Penyakit koronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) adalah penyakit menular yang disebabkan oleh koronavirus sindrom pernapasan akut berat 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
en-mt: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Gejala umum meliputi demam, batuk, dan sesak napas.
en-mt: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: Gejala lain bisa mencakup kelelahan, nyeri otot, diare, sakit tenggorokan, kehilangan daya penciuman, dan sakit perut.
en-mt: Other symptoms can include fatigue, muscle aches, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell and stomach pain.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: Waktu sejak terpapar hingga awitan gejala pada umumnya sekitar lima hari, tetapi dapat berkisar mulai dari dua hingga empat belas hari.
en-mt: The time from exposure to the onset of symptoms is generally about five days, but can range from two to fourteen days.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: Walaupun kebanyakan kasus mengakibatkan gejala ringan, beberapa berkembang menjadi pneumonia virus dan gagal organ majemuk.
en-mt: Although most cases result in mild symptoms, some develop viral pneumonia and multiple organ failure.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: Hingga 17 April 2020, lebih dari 2,24 juta kasus telah dilaporkan di 210 negara dan wilayah teritorial, yang mengakibatkan lebih dari 153.000 kematian.
en-mt: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: Lebih dari 568.000 orang telah sembuh. Virus ini terutama menyebar antarmanusia saat terjadi kontak dekat, sering kali melalui percikan atau droplet kecil yang dihasilkan melalui batuk, bersin, atau saat berbicara.
en-mt: More than 568,000 people have recovered. The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing or talking.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: Meskipun dihasilkan saat mengembuskan napas, droplet biasanya jatuh ke tanah atau ke permukaan dan bukan menular hingga jarak jauh.
en-mt: Although produced when exhaling, droplets usually fall to the ground or onto a surface and are not transmitted over long distances.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Orang juga dapat terinfeksi dengan menyentuh permukaan yang terkontaminasi lalu menyentuh mata, hidung, atau mulutnya.
en-mt: People can also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose or mouth.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: Di permukaan, virus ini dapat bertahan hingga 72 jam.
en-mt: On surfaces, the virus can survive up to 72 hours.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: Virus ini sangat menular selama tiga hari pertama setelah awitan gejala, meskipun penyebaran mungkin terjadi sebelum gejala muncul dan setelah tahap penyakit selanjutnya. Metode diagnosis standar adalah dengan reaksi rantai polimerase transkripsi balik real-time (rRT-PCR) pada usap nasofaring.
en-mt: The virus is highly contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although transmission may occur before symptoms appear and after later stages of the disease. The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) on nasopharyngeal swabs.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: Penggunaan masker dianjurkan bagi orang yang diduga tertular virus dan orang yang merawatnya.
en-mt: The use of masks is recommended for people suspected of contracting the virus and those who care for them.

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.
targetString: Rekomendasi mengenai penggunaan masker oleh masyarakat umum berbeda-beda; sebagian otoritas merekomendasikan agar tidak menggunakan masker, sebagian merekomendasikan penggunaannya, dan sebagian yang lain mengharuskan penggunaannya.
en-mt: Recommendations regarding the use of masks by the general public vary; some authorities recommend against using masks, some recommend their use, and some others require their use.

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Saat ini, belum ada vaksin atau pengobatan antivirus spesifik untuk COVID-19.
en-mt: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.
targetString: Transmisi lokal penyakit telah dicatat di hampir semua negara di enam wilayah WHO.
en-mt: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in almost all countries in the six WHO regions.

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Orang yang terinfeksi virus bisa tanpa gejala atau mengalami gejala seperti flu, seperti demam, batuk, kelelahan, dan sesak napas.
en-mt: People infected with the virus can be asymptomatic or have flu-like symptoms, such as fever, cough, fatigue and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: Gejala darurat termasuk kesulitan bernapas, nyeri atau sesak di dada yang terus-menerus, kebingungan, sulit bangun, dan wajah atau bibir kebiruan; penangangan medis segera disarankan jika gejala-gejala ini muncul.
en-mt: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or tightness, confusion, difficulty getting up, and bluish face or lips; Immediate medical treatment is recommended if these symptoms appear.

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: Gejala pernapasan atas, seperti bersin, ingusan, atau sakit tenggorokan dapat dijumpai, tetapi lebih jarang terjadi.
en-mt: Upper respiratory symptoms, such as sneezing, runny nose, or sore throat may be present, but are less common.

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: Gejala gastrointestinal, seperti mual, muntah, dan diare, teramati dalam persentase beragam.
en-mt: Gastrointestinal symptoms, such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhea, were observed in various percentages.

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: Beberapa kasus di Tiongkok awalnya hanya dengan gambaran klinis sesak dada dan palpitasi.
en-mt: Several cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: Pada beberapa orang, penyakit dapat berkembang menjadi pneumonia, gagal organ majemuk, dan kematian.
en-mt: In some people, the disease can progress to pneumonia, multiple organ failure, and death.

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.
targetString: Masa ini disebut masa inkubasi.
en-mt: This period is called the incubation period.

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: Masa inkubasi untuk COVID-19 biasanya lima hingga enam hari, tetapi dapat berkisar mulai dari dua hingga 14 hari.
en-mt: The incubation period for COVID-19 is usually five to six days, but can range from two to 14 days.

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: 97,5% orang yang bergejala akan mengalami gejala dalam 11,5 hari infeksi. Laporan menunjukkan bahwa tidak semua orang yang terinfeksi mengalami gejala.
en-mt: 97.5% of symptomatic people will develop symptoms within 11.5 days of infection. Reports indicate that not everyone who is infected develops symptoms.

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: Peran pembawa tanpa gejala ini dalam penularan belum diketahui sepenuhnya; namun, bukti awal menunjukkan bahwa mereka mungkin berkontribusi pada penyebaran penyakit.
en-mt: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not fully understood; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: Saat ini, proporsi orang terinfeksi yang tidak menunjukkan gejala belum diketahui dan sedang diteliti, dengan Pusat Pengendalian dan Pencegahan Penyakit Korea (KCDC) melaporkan bahwa 20% dari semua kasus terkonfirmasi tetap tanpa gejala selama dirawat di rumah sakit.
en-mt: Currently, the proportion of asymptomatic infected people is unknown and is being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remain asymptomatic during hospitalization.

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: Komisi Kesehatan Nasional Tiongkok mulai menyertakan kasus tanpa gejala dalam kasus hariannya pada 1 April; dari 166 infeksi pada hari itu, 130 kasus (78%) tidak menunjukkan gejala pada saat pengujian.
en-mt: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on April 1; of 166 infections that day, 130 cases (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.
targetString: Sputum dan air liur dapat membawa muatan virus dalam skala besar.
en-mt: Sputum and saliva can carry large-scale viral loads.

sourceString: Loud talking releases more droplets than normal talking.
targetString: Berbicara dengan lantang melepaskan lebih banyak percikan atau droplet dibanding berbicara secara normal.
en-mt: Talking loudly releases more sparks or droplets than speaking normally.

sourceString: A study in Singapore found that an uncovered cough can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).
targetString: Sebuah penelitian di Singapura menemukan bahwa batuk yang tidak ditutupi dapat menyebabkan droplet terdorong hingga sejauh 4,5 meter (15 kaki).
en-mt: A study in Singapore found that uncovered coughing can cause droplets to be pushed as far as 4.5 meters (15 feet).

sourceString: Though the virus is not generally airborne, the National Academy of Science has suggested that bioaerosol transmission may be possible and air collectors positioned in the hallway outside of people's rooms yielded samples positive for viral RNA.
targetString: Meskipun virus ini biasanya tidak ditularkan melalui udara, Akademi Sains Nasional Amerika Serikat menunjukkan bahwa transmisi bioaerosol mungkin terjadi dan pengumpul udara yang ditempatkan di lorong di luar kamar orang menghasilkan sampel yang positif untuk RNA virus.
en-mt: Although the virus is not ordinarily transmitted through the air, the United States National Academy of Sciences demonstrated that bioaerosol transmission was possible and air collectors placed in the hallway outside people's rooms produced samples that were positive for viral RNA.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolised and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: Beberapa prosedur medis, seperti intubasi dan resusitasi jantung paru (RJP), dapat membuat sekret pernapasan berubah menjadi aerosol lalu tersebar lewat udara.
en-mt: Some medical procedures, such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), can turn respiratory secretions into aerosols and then disperse through the air.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread via feces, this risk is believed to be low.The virus is most contagious when people are symptomatic; while spread may be possible before symptoms emerge, the risk is low.
targetString: Walaupun ada kekhawatiran bahwa virus dapat menyebar melalui feses, risiko ini diyakini rendah. Virus paling menular saat orang bergejala; walaupun penyebaran mungkin terjadi sebelum gejala muncul, risikonya rendah.
en-mt: While there is concern that the virus could be spread through faeces, the risk is believed to be low. The virus is most contagious when people are symptomatic; although spread is possible before symptoms appear, the risk is low.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: Pusat Pencegahan dan Pengendalian Penyakit Eropa (ECDC) mengatakan bahwa meskipun belum jelas sepenuhnya seberapa mudah penyakit ini menyebar, satu orang umumnya menginfeksi dua hingga tiga orang lain. Virus ini dapat bertahan di permukaan selama berjam-jam hingga berhari-hari.
en-mt: The European Center for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says that while it's not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three other people. The virus can survive on surfaces for hours to days.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and for up to four hours on 99% copper.
targetString: Khususnya, ditemukan bahwa virus dapat dideteksi selama satu hari pada karton/kardus, hingga tiga hari pada plastik (polipropilen) dan baja tahan karat (AISI 304), dan hingga empat jam pada tembaga 99%.
en-mt: In particular, it was found that the virus was detectable for one day on cardboard, up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and up to four hours on 99% copper.

sourceString: This, however, varies depending on the humidity and temperature.
targetString: Namun, hal ini bervariasi tergantung pada kelembapan dan suhu.
en-mt: However, this varies depending on humidity and temperature.

sourceString: Soap and detergent are also effective if correctly used; soap products degrade the virus' fatty protective layer, deactivating it, as well as freeing them from skin and other surfaces.
targetString: Sabun dan detergen juga efektif jika digunakan dengan benar; produk sabun menguraikan lapisan lemak pelindung virus, mendeaktivasi virus, serta membebaskannya dari kulit dan permukaan lainnya.
en-mt: Soaps and detergents are also effective when used properly; soap products break down the protective lipid layer of the virus, deactivate it, and free it from skin and other surfaces.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant), are less effective.In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after the start of hospitalization.
targetString: Larutan lain, seperti benzalkonium klorida dan klorheksidin glukonat (disinfektan bedah), kurang efektif. Dalam sebuah penelitian di Hong Kong, sampel air liur diambil dalam median dua hari setelah rawat inap dimulai.
en-mt: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (surgical disinfectants), are less effective. In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after hospitalization started.

sourceString: In five of six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.
targetString: Pada lima dari enam pasien, sampel pertama menunjukkan muatan virus tertinggi, dan pasien keenam menunjukkan muatan virus tertinggi pada pengujian hari kedua.
en-mt: In five of the six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day of testing.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Koronavirus sindrom pernapasan akut berat 2 (SARS-CoV-2) adalah koronavirus sindrom pernapasan akut berat baru, yang pertama kali diisolasi dari tiga orang dengan pneumonia yang terkait dengan klaster kasus penyakit pernapasan akut di Wuhan.
en-mt: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a new severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, which was first isolated from three people with pneumonia associated with a cluster of acute respiratory disease cases in Wuhan.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.
targetString: Semua ciri virus SARS-CoV-2 baru ada pada koronavirus yang berkerabat di alam.
en-mt: All the features of the new SARS-CoV-2 virus are present in nature-related coronaviruses.

sourceString: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: Di luar tubuh manusia, virus ini terbunuh oleh sabun rumah tangga, yang merusak gelembung pelindungnya. SARS-CoV-2 berkerabat dekat dengan SARS-CoV pertama.
en-mt: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which destroys its protective bubble. SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the first SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells via the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most abundant in the type II alveolar cells of the lungs.
targetString: Paru adalah organ yang paling terdampak oleh COVID-19 karena virus mengakses sel inang melalui enzim pengubah angiotensin 2 (ACE2), yang paling melimpah di sel alveolar tipe II paru.
en-mt: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells via the angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most abundant in the type II alveolar cells of the lungs.

sourceString: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the host cell.
targetString: Virus ini menggunakan glikoprotein permukaan khusus yang disebut "spike atau tonjolan" (peplomer) untuk terhubung ke ACE2 dan memasuki sel inang.
en-mt: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the host cell.

sourceString: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people admitted in hospital in Wuhan, China, and is more frequent in severe disease.
targetString: Cedera jantung akut ditemukan pada 12% orang terinfeksi yang dirawat inap di Wuhan, Tiongkok, dan lebih sering pada penyakit parah.
en-mt: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people hospitalized in Wuhan, China, and was more common in severe disease.

sourceString: Rates of cardiovascular symptoms is high, owing to the systemic inflammatory response and immune system disorders during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.
targetString: Tingkat gejala kardiovaskular tinggi karena adanya respons inflamasi sistemik dan gangguan sistem imun selama perkembangan penyakit, tetapi cedera miokard akut mungkin juga terkait dengan reseptor ACE2 di jantung.
en-mt: The rate of cardiovascular symptoms is high because of the systemic inflammatory response and compromised immune system during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.

sourceString: ACE2 receptors are highly expressed in the heart and are involved in heart function.
targetString: Reseptor ACE2 diekspresikan sangat tinggi di jantung dan terlibat dalam fungsi jantung.
en-mt: The ACE2 receptor is highly expressed in the heart and is involved in cardiac function.

sourceString: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) have been found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infections and may be related to poor prognosis.Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), and lymphocyte-containing inflammatory infiltrates within the lung.
targetString: Insiden trombosis (31%) dan tromboembolisme vena (25%) yang tinggi ditemukan pada pasien infeksi COVID-19 di ICU dan mungkin terkait dengan prognosis yang buruk. Otopsi pada orang yang meninggal karena COVID-19 menemukan kerusakan alveolar difus (DAD) dan infiltrat inflamasi yang mengandung limfosit di dalam paru.
en-mt: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) was found in patients with COVID-19 infection in the ICU and may be associated with a poor prognosis. Autopsies in people who died from COVID-19 found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) and inflammatory infiltrates containing lymphocytes in the lungs.

sourceString: Although SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing epithelial cells of the respiratory tract, patients with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.
targetString: Meskipun SARS-COV-2 memiliki tropisme untuk sel epitel saluran napas yang mengekspresikan ACE2, pasien COVID-19 berat memiliki gejala hiperinflamasi sistemik.
en-mt: Although SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing airway epithelial cells, patients with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.

sourceString: In particular, pathogenic GM-CSF-secreting T-cells were shown to correlate with the recruitment of inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Secara khusus, sel T yang menyekresi GM-CSF patogenik terbukti berkorelasi dengan perekrutan monosit yang menyekresi IL-6 inflamatori dan patologi paru yang parah pada pasien COVID-19.
en-mt: In particular, pathogenic GM-CSF-secreting T cells were shown to correlate with recruitment of inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology in COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Lymphocytic infiltrates have also been reported at autopsy.
targetString: Infiltrat limfositik juga pernah dilaporkan pada otopsi.
en-mt: Lymphocytic infiltrates have also been reported at autopsy.

sourceString: The WHO has published several testing protocols for the disease.
targetString: WHO telah memublikasikan beberapa protokol pengujian untuk penyakit ini.
en-mt: WHO has published several testing protocols for this disease.

sourceString: The standard method of testing is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: Metode standar pengujian adalah reaksi rantai polimerase transkripsi balik real-time (rRT-PCR).
en-mt: The standard method of assay is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The test is typically done on respiratory samples obtained by a nasopharyngeal swab; however, a nasal swab or sputum sample may also be used.
targetString: Pengujian ini biasanya dilakukan pada sampel pernapasan yang diperoleh melalui usap nasofaring; namun, sampel usap nasal atau sputum juga dapat digunakan.
en-mt: This test is usually performed on a breath sample obtained by nasopharyngeal swab; however, nasal swabs or sputum samples may also be used.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to two days.
targetString: Umumnya, hasil tersedia dalam beberapa jam hingga dua hari.
en-mt: Generally, results are available within a few hours to two days.

sourceString: Blood tests can be used, but these require two blood samples taken two weeks apart and the results have little immediate value.
targetString: Pengujian darah dapat digunakan, tetapi membutuhkan dua sampel darah yang diambil dengan jarak dua minggu sehingga hasilnya memiliki nilai waktu yang kecil.
en-mt: Blood testing can be used, but requires two blood samples taken two weeks apart so the results have little time value.

sourceString: Chinese scientists were able to isolate a strain of the coronavirus and publish the genetic sequence so laboratories across the world could independently develop polymerase chain reaction (PCR) tests to detect infection by the virus.
targetString: Ilmuwan Tiongkok mampu mengisolasi galur koronavirus ini dan memublikasikan sekuens genetiknya sehingga laboratorium di seluruh dunia dapat mengembangkan pengujian reaksi rantai polimerase (PCR) secara independen untuk mendeteksi infeksi oleh virus ini.
en-mt: Chinese scientists were able to isolate this strain of coronavirus and publish its genetic sequence so that laboratories around the world can develop independent polymerase chain reaction (PCR) assays to detect infection with this virus.

sourceString: As of 4 April 2020, antibody tests (which may detect active infections and whether a person had been infected in the past) were in development, but not yet widely used.
targetString: Pada 4 April 2020, uji antibodi (yang dapat mendeteksi infeksi aktif dan jika seseorang telah terinfeksi sebelumnya) sedang dalam pengembangan, tetapi belum banyak digunakan.
en-mt: As of April 4, 2020, an antibody test (which can detect active infection and if a person has been infected before) is in development, but not widely used yet.

sourceString: The Chinese experience with testing has shown the accuracy is only 60 to 70%.
targetString: Pengalaman Tiongkok dengan pengujian tersebut menunjukkan keakuratannya hanya 60 hingga 70%.
en-mt: China's experience with the test shows it is only 60 to 70% accurate.

sourceString: The FDA in the United States approved the first point-of-care test on 21 March 2020 for use at the end of that month.Diagnostic guidelines released by Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University suggested methods for detecting infections based upon clinical features and epidemiological risk.
targetString: FDA di Amerika Serikat menyetujui pengujian point-of-care pertama pada 21 Maret 2020 untuk digunakan pada akhir bulan itu. Pedoman diagnosis yang dirilis oleh Rumah Sakit Zhongnan Universitas Wuhan menyarankan metode untuk mendeteksi infeksi berdasarkan gambaran klinis dan risiko epidemiologis.
en-mt: The FDA in the United States approved the first point-of-care testing on March 21, 2020 for use later that month. The diagnosis guide released by the Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University suggests a method for detecting infection based on the clinical picture and epidemiological risk.

sourceString: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution are common in early infection.
targetString: Opasitas ground-glass multilobar bilateral dengan distribusi perifer, asimetris, dan posterior banyak ditemui di awal infeksi.
en-mt: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric, and posterior distribution are common early in infection.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving (lobular septal thickening with variable alveolar filling), and consolidation may appear as the disease progresses.
targetString: Dominasi subpleural, crazy paving (penebalan septum lobular dengan pengisian alveolar bervariasi), dan konsolidasi dapat muncul seiring perkembangan penyakit.
en-mt: Subpleural predominance, crazy paving (lobular septal thickening with variable alveolar filling), and consolidation may occur as the disease progresses.

sourceString: Few data are available about microscopic lesions and the pathophysiology of COVID-19.
targetString: Sedikit data tersedia tentang lesi mikroskopik dan patofisiologi COVID-19.
en-mt: Little data is available on the microscopic lesions and pathophysiology of COVID-19.

sourceString: The main pathological findings at autopsy are:
targetString: Temuan patologis utama pada otopsi adalah:
en-mt: The main pathological findings at autopsy are:

sourceString: Macroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, lung consolidation and pulmonary oedema
targetString: Makroskopi: pleurisi, perikarditis, konsolidasi paru, dan edema pulmoner
en-mt: Macroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, lung consolidation and pulmonary edema

sourceString: Four types of severity of viral pneumonia can be observed:
targetString: Empat jenis keparahan pneumonia virus dapat teramati:
en-mt: Four types of severity of viral pneumonia can be observed:

sourceString: mild pneumonia: pulmonary oedema, pneumocyte hyperplasia, large atypical pneumocytes, interstitial inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration and multinucleated giant cell formation
targetString: pneumonia ringan: edema pulmoner, hiperplasia pneumosit, pneumosit atipis besar, inflamasi interstisial dengan infiltrasi limfositik, dan pembentukan sel raksasa berinti banyak
en-mt: Mild pneumonia: pulmonary edema, pneumocyte hyperplasia, large atypia pneumocytes, interstitial inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration, and multinucleated giant cell formation

sourceString: severe pneumonia: diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) with diffuse alveolar exudates.
targetString: pneumonia berat: kerusakan alveolar difus (DAD) dengan eksudat alveolar difus.
en-mt: severe pneumonia: diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) with diffuse alveolar exudate.

sourceString: DAD is the cause of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxemia.
targetString: DAD adalah penyebab sindrom gawat napas akut (ARDS) dan hipoksemia berat.
en-mt: DAD is a cause of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxaemia.

sourceString: healing pneumonia: organisation of exudates in alveolar cavities and pulmonary interstitial fibrosis
targetString: pneumonia dalam tahap penyembuhan: susunan eksudat di rongga alveolar dan fibrosis interstitial pulmoner
en-mt: pneumonia in the convalescent stage: exudate formation in the alveolar spaces and pulmonary interstitial fibrosis

sourceString: Blood: disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC); leukoerythroblastic reaction
targetString: Darah: koagulasi intravaskular diseminata (DIC); reaksi leukoeritroblastik
en-mt: Blood: disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC); leukoerythroblastic reaction

sourceString: Preventive measures to reduce the chances of infection include staying at home, avoiding crowded places, washing hands with soap and water often and for at least 20 seconds, practising good respiratory hygiene and avoiding touching the eyes, nose or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: Langkah-langkah pencegahan untuk mengurangi kemungkinan infeksi mencakup tetap di rumah, menghindari tempat-tempat ramai, sering mencuci tangan dengan sabun dan air setidaknya selama 20 detik, mempraktikkan higiene pernapasan yang baik, dan menghindari menyentuh mata, hidung, atau mulut dengan tangan yang tidak dicuci.
en-mt: Preventive steps to reduce the chance of infection include staying home, avoiding crowded places, frequently washing hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, practicing good respiratory hygiene, and avoiding touching eyes, nose, or mouth with non-smoother hands. washed.

sourceString: The CDC recommends covering the mouth and nose with a tissue when coughing or sneezing and recommends using the inside of the elbow if no tissue is available.
targetString: CDC merekomendasikan untuk menutup mulut dan hidung dengan tisu ketika batuk atau bersin dan merekomendasikan penggunaan bagian dalam siku jika tisu tidak tersedia.
en-mt: The CDC recommends covering your mouth and nose with a tissue when you cough or sneeze and recommends using the inside of your elbow if a tissue is not available.

sourceString: Proper hand hygiene after any cough or sneeze is encouraged.
targetString: Higiene tangan yang sesuai setelah batuk atau bersin dianjurkan.
en-mt: Proper hand hygiene after coughing or sneezing is recommended.

sourceString: The CDC has recommended the use of cloth face coverings in public settings, in part to limit transmission by asymptomatic individuals.Social distancing strategies aim to reduce contact of infected persons with large groups by closing schools and workplaces, restricting travel and cancelling large public gatherings.
targetString: CDC merekomendasikan penggunaan penutup wajah dari kain di tempat umum, sebagian untuk membatasi penularan oleh orang tanpa gejala. Strategi pembatasan sosial bertujuan untuk mengurangi kontak orang yang terinfeksi dengan banyak orang, dengan cara menutup sekolah dan tempat kerja, membatasi perjalanan, dan membatalkan pertemuan berskala besar di tempat umum.
en-mt: The CDC recommends wearing cloth face coverings in public, partly to limit transmission by people without symptoms. Social distancing strategies aim to reduce the contact of infected people with large numbers of people, by closing schools and workplaces, limiting travel, and canceling large-scale gatherings in public places.

sourceString: Distancing guidelines also include that people stay at least 6 feet (1.8 m) apart.
targetString: Pedoman pembatasan juga mencakup orang menjaga jarak setidaknya 6 kaki atau 1,8 meter.
en-mt: The restriction guidelines also include people keeping at least 6 feet (1.8 meters) apart.

sourceString: There is no medication known to be effective at preventing COVID-19.As a vaccine is not expected until 2021 at the earliest, a key part of managing COVID-19 is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as "flattening the curve".
targetString: Belum ada obat yang diketahui efektif mencegah COVID-19.Karena vaksin diantisipasi belum ada hingga awal 2021, bagian utama dalam menangani COVID-19 adalah mencoba untuk mengurangi puncak epidemi, yang dikenal sebagai "meratakan kurva".
en-mt: There is no known effective drug to prevent COVID-19. Since a vaccine is not anticipated until early 2021, a major part of dealing with COVID-19 will be trying to reduce the peak of the epidemic, known as "flattening the curve".

sourceString: The CDC also recommends that individuals wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty, before eating and after blowing one's nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: CDC juga merekomendasikan agar orang sering mencuci tangan dengan sabun dan air selama setidaknya 20 detik, terutama setelah dari toilet atau ketika tangan terlihat kotor, sebelum makan, serta setelah mengembus hidung, batuk, atau bersin.
en-mt: The CDC also recommends that people wash their hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty, before eating, and after blowing their nose, coughing, or sneezing.
